tika-s0302t:4_1: Tatrāti padaṃ ye desakālā idha viharaṇakiriyāya visesanabhāvena vuttā, tesaṃ paridīpananti
tika-s0302t:4_2: dassento “yaṃ samayaṃ…pe… dīpetī”ti āha. Taṃ-saddo hi vuttassa atthassa paṭiniddeso,
tika-s0302t:4_3: tasmā idha desassa kālassa vā paṭiniddeso bhavituṃ arahati, na aññassa. Ayaṃ tāva
tika-s0302t:4_4: tatrasaddassa paṭiniddesabhāve atthavibhāvanā. Yasmā pana īdisesu ṭhānesu tatrasaddo
tika-s0302t:4_5: dhammadesanāvisiṭṭhaṃ desaṃ kālañca vibhāveti, tasmā vuttaṃ “bhāsitabbayutte vā desakāle”ti.
tika-s0302t:4_6: Tena tatrāti yattha bhagavā dhammadesanatthaṃ bhikkhū ālapi abhāsi, tādise dese,
tika-s0302t:4_7: kāle vāti attho. Na hītiādinā tamevatthaṃ samattheti.
tika-s0302t:5_0: Nanu ca yattha ṭhito bhagavā “akālo kho tāvā”tiādinā bāhiyassa dhammadesanaṃ paṭikkhipi,
tika-s0302t:5_1: tattheva antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhitova tassa dhammaṃ desesīti? Saccametaṃ. Adesetabbakāle
tika-s0302t:5_2: adesanāya hi idaṃ udāharaṇaṃ. Tenāha “akālo kho tāvā”ti. Yaṃ pana tattha vuttaṃ “antaragharaṃ
tika-s0302t:5_3: paviṭṭhamhā”ti, tampi tassa akālabhāvasseva pariyāyena dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tassa
tika-s0302t:5_4: hi tadā addhānaparissamena rūpakāye akammaññatā ahosi, balavapītivegena nāmakāye.
tika-s0302t:5_5: Tadubhayassa vūpasamaṃ āgamento papañcaparihāratthaṃ bhagavā “akālo kho”ti pariyāyena
tika-s0302t:5_6: paṭikkhipi. Adesetabbadese adesanāya pana udāharaṇaṃ “atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma
tika-s0302t:5_7: aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi, vihārato nikkhamitvā vihārapacchāyāyaṃ paññatte āsane
tika-s0302t:5_8: nisīdī”ti evamādikaṃ idha ādisaddena saṅgahitaṃ. “Sa kho so bhikkhave bālo idha pāpāni
tika-s0302t:5_9: kammāni karitvā”ti evamādīsu padapūraṇamatte kho-saddo, “dukkhaṃ kho agāravo viharati
tika-s0302t:5_10: appatisso”tiādīsu avadhāraṇe, “kittāvatā nu kho, āvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato
tika-s0302t:5_11: sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī”tiādīsu ādikālatthe, vākyārambheti attho. Tattha padapūraṇena
tika-s0302t:5_12: vacanālaṅkāramattaṃ kataṃ hoti, ādikālatthena vākyassa upaññāsamattaṃ, avadhāraṇatthena
tika-s0302t:5_13: pana niyamadassanaṃ. “Tasmā āmantesi evā”ti āmantane niyamo dassito hotīti.
tika-s0302t:6_0: “Bhagavāti lokagarudīpana”nti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu pubbe “bhagavā”ti padaṃ vuttanti?
tika-s0302t:6_1: Yadipi pubbe vuttaṃ, taṃ pana yathāvuttaṭṭhāne viharaṇakiriyāya kattuvisesadassanaparaṃ,
tika-s0302t:6_2: na āmantanakiriyāya, idha pana āmantanakiriyāya, tasmā tadatthaṃ puna bhagavāti pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0302t:6_3: vuttanti. Tassatthaṃ dassetuṃ “bhagavāti lokagarudīpana”nti āha. Kathāsavanayuttapuggalavacananti
tika-s0302t:6_5: bhikkhū eva edisānaṃ desanānaṃ visesena bhājanabhūtāti sātisayena sāsanasampaṭiggāhakabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0302t:6_6: idha bhikkhugahaṇanti dassetvā idāni saddatthaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”ti āha. Tattha bhikkhakoti
tika-s0302t:6_7: bhikkhūti bhikkhanasīlattā bhikkhanadhammattā bhikkhūti attho. Bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti
tika-s0302t:6_8: buddhādīhipi ajjhupagataṃ bhikkhācariyaṃ uñchācariyaṃ ajjhupagatattā anuṭṭhitattā
tika-s0302t:6_9: bhikkhu. Yo hi koci appaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya agārasmā anagāriyaṃ
tika-s0302t:6_10: pabbajito, so kasigorakkhādīhi jīvikakappanaṃ hitvā liṅgasampaṭicchaneneva bhikkhācariyaṃ
tika-s0302t:6_11: ajjhupagatattā bhikkhu. Parapaṭibaddhajīvikattā vā vihāramajjhe kājabhattaṃ bhuñjamānopi
tika-s0302t:6_12: bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ nissāya pabbajjāya ussāhajātattā
tika-s0302t:6_13: vā bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti bhikkhūti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0302t:7_0: Ādinā nayenāti “bhinnapaṭadharoti bhikkhu, bhindati pāpake akusale dhammeti bhikkhu,
tika-s0302t:7_1: bhinnattā pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhikkhū”tiādinā vibhaṅge āgatanayena. Ñāpaneti
tika-s0302t:7_2: avabodhane, paṭivedaneti attho. Bhikkhanasīlatā, na kasivāṇijjādīhi jīvanasīlatā.
tika-s0302t:7_3: Bhikkhanadhammatā “uddissa ariyā tiṭṭhantī”ti evaṃ vuttabhikkhanasabhāvatā, na yācanākohaññasabhāvatā.
tika-s0302t:7_4: Bhikkhane sādhukāritā “uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā”ti vacanaṃ anussaritvā tattha appamajjatā.
tika-s0302t:7_5: Atha vā sīlaṃ nāma pakatisabhāvo. Idha pana tathādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Dhammoti vataṃ. Apare
tika-s0302t:7_6: pana “sīlaṃ nāma vatavasena samādānaṃ. Dhammo nāma paveṇi-āgataṃ cārittaṃ. Sādhukāritā
tika-s0302t:8_0: Hīnādhikajanasevitavuttinti ye bhikkhubhāve ṭhitāpi jātimadādivasena uddhatā unnaḷā,
tika-s0302t:8_1: ye ca gihibhāve paresu atthikabhāvampi anupagatatāya bhikkhācariyaṃ paramakāpaññaṃ
tika-s0302t:8_2: maññanti, tesaṃ ubhayesampi yathākkamaṃ “bhikkhavo”ti vacanena hīnajanehi daliddehi
tika-s0302t:8_3: paramakāpaññataṃ pattehi parakulesu bhikkhācariyāya jīvikaṃ kappentehi sevitaṃ vuttiṃ
tika-s0302t:8_4: pakāsento uddhatabhāvaniggahaṃ karoti, adhikajanehi uḷārabhogakhattiyakulādito pabbajitehi
tika-s0302t:8_5: buddhādīhi ājīvasodhanatthaṃ sevitaṃ vuttiṃ pakāsento dīnabhāvaniggahaṃ karotīti
tika-s0302t:8_6: yojetabbaṃ. Yasmā “bhikkhavo”ti vacanaṃ āmantanabhāvato abhimukhīkaraṇaṃ, pakaraṇato
tika-s0302t:8_7: sāmatthiyato ca sussūsājananaṃ, sakkaccasavanamanasikāraniyojanañca hoti, tasmā tamatthaṃ
tika-s0302t:9_0: Tattha sādhukaṃ manasikārepīti sādhukaṃ savane sādhukaṃ manasikāre ca. Kathaṃ pavattitā
tika-s0302t:9_1: savanādayo sādhukaṃ pavattitā hontīti? “Addhā imāya paṭipattiyā sakalasāsanasampatti
tika-s0302t:9_2: hatthagatā bhavissatī”ti ādaragāravayogena kathādīsu aparibhavādinā ca. Vuttañhi
tika-s0302t:9_3: “pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṃ bhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ
tika-s0302t:9_4: kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ. Katamehi pañcahi? Na kathaṃ paribhoti, na kathikaṃ paribhoti,
tika-s0302t:9_5: na attānaṃ paribhoti, avikkhittacitto dhammaṃ suṇāti ekaggacitto, yoniso ca manasi
tika-s0302t:9_6: karoti. Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṃ bhabbo
tika-s0302t:9_7: niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammatta”nti. Tenāha “sādhukaṃ manasikārāyattā
tika-s0302t:9_8: hi sāsanasampattī”ti. Sāsanasampatti nāma sīlādinipphatti. Paṭhamaṃ uppannattā adhigamavasena.
tika-s0302t:9_9: Satthucariyānuvidhāyakattā sīlādiguṇānuṭṭhānena. Tiṇṇaṃ yānānaṃ vasena anudhammapaṭipattisambhavato
tika-s0302t:10_0: Santikattāti samīpabhāvato. Santikāvacarattāti sabbakālaṃ saṃvuttibhāvato. Yathānusiṭṭhanti
tika-s0302t:10_1: anusāsaniyānurūpaṃ, anusāsaniṃ anavasesato paṭiggahetvāti attho. Ekacce bhikkhūti
tika-s0302t:10_2: ye paṭiccasamuppādadhamme desanāpasutā, te. Pubbe “sabbaparisasādhāraṇā hi bhagavato
tika-s0302t:10_3: dhammadesanā”tiādinā bhikkhūnaṃ eva āmantanakāraṇaṃ dassetvā idāni bhikkhū āmantetvā
tika-s0302t:10_4: dhammadesanāya payojanaṃ dassetuṃ kimatthaṃ pana bhagavāti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-s0302t:10_5: Tattha aññaṃ cintentāti aññavihitā. Vikkhittacittāti asamāhitacittā. Dhammaṃ paccavekkhantāti
tika-s0302t:10_6: hiyyo tato paradivasesu vā sutadhammaṃ pati manasā avekkhantā. Bhikkhū āmantetvā
tika-s0302t:10_7: dhamme desiyamāne ādito paṭṭhāya desanaṃ sallakkhetuṃ sakkotīti imamevatthaṃ byatirekamukhena
tika-s0302t:11_0: Bhikkhavoti ca sandhivasena i-kāralopo daṭṭhabbo “bhikkhavo itī”ti, ayañhi itisaddo
tika-s0302t:11_2: hesa “ruppatīti kho, bhikkhave, tasmā ‘rūpa’nti vuccatī”tiādīsu hetumhi dissati,
tika-s0302t:11_3: “tasmātiha me, bhikkhave, dhammadāyādā bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā”tiādīsu parisamāpane,
tika-s0302t:11_4: “iti vā evarūpā visūkadassanā paṭivirato”tiādīsu ādiatthe “māgaṇḍiyoti tassa brāhmaṇassa
tika-s0302t:11_5: saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpo”tiādīsu
tika-s0302t:11_6: padatthavipariyāye, “iti kho, bhikkhave, sappaṭibhayo bālo, appaṭibhayo paṇḍito.
tika-s0302t:11_7: Saupaddavo bālo, anupaddavo paṇḍito”tiādīsu pakāre, “atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇanti
tika-s0302t:11_8: iti puṭṭhena satā, ānanda, atthītissa vacanīyaṃ. Kiṃ paccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti ce
tika-s0302t:11_9: vadeyya, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iccassa vacanīya”ntiādīsu avadhāraṇe, “sabbamatthīti
tika-s0302t:11_10: kho, kaccāna, ayameko anto, sabbaṃ natthīti ayaṃ dutiyo anto”tiādīsu nidassane. Idhāpi
tika-s0302t:11_11: nidassane eva daṭṭhabbo. Bhikkhavoti āmantanākāro tamesa iti-saddo nidasseti “bhikkhavoti
tika-s0302t:11_12: āmantesī”ti. Iminā nayena bhaddantetiādīsupi yathārahaṃ itisaddassa attho veditabbo.
tika-s0302t:12_0: Pubbe “bhagavā āmantesī”ti vuttattā bhagavato paccassosunti idha bhagavatoti sāmivacanaṃ
tika-s0302t:12_1: āmantanameva sambandhīantaraṃ apekkhatīti iminā adhippāyena “bhagavato āmantanaṃ
tika-s0302t:12_2: paṭiassosu”nti vuttaṃ. Bhagavatoti idaṃ pana paṭissavasambandhena sampadānavacanaṃ.
tika-s0302t:12_3: Ettāvatā yaṃ kāladesadesakaparisāpadesapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ nidānaṃ bhāsitanti sambandho.
tika-s0302t:12_4: Etthāha – kimatthaṃ pana dhammavinayasaṅgahe kariyamāne nidānavacanaṃ, nanu bhagavatā
tika-s0302t:12_6: Kāladesadesakanimittaparisāpadesehi upanibandhitvā ṭhapitā hi desanā ciraṭṭhitikā
tika-s0302t:12_7: hoti asammosadhammā saddheyyā ca, desakālakattusotunimittehi upanibandho viya vohāravinicchayo.
tika-s0302t:12_8: Teneva cāyasmatā mahākassapena “paṭiccasamuppādasuttaṃ, āvuso ānanda, kattha bhāsita”ntiādinā
tika-s0302t:12_9: desādipucchāsu katāsu tāsaṃ vissajjanaṃ karontena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena “evaṃ me suta”nti
tika-s0302t:12_10: āyasmatā ānandena imassa suttassa nidānaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
tika-s0302t:13_0: Apica satthu sampattipakāsanatthaṃ nidānavacanaṃ. Tathāgatassa hi bhagavato pubbaracanānumānāgamatakkābhāvato
tika-s0302t:13_1: sammāsambuddhabhāvasiddhi. Na hi sammāsambuddhassa pubbaracanādīhi attho atthi, sabbattha
tika-s0302t:13_3: khīṇāsavattasiddhi. Na hi sabbaso khīṇāsavassa te sambhavantīti suvisuddhā cassa
tika-s0302t:13_6: purimavesārajjadvayasiddhi, tato eva ca antarāyikaniyyānikadhammesu sammohābhāvasiddhito
tika-s0302t:13_8: ca nidānavacanena pakāsitā hoti, tattha tattha sampattaparisāya ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ
tika-s0302t:13_9: ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānena dhammadesanādīpanato, idha pana mūladvayavasena antadvayarahitassa
tika-s0302t:13_11: bodhiyā nidassanato cāti yojetabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “satthu sampattipakāsanatthaṃ nidānavacana”nti.
tika-s0302t:14_1: hi bhagavato natthi niratthikā pavatti, attahitatthā vā, tasmā paresaṃ eva atthāya
tika-s0302t:14_4: sāsanaṃ, na kabbaracanā. Tayidaṃ satthucaritaṃ kāladesadesakaparisāpadesehi saddhiṃ
tika-s0302t:14_5: tattha tattha nidānavacanehi yathārahaṃ pakāsīyati, idha pana dvādasapadikapaccayākāravibhāvanena
tika-s0302t:15_0: Apica satthu pamāṇabhāvappakāsanena sāsanassa pamāṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ nidānavacanaṃ,
tika-s0302t:15_1: tañcassa pamāṇabhāvadassanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena “bhagavā”ti ca iminā padena
tika-s0302t:15_4: sabbasattuttamabhāvadīpanena ayamattho sabbathā pakāsito hotīti. Idamettha nidānavacane payojananidassanaṃ.
tika-s0302t:16_0: Nikkhittassāti desitassa. Desanāpi hi desetabbassa sīlādiatthassa vineyyasantānesu
tika-s0302t:16_1: nikkhipanato “nikkhepo”ti vuccatīti “suttanikkhepaṃ tāva vicāretvā vuccamānā pākaṭā
tika-s0302t:16_2: hotī”ti sāmaññato bhagavato desanāya samuṭṭhānassa vibhāgaṃ dassetvā “etthāyaṃ desanā
tika-s0302t:16_3: evaṃsamuṭṭhānā”ti desanāya samuṭṭhāne dassite suttassa sammadeva nidānaparijānanena
tika-s0302t:16_4: vaṇṇanāya suviññeyyattā vuttaṃ. Tato heṭṭhā “kasmā bhagavatā paṭiccasamuppādavaseneva
tika-s0302t:16_5: desanā āraddhā”ti kenaci codanāya katāya “parajjhāsayoyaṃ suttanikkhepo”ti parihāro
tika-s0302t:16_6: sukathito hoti. Tattha yathā anekasataanekasahassabhedānipi suttantāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādipadhānanayena
tika-s0302t:16_8: āha “cattāro hi suttanikkhepā”ti. Ettha ca yathā attajjhāsayassa aṭṭhuppattiyā ca
tika-s0302t:16_9: parajjhāsayapucchāhi saddhiṃ saṃsaggabhedo sambhavati “attajjhāsayo ca parajjhāsayo
tika-s0302t:16_10: ca, attajjhāsayo ca pucchāvasiko ca, attajjhāsayo ca parajjhāsayo ca pucchāvasiko
tika-s0302t:16_11: ca, aṭṭhuppattiko ca parajjhāsayo ca, aṭṭhuppattiko ca pucchāvasiko ca, aṭṭhuppattiko
tika-s0302t:16_12: ca parajjhāsayo ca pucchāvasiko cā”ti ajjhāsayapucchānusandhisambhavato, evaṃ yadipi
tika-s0302t:16_13: aṭṭhuppattiyā ajjhāsayenapi saṃsaggabhedo sambhavati, attajjhāsayādīhi pana purato
tika-s0302t:16_14: ṭhitehi aṭṭhuppattiyā saṃsaggo natthīti. Nayidha niravaseso vitthāranayo sambhavatīti
tika-s0302t:16_15: “cattāro hi suttanikkhepā”ti vuttaṃ. Tadantogadhattā vā sambhavantānaṃ sesanikkhepānaṃ
tika-s0302t:16_16: mūlanikkhepavasena cattārova dassitā, tathādassanañcettha ayaṃ saṃsaggabhedo gahetabboti.
tika-s0302t:17_0: Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – nikkhipīyatīti nikkhepo, suttaṃ eva nikkhepo suttanikkhepo.
tika-s0302t:17_1: Atha vā nikkhipanaṃ nikkhepo, suttassa nikkhepo suttanikkhepo, suttadesanāti attho.
tika-s0302t:17_2: Attano ajjhāsayo attajjhāsayo, so assa atthi kāraṇabhūtoti attajjhāsayo. Attano ajjhāsayo
tika-s0302t:17_3: etassāti vā attajjhāsayo. Parajjhāsayepi eseva nayo. Pucchāya vasena pavattadhammo
tika-s0302t:17_4: etassa atthīti, pucchāvasiko. Suttadesanāya vatthubhūtassa atthassa uppatti atthuppatti,
tika-s0302t:17_5: atthuppattiyeva aṭṭhuppatti, sā etassa atthīti aṭṭhuppattiko. Atha vā nikkhipīyati
tika-s0302t:17_6: suttaṃ etenāti suttanikkhepo, attajjhāsayādi eva. Etasmiṃ pana atthavikappe attano
tika-s0302t:17_7: ajjhāsayo attajjhāsayo. Paresaṃ ajjhāsayo parajjhāsayo. Pucchīyatīti pucchā, pucchitvā
tika-s0302t:17_8: ñātabbo attho. Tassa pucchāvasena pavattaṃ dhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ vacanaṃ pucchāvasikaṃ,
tika-s0302t:17_9: tadeva nikkhepasaddāpekkhāya pulliṅgavasena “pucchāvasiko”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā aṭṭhuppatti
tika-s0302t:18_0: Apicettha paresaṃ indriyaparipākādikāraṇanirapekkhattā attajjhāsayassa visuṃ suttanikkhepabhāvo
tika-s0302t:18_1: yutto kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayeneva dhammatantiṭhapanatthaṃ pavattitadesanattā. Parajjhāsayapucchāvasikānaṃ
tika-s0302t:18_2: pana paresaṃ ajjhāsayapucchānaṃ desanāpavattihetubhūtānaṃ uppattiyaṃ pavattitānaṃ
tika-s0302t:18_3: kathaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ anavarodho, pucchāvasikaaṭṭhuppattikānaṃ vā parajjhāsayānurodhena
tika-s0302t:18_4: pavattitānaṃ kathaṃ parajjhāsaye anavarodhoti? Na codetabbametaṃ. Paresañhi abhinīhāraparipucchādivinimuttasseva
tika-s0302t:18_6: visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. Tathā hi brahmajāladhammadāyādasuttādīnaṃ vaṇṇāvaṇṇaāmisuppādādidesanānimittaṃ
tika-s0302t:18_7: “aṭṭhuppattī”ti vuccati. Paresaṃ pucchaṃ vinā ajjhāsayaṃ eva nimittaṃ katvā desito
tika-s0302t:18_8: parajjhāsayo, pucchāvasena eva desito pucchāvasikoti pākaṭovāyamatthoti. Attano ajjhāsayeneva
tika-s0302t:18_10: anupubbena nikkhittānaṃ suttānaṃ āvali, tathā candopamahārakādayo.
tika-s0302t:19_0: Vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā saddhindriyādayo. Ajjhāsayanti adhimuttiṃ. Khantinti diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiṃ.
tika-s0302t:19_1: Mananti cittaṃ. Abhinīhāranti paṇidhānaṃ. Bujjhanabhāvanti bujjhanasabhāvaṃ, paṭivijjhanākāraṃ vā.
tika-s0302t:20_0: Ugghaṭitaññūti ugghaṭanaṃ nāma ñāṇugghaṭanaṃ, ñāṇena ugghaṭitamatte eva dhammaṃ jānātīti
tika-s0302t:20_1: attho. Vipañcitaṃ vitthāritameva atthaṃ jānātīti vipañcitaññū. Uddesādīhi netabboti
tika-s0302t:20_2: neyyo. Byañjanapadaṃ paramaṃ assāti padaparamo. Saha udāhaṭavelāyāti udāhāradhammassa
tika-s0302t:20_3: uddese udāhaṭamatte eva. Dhammābhisamayoti catusaccadhammassa ñāṇena saddhiṃ abhisamāyogo.
tika-s0302t:20_4: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā nayena saṃkhittena mātikāya ṭhapiyamānāya
tika-s0302t:20_5: desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhituṃ samattho puggalo “ugghaṭitaññū”ti
tika-s0302t:20_6: vuccati. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ saṃkhittena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne
tika-s0302t:20_7: arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho puggalo “vipañcitaññū”ti vuccati. Uddesatoti uddesahetu,
tika-s0302t:20_8: uddisantassa uddisāpentassa vāti attho, “uddisato”tipi pāṭho, ayamevattho. Paripucchatoti
tika-s0302t:20_9: paripucchantassa. Anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hotīti anukkamena arahattappatti hoti.
tika-s0302t:20_10: Na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hotīti tena attabhāvena maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā antamaso
tika-s0302t:20_11: jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ puggalo byañjanapadameva
tika-s0302t:21_0: Ekacarāti vivekābhiratiyā ekavihārino. Dvicarāti dve ekajjhāsayā hutvā ñāṇacariyādivasena
tika-s0302t:21_1: vicarantā. Esa nayo sesesu. Sattasuññatāpakāsanena suññataṃ. Tato eva saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ.
tika-s0302t:21_2: “Paresaṃ ajjhāsayavasena bhagavā idaṃ suttaṃ ārabhī”ti vatvā te pana “pare”ti vuttapuggalā
tika-s0302t:21_3: aparikammikā suparisodhitapubbabhāgapaṭipadā cāti duvidhā, tadubhayesu satthu paṭipattiṃ
tika-s0302t:21_4: upamāmukhena pakāsento yathā hītiādimāha. Rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti likhanavasena na
tika-s0302t:21_5: uppādeti. Akatābhinivesanti vipassanābhāvanāya akatānuyogaṃ. Sīla…pe… sampadāyāti
tika-s0302t:22_0: Yanti yaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ sandhāya. Sīlanti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ. Diṭṭhi cāti
tika-s0302t:22_1: kammassakatādiṭṭhi ceva kammapathasammādiṭṭhi ca. Tividhenāti ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā
tika-s0302t:22_2: ajjhattabahiddhāti evaṃ visayabhāvato tippakārena. Yathāvuttadiṭṭhivisuddhiyā visesapaccayaṃ
tika-s0302t:22_3: sīlaṃyeva bhāvanāya adhiṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ “sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāyā”ti.
tika-s0302t:23_1: Paccayadhammānaṃ avijjādīnaṃ tassa tassa paccayuppannassa hetupaccayādibhāvo paccayākāro.
tika-s0302t:23_2: So pana atthato avijjā evāti āha “paṭiccasamuppādanti paccayākāra”nti. Tenāha “paccayākāro hī”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:24_0: Kāmaṃ vo-saddo padaparaṭṭhito paṭiyogīatthavisesavācako, nāmaparabhūto pana taṃ taṃ
tika-s0302t:24_2: āha “voti…pe… dissatī”ti. Taṃdesananti tassa paṭiccasamuppādassa desanaṃ. Sā hi idha
tika-s0302t:24_3: ta-saddena paccāmasīyati. “Suṇāthā”ti sotaviññeyyatāvacanato na kevalaṃ paṭiccasamuppādo.
tika-s0302t:25_0: Ekatthametaṃ padaṃ ka-saddena padavaḍḍhanamattassa katattā, tasmā sādhusaddassa kato
tika-s0302t:25_1: atthuddhāro sādhukasaddassapi kato eva hotīti adhippāyo. Sādhu bhanteti yācāmahaṃ
tika-s0302t:25_2: bhanteti ayamettha atthoti āha “āyācane”ti. Puna sādhu bhanteti evaṃ bhanteti ayamettha
tika-s0302t:25_3: atthoti āha “sampaṭicchane”ti. Sādhu sādhūti aho ahoti ayamettha atthoti vuttaṃ “sampahaṃsane”ti.
tika-s0302t:25_4: Sādhu dhammarucīti puññakāmo sundaroti attho. Paññāṇavāti paññavā. Addubbhoti adūsako.
tika-s0302t:25_5: Daḷhīkammeti thirīkaraṇe sakkaccakiriyāyaṃ. Āṇattiyanti āṇāpane. “Suṇātha sādhukaṃ
tika-s0302t:25_6: manasi karothā”ti hi vutte sādhukasaddena savanamanasikārānaṃ sakkaccakiriyā viya
tika-s0302t:25_7: tadāṇāpanampi vuttaṃ hoti. Āyācanatthatā viya cassa āṇāpanatthatā veditabbā.
tika-s0302t:26_0: Idānettha evaṃ yojanā veditabbāti sambandho. Sotindriyavikkhepanivāraṇaṃ savane niyojanavasena
tika-s0302t:26_1: kiriyantarapaṭisedhanabhāvato, sotaṃ odahathāti hi attho. Manindriyavikkhepanivāraṇaṃ
tika-s0302t:26_2: aññacintāpaṭisedhanato. Purimanti “suṇāthā”ti padaṃ. Etthāti “suṇātha, manasi karothā”ti
tika-s0302t:26_3: padadvaye, etasmiṃ vā adhikāre. Byañjanavipallāsaggāhanivāraṇaṃ sotadvāre vikkhepapaṭibāhakattā.
tika-s0302t:26_4: Na hi yāthāvato suṇantassa saddato vipallāsaggāho hoti. Atthavipallāsaggāhanivāraṇaṃ
tika-s0302t:26_5: manindriyavikkhepapaṭibāhakattā. Na hi sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ upadhārentassa atthavipallāsaggāho
tika-s0302t:26_6: hoti. Dhammassavane niyojeti “suṇāthā”ti vidahanato. Dhāraṇūpaparikkhāsūti ettha
tika-s0302t:26_7: upaparikkhaggahaṇeneva tulanatīraṇādike diṭṭhiyā ca suppaṭivedhaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Sabyañjanoti
tika-s0302t:26_8: ettha yathādhippetamatthaṃ byañjayatīti byañjanaṃ, sabhāvanirutti. Saha byañjanehīti
tika-s0302t:26_9: sabyañjano, byañjanasampannoti attho. Araṇīyato upagantabbato attho, catupārisuddhisīlādiko.
tika-s0302t:26_10: Saha atthenāti sāttho, atthasampannoti attho. Dhammagambhīrotiādīsu dhammo nāma tanti.
tika-s0302t:26_11: Desanā nāma tassā manasā vavatthapitāya tantiyā desanā kathanaṃ. Attho nāma tantiyā
tika-s0302t:26_12: attho. Paṭivedho nāma tantiyā tantiatthassa ca yathābhūtāvabodho. Yasmā cete dhammadesanāatthapaṭivedhā
tika-s0302t:26_13: sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāḷhā alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca, tasmā
tika-s0302t:26_14: gambhīrā. Tena vuttaṃ “yasmā ayaṃ dhammo…pe… sādhukaṃ manasi karothā”ti.
tika-s0302t:27_0: Ettha ca paṭivedhassa dukkarabhāvato dhammatthānaṃ desanāñāṇassa dukkarabhāvato desanāya
tika-s0302t:27_1: dukkhogāhatā, paṭivedhassa pana uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā tabbisayañāṇuppattiyā ca
tika-s0302t:27_2: dukkarabhāvato dukkhogāhatā veditabbā. Desanaṃ nāma uddisanaṃ saṅkhepadassanasadisaṃ.
tika-s0302t:27_3: Tathā hi vibhaṅgasutte “desessāmī”ti vatvā puna “bhāsissāmī”ti vuttaṃ. Tassa niddisanaṃ
tika-s0302t:27_4: bhāsananti idhādhippetanti āha “vitthāratopi naṃ bhāsissāmīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Paribyattaṃ
tika-s0302t:28_0: Sāḷikāyiva nigghosoti sāḷikāya ālāpo viya madhuro kaṇṇasukho pemanīyo. Paṭibhānaṃ
tika-s0302t:28_1: saddo. Udīrayīti uccārīyati, vuccatīti attho. Evaṃ vutte ussāhajātāti evaṃ “suṇātha
tika-s0302t:28_2: sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti vutte “na kira satthā saṅkhepeneva desessati,
tika-s0302t:29_0: Katamoti tassa padassa sāmaññato pucchābhāvo ñāyati, na visesatoti tassa pucchāvisesabhāvaṃ
tika-s0302t:29_1: kathento “kathetukamyatāpucchā”ti vatvā teneva pasaṅgena mahāniddese āgatā sabbāpi
tika-s0302t:29_2: pucchā atthuddhāranayena dasseti “pañcavidhā hi pucchā”tiādinā. Tattha adiṭṭhaṃ joteti
tika-s0302t:29_3: etāyāti adiṭṭhajotanā. Diṭṭhaṃ saṃsandīyati etāyāti diṭṭhasaṃsandanā. Saṃsandanañcettha
tika-s0302t:29_4: sākacchāvasena vinicchayakaraṇaṃ. Vimatiṃ chindati etāyāti vimaticchedanā. Anumatiyā
tika-s0302t:29_5: pucchanaṃ anumatipucchā. “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave”tiādipucchāya hi “kā tumhākaṃ
tika-s0302t:29_6: anumatī”ti anumati pucchitā hoti. Kathetukamyatā kathetukamyatāya.
tika-s0302t:30_0: Lakkhaṇanti ñātuṃ pucchito yo koci sabhāvo. Aññātanti yena kenaci ñāṇena aññātabhāvamāha.
tika-s0302t:30_1: Adiṭṭhanti dassanabhūtena ñāṇena cakkhunā viya na diṭṭhataṃ. Atulitanti “ettakaṃ
tika-s0302t:30_2: ida”nti tulanabhūtena ñāṇena na tulitataṃ. Atīritanti tīraṇabhūtena ñāṇena akatañāṇakiriyāsamāpanataṃ.
tika-s0302t:30_3: Avibhūtanti ñāṇassa apākaṭabhāvaṃ. Avibhāvitanti ñāṇena apākaṭīkatabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0302t:31_0: Pañcasu pucchāsu yā buddhānaṃ sabbato na santi, tā dassetvā idhādhippetapucchaṃ nigametuṃ
tika-s0302t:31_1: “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ suviññeyyameva. Yadi paṭiccasamuppādo paccayākāro, atha
tika-s0302t:31_2: kasmā bhagavatā paṭiccasamuppādadesanāya saṅkhārādayo paccayuppannā kathitāti āha
tika-s0302t:31_5: dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. “Sambhavantī”ti pāḷiyaṃ parato vuttaṃ kiriyāpadaṃ ānetvā yojeti,
tika-s0302t:31_6: aññathā saṅkhārā kiṃ katāti vā karontīti vā na ñāyeyya. Pavattiyā anulomato “avijjāpaccayā”tiādikā
tika-s0302t:32_0: “Avijjāya tvevā”tiādikā pana tassa vilomato paṭilomakathā. Accantameva saṅkhāre virajjati
tika-s0302t:32_1: etenāti virāgo, maggo. Asesanirodhāti asesetvā nirodhā samucchindanā. Evaṃ nirodhānanti
tika-s0302t:32_2: evaṃ anuppādanirodhena niruddhānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhā. Iti avijjādīnaṃ nirodhavacanena
tika-s0302t:32_3: arahattaṃ vadati. Sakalassāti anavasesassa. Sattavirahitassāti paraparikappitajīvarahitassa.
tika-s0302t:33_0: Attamanāti pītisomanassena gahitacittā. Tathābhūtā ca haṭṭhacittā nāma hontīti āha
tika-s0302t:33_2: “Abhinanditvā”ti ettha sampaṭicchanattho. Idha pana ubhayatthopi vaṭṭatīti āha “anumodiṃsu
tika-s0302t:36_0: 2. Dutiyepīti dutiyasuttepi. Pi-saddena tadaññesu suttesupīti attho. “Visuddhimagge
tika-s0302t:36_1: vuttā evā”ti vatvāpi tadekadesaṃ idha viniyogakkhamaṃ dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:36_2: Tanti mūlaṃ. Vitthāradesananti “vibhajissāmī”ti padassa atthassa dassanavasena pavattaṃ
tika-s0302t:36_3: vibhaṅgadesanaṃ. Uddesadesanā paṭhamasutte anulomadesanāsadisāva. Puna vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ
tika-s0302t:36_4: dassentoti “iti kho, bhikkhave”tiādinā pavattiṃ nivattiñca dassento. Paṭhamaṃ uddesavasena
tika-s0302t:36_5: vibhajanavasena vivaṭṭaṃ dassitaṃ, tato eva byatirekanayena vivaṭṭampi dassitameva
tika-s0302t:37_0: Tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānanti idaṃ kiñci pakārato anāmasitvā sabbepi satte sāmaññato byāpetvā
tika-s0302t:37_1: gahaṇanti āha “saṅkhepato…pe… niddeso”ti. Gatijātivasenāti pañcagativasena, tatthāpi
tika-s0302t:37_3: viya kiccavisesaṃ, “mānasa”ntiādīsu viya samāne atthe saddavisesaṃ, “paṇḍara”ntiādīsu
tika-s0302t:37_4: viya guṇavisesaṃ, “cetasikaṃ hadaya”ntiādīsu viya nissayavisesaṃ, “cittassa ṭhitī”tiādīsu
tika-s0302t:37_5: viya aññassa avatthābhāvavisesaṃ, “alubbhanā”tiādīsu viya aññassa kiriyābhāvavisesaṃ,
tika-s0302t:37_6: “alubbhitatta”ntiādīsu viya aññassa abhāvatāvisesanti evamādikaṃ anapekkhitvā dhammamattaṃ
tika-s0302t:37_7: vā dīpanā sabhāvaniddeso. Jiṇṇassa jīraṇavasena pavattanākāro jīraṇatāti āha “ākāraniddeso”ti.
tika-s0302t:38_0: Kālātikkame kiccaniddesāti kalalakālato pabhuti purimarūpānaṃ jarāpattakkhaṇe uppajjamānāni
tika-s0302t:38_1: pacchimarūpāni paripakkarūpānurūpāni pariṇatapariṇatāni uppajjantīti anukkamena supariṇatarūpānaṃ
tika-s0302t:38_3: kālātikkame jarāya kiccaniddesā. Pakatiniddesāti phalavipaccanapakatiyā niddesā,
tika-s0302t:38_4: jarāya vā pāpuṇitabbaphalameva pakati, tassā niddesā, na ca khaṇḍiccādīneva jarāti
tika-s0302t:38_6: labbhamānā khaṇḍiccādayo jarāya gatamaggāicceva veditabbā, na jarāti.
tika-s0302t:39: Yasmā jaraṃ pattassa āyu hāyati, indriyāni jajjarāni hontīti āyuhānādayo pakatiniddesā, tasmā vuttaṃ “pacchimā dve pakatiniddesā”ti. Tenāha “imehi panā”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:40_0: Aviññāyamānantarattā avīcijarā maṇiādīsu mandadasakādīsu ekekadasakesu ca khaṇe khaṇe
tika-s0302t:40_1: jiṇṇavikārādīnaṃ duviññeyyattā. Tato aññesūti maṇiādito aññesu ahicchattakādīsu,
tika-s0302t:40_3: pupphādīsu vāti attho. Tattha hi jarāvisesassa suviññeyyattā savīcijarā nāma.
tika-s0302t:41_0: Cavanakavasenāti cavanakānaṃ khandhānaṃ vasena. Ekacatupañcakkhandhāya cutiyā cavanameva
tika-s0302t:41_1: cavanatāti āha “bhāvavacanena lakkhaṇanidassana”nti, pāḷiyaṃ “cutī”ti vuttassa maraṇassa
tika-s0302t:41_2: sabhāvadassananti attho. Bhaṅguppatti bhijjamānatā. Tena “bhedo”ti iminā khandhānaṃ
tika-s0302t:41_3: bhijjamānatā bhedasamaṅgitā vuttāti dasseti. Ṭhānābhāvaparidīpananti kenacipi ākārena
tika-s0302t:41_4: avaṭṭhānābhāvadīpanaṃ. Ghaṭassevāti hi visadisūdāharaṇaṃ. Yathā ghaṭe bhinne kapālādiavayavaseso
tika-s0302t:41_5: labbhati, na evaṃ cutikkhandhesu bhaṅgesu, na koci viseso tiṭṭhatīti dassetuṃ “antaradhāna”nti
tika-s0302t:41_6: vuttaṃ. Maccusaṅkhātaṃ maraṇanti maccusaññitaṃ maraṇaṃ. “Kālamaraṇa”nti vadanti.
tika-s0302t:41_7: Santānassa accantasamucchedabhūtaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ maraṇaṃ samucchedamaraṇaṃ. Ādi-saddena
tika-s0302t:41_8: khaṇikamaraṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tassa kiriyāti antakassa kiriyā, yā loke vuccati “maccū”ti,
tika-s0302t:41_9: maraṇanti attho. Cavanakālo eva vā anatikkamanīyattā visesena kāloti vuttoti tassa
tika-s0302t:41_10: kiriyā atthato cutikkhandhānaṃ bhedapavattiyeva. “Maccu maraṇa”nti vā ettha samāsaṃ
tika-s0302t:41_11: akatvā yo “maccū”ti vuccati bhedo, tameva maraṇaṃ “pāṇacāgo”ti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0302t:42_0: Catuvokāravasenāti catuvokārabhavavasena. Tattha hi rūpakāyasaññito kaḷevaro natthi,
tika-s0302t:42_1: yaṃ nikkhipeyya. Kiñcāpi ekavokārabhavepi kaḷevaranikkhepo natthi, rūpakāyassa pana
tika-s0302t:42_2: tattha atthitāmattaṃ gahetvā “ekavokāravasena kaḷevarassa nikkhepo”ti vutto. Catuvokāravasena
tika-s0302t:42_3: cāti ca-saddena “sesadvayavasena khandhānaṃ bhedo”ti imamatthaṃ dasseti sabbattheva
tika-s0302t:42_5: Yadipi ekavokārabhave rūpakāyo vijjati, kaḷevaranikkhepo pana natthīti “kaḷevarassa
tika-s0302t:42_6: sabbhāvato”icceva vuttaṃ. Yasmā manussādīsu kaḷevaranikkhepo atthi, tasmā manussādīsu
tika-s0302t:42_7: kaḷevarassa nikkhepoti yojanā. Kaḷevaraṃ nikkhipīyati etenāti maraṇaṃ kaḷevarassa
tika-s0302t:42_8: nikkhepo. Ekato katvāti ekajjhaṃ katvā, ekajjhaṃ gahaṇamattena.
tika-s0302t:43_0: Jāyanaṭṭhenātiādi āyatanavasena yonivasena ca dvīhi padehi sabbasatte pariyādiyitvā
tika-s0302t:43_1: pariyādiyitvā jātiṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Keci pana “kattubhāvavasena padadvayaṃ vutta”nti
tika-s0302t:43_2: vadanti. “Tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ jāti sañjātī”ti pana kattari sāminiddesassa katattā
tika-s0302t:43_3: ubhayatthāpi bhāvaniddeso. Sampuṇṇā jāti sañjāti. Pākaṭā nibbatti abhinibbatti. Tesaṃ
tika-s0302t:43_4: tesaṃ sattānaṃ…pe… abhinibbattīti sattavasena pavattattā vohāradesanā.
tika-s0302t:44_0: Tatra tatrāti ekacatuvokārabhavesu dvinnaṃ sesarūpadhātuyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppajjamānānaṃ
tika-s0302t:44_1: pañcannaṃ, kāmadhātuyaṃ vikalāvikalindriyānaṃ vasena sattannaṃ navannaṃ dasannaṃ
tika-s0302t:44_2: puna dasannaṃ ekādasannañca āyatanānaṃ vasena saṅgaho veditabbo. Santatiyanti yena
tika-s0302t:44_3: kammunā khandhānaṃ pātubhāvo, tena abhisaṅkhatasantatiyaṃ. Tañca kho paṭisandhikkhaṇavasena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:45_0: Kammaṃyeva kammabhavo “bhavati etasmā upapattibhavo”ti katvā. Kammena niyyāditaattabhāvupapattivasena
tika-s0302t:45_1: bhavatīti bhavo, tathā tathā nibbattavipāko kaṭattārūpañca. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “bhavatīti
tika-s0302t:45_2: katvā bhavo”ti upapattibhavassa vakkhamānattā “kammaṃ phalavohārena bhavoti vutta”nti kathitaṃ.
tika-s0302t:46_0: Upādiyanti sattā daḷhaggāhaṃ gaṇhanti etena kilesakāmena. Na kevalaṃ idha karaṇasādhanameva,
tika-s0302t:46_1: atha kho kattusādhanampi labbhatīti vuttaṃ “sayaṃ vā”ti. Tanti vatthukāmaṃ. Kāmo
tika-s0302t:46_2: ca so kāmanaṭṭhena, upādānañca bhusamādānaṭṭhenāti kāmupādānaṃ. Etanti kāmupādānapadaṃ.
tika-s0302t:47_0: Sassato attāti idaṃ purimadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyamānaṃ uttaradiṭṭhiṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Yathā
tika-s0302t:47_1: esā diṭṭhi daḷhīkaraṇavasena purimaṃ uttarā upādiyati, evaṃ “natthi dinna”ntiādikāpīti.
tika-s0302t:47_2: Attaggahaṇaṃ pana “attavādupādāna”nti idaṃ na diṭṭhupādānadassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:47_3: Loko cāti attaggahaṇavinimuttaggahaṇaṃ diṭṭhupādānabhūtaṃ idha purimadiṭṭhiuttaradiṭṭhivacanehi
tika-s0302t:48: Yena micchābhinivesena gosīlagovatādiṃ samādiyati ceva anutiṭṭhati ca, so gosīlagovatādīnīti adhippetāni. Tenāha “gosīla…pe… sayameva upādānānī”ti. Abhinivesatoti abhinivesanato.
tika-s0302t:49: Attavādupādānanti “attā”ti vādassa paññāpanassa gahaṇassa kāraṇabhūtā diṭṭhīti attho. Attavādamattamevāti attassa abhāvā “attā”ti idaṃ vacanamattameva. Upādiyanti daḷhaṃ gaṇhanti.
tika-s0302t:50_0: Cakkhudvārādīsu pavattāyāti idaṃ taṇhāya rūpataṇhādibhāvassa kāraṇavacanaṃ chadvārārammaṇikadhammānaṃ
tika-s0302t:50_1: paṭiniyatārammaṇattā. Javanavīthiyā pavattāyāti idaṃ tassā pavattiṭṭhānadassanaṃ.
tika-s0302t:50_2: Sabhāveneva uṭṭhātuṃ asakkontassa veḷu viya nissayo ahutvā olumbhakabhāvena bhāvo
tika-s0302t:50_3: upādānassa paccayabhāvato ārammaṇampi taṃsadisaṃ vuttaṃ. Rūpeti visaye bhummaṃ. Sā
tika-s0302t:50_4: tividhā hotīti sambandho. Kāmataṇhā kāmassādabhāvena pavattiyā. Evaṃ assādentīti
tika-s0302t:50_6: niccadhuvasassatābhinivesamukhena assādentī. Bhavasahagatā taṇhā bhavataṇhā. Bhavati
tika-s0302t:50_7: tiṭṭhati sabbakālanti hi bhavadiṭṭhi bhavo uttarapadalopena, bhavassādavasena pavattiyā
tika-s0302t:50_8: ca. Iminā nayena vibhavataṇhāti ettha attho veditabbo. Vibhavati ucchijjati vinassatīti
tika-s0302t:50_9: evaṃ pavattā diṭṭhi vibhavo uttarapadalopena. Evaṃ tāni aṭṭhārasāti yā cha kāmataṇhā,
tika-s0302t:50_10: cha bhavataṇhā, cha vibhavataṇhā vuttā, etāni aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritāni taṇhāpaccayo.
tika-s0302t:50_11: Ajjhattanti sakasantatiyaṃ. Bahiddhāti tato bahiddhā. Atītārammaṇāni vā hontu itarārammaṇāni
tika-s0302t:50_12: vā, sayaṃ pana atītāni chattiṃsa taṇhāvicaritāni. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. “Aṭṭhasataṃ
tika-s0302t:50_13: taṇhāvicaritānī”tiādinā sambandho. Idāni aparenapi pakārena aṭṭhasataṃ taṇhāvicaritāni
tika-s0302t:50_15: Upayogatthe hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Upādāyāti gahetvā. Asmīti hotīti yadetaṃ ajjhattikaṃ
tika-s0302t:50_16: khandhapañcakaṃ upādāya taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena samudāyaggāhato asmīti gāho hoti, tasmiṃ
tika-s0302t:50_17: satīti attho. Idha pana rūpādiārammaṇavasena attho veditabbo. Itthamasmīti hotīti
tika-s0302t:50_18: khattiyādīsu “idaṃpakāro aha”nti evaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena hotīti attho. Idaṃ tāva
tika-s0302t:51_0: Evamādīnīti ādi-saddena “evamasmi, aññathāsmi, ahaṃ bhavissaṃ, itthaṃ bhavissaṃ,
tika-s0302t:51_1: evaṃ bhavissaṃ, aññathā bhavissaṃ, asasmi, satasmi, ahaṃ siyaṃ, itthaṃ siyaṃ, evaṃ
tika-s0302t:51_2: siyaṃ, aññathā siyaṃ, apāhaṃ siyaṃ, apāhaṃ itthaṃ siyaṃ, apāhaṃ evaṃ siyaṃ, apāhaṃ
tika-s0302t:51_3: aññathā siya”nti etesaṃ saṅgaho. Upanidhāya gahaṇampi duvidhaṃ samato asamato vāti
tika-s0302t:51_4: taṃ dassetuṃ “evamasmi, aññathāsmī”ti ca vuttaṃ. Tattha evamasmīti idaṃ samato upanidhāya
tika-s0302t:51_5: gahaṇaṃ, yathā ayaṃ khattiyo, evaṃ ahamasmīti attho. Aññathāsmīti idaṃ pana asamato
tika-s0302t:51_6: gahaṇaṃ, yathāyaṃ khattiyo tato aññathā ahaṃ hīno vā adhiko vāti attho. Imāni tāva
tika-s0302t:51_7: paccuppannavasena cattāri taṇhāvicaritāni. Bhavissantiādīni pana cattāri anāgatavasena
tika-s0302t:51_8: vuttāni, tesaṃ purimacatukke vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. Asasmīti sassato asmi,
tika-s0302t:51_9: niccassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Satasmīti asassato asmi, aniccassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Iti imāni
tika-s0302t:51_10: dve sassatucchedavasena vuttāni. Ito parāni siyantiādīni cattāri saṃsayaparivitakkavasena
tika-s0302t:51_11: vuttāni, tāni purimacatukke vuttanayena atthato veditabbāni. Apāhaṃ siyantiādīni
tika-s0302t:51_12: pana cattāri “api nāmāhaṃ bhaveyya”nti evaṃ patthanākappanavasena vuttāni, tānipi
tika-s0302t:54_0: Ete hi sassatucchedavasena vuttā dve diṭṭhisīsā nāma, “asmi, bhavissaṃ siyaṃ, apāhaṃ
tika-s0302t:54_1: siya”nti ete cattāro suddhasīsā nāma, “itthamasmī”tiādayo tayo tayoti dvādasa sīsamūlakā
tika-s0302t:54_2: nāmāti veditabbaṃ. Idha pāḷiyaṃ rūpārammaṇādivasena taṇhā āgatāti āha “ajjhattikarūpādinissitānī”ti.
tika-s0302t:54_3: Aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritānīti ānetvā sambandho. Iminā asmīti iminā abhisekasenāpaccādinā
tika-s0302t:54_4: “khattiyo aha”nti mūlabhāvato “asmī”ti hoti. Sesaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:54_5: Saṅgaheti taṇhāya yathāvuttavibhāgassa saṃkhipanavasena saṅgaṇhane kariyamāne. “Chayime,
tika-s0302t:54_6: bhikkhave, taṇhākāyā”tiādi niddeso. “Rūpe taṇhā rūpataṇhā”tiādi niddesattho. “Kāmarāgabhāvenā”tiādiko,
tika-s0302t:55_0: Yasmā cakkhudvārādīsu ekekasmiṃ dvāre uppajjanakaviññāṇāni viya anekā eva vedanā,
tika-s0302t:55_1: tasmā tā rāsivasena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “cha vedanākāyā”ti vuttanti āha “vedanāsamūhā”ti.
tika-s0302t:55_2: Nissayabhāvena uppattidvārabhāvena nānāpaccayā honti cakkhudhātuādayo, tā kucchinā
tika-s0302t:55_3: dhārentiyo viya posentiyo viya ca hontīti tāsaṃ mātusadisatā vuttā. Cakkhusamphassahetūti
tika-s0302t:55_5: sādhāraṇato vuttā. Etthāti etasmiṃ vedanāpade. Sabbasaṅgāhikāti kusalākusalavipākakiriyānaṃ
tika-s0302t:55_6: vasena sabbasaṅgāhikā. Evaṃ vibhaṅge āgatanayena sādhāraṇato vatvāpi idhādhippetavedanameva
tika-s0302t:55_7: dassetuṃ “vipākavasena panā”tiādimāha. Cakkhumhi samphassoti cakkhumhi nissayabhūte
tika-s0302t:55_8: uppannaphasso. Esa nayo sesesu. Yasmā cakkhādīni visuddhimagge khandhaniddese lakkhaṇādivibhāgato,
tika-s0302t:55_9: āyatananiddese visesato, sāmaññato ca saddatthadassanādivasena vibhāvitāni, tasmā
tika-s0302t:56_0: Namanalakkhaṇanti ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ hutvā namanasabhāvaṃ tena vinā appavattanato.
tika-s0302t:56_1: Ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Vedanākkhandho pana ekāva vedanā. Sabbadubbalacittāni
tika-s0302t:56_2: nāma pañcaviññāṇāni. Nanu tattha jīvitacittaṭṭhitiyo ca santīti? Saccaṃ, tāsaṃ pana
tika-s0302t:56_3: kiccaṃ na tathā pākaṭaṃ, yathā cetanādīnanti te evettha pāḷiyaṃ uddhaṭā. Yena mahantapātubhāvādinā
tika-s0302t:56_4: kāraṇena. Etthāti etasmiṃ mahābhūtaniddese. Añño vinicchayanayoti “vacanatthato kalāpato”tiādinā
tika-s0302t:56_5: lakkhaṇādinicchayato añño vinicchayanayo. Nanu so catudhātuvavatthāne vutto, na rūpakkhandhaniddeseti?
tika-s0302t:56_7: vutto”ti vuttaṃ. Upādāyāti paṭicca. Bhūtāni hi paṭicca uppajjamānaṃ upādārūpaṃ “tāni
tika-s0302t:56_8: gahetvā”ti vuttaṃ avissajjanato. Nissāyātipi eke tesaṃ nissayapaccayabhāvato. Pubbakālakiriyā
tika-s0302t:56_9: nāma ekaṃsato aparakālakiriyāpekkhāti pāṭhasesena atthaṃ vadati. Vibhattivipallāsena
tika-s0302t:56_10: vinā eva atthaṃ dassetuṃ “samūhatthe vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Samūhasambandhe sāminiddesena
tika-s0302t:56_11: samūhattho dīpitoti taṃ dassento āha “samūhaṃ upādāyā”ti. Dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ āgatanayena
tika-s0302t:56_12: “tevīsatividha”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha hi hadayavatthu na niddiṭṭhaṃ, “yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāyā”ti
tika-s0302t:56_13: vā paṭṭhāne āgatattā hadayavatthumpi gahetvā jātirūpabhāvena upacayasantatiyo ekato
tika-s0302t:57_0: Cakkhussa viññāṇanti vā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Asādhāraṇakāraṇena cāyaṃ niddeso. “Saṅkhārapaccayā
tika-s0302t:58_2: vacīviññattiyā samuṭṭhāpanavasenāti attho. Evaṃ copanaṃ na bhaveyyāti dassetuṃ “raho
tika-s0302t:58_3: nisīditvā cintentassā”ti vuttaṃ. Ekūnatiṃsāti ettha abhiññācetanāvinimuttā eva ekūnatiṃsa
tika-s0302t:59_0: Dukkheti ekampi idaṃ bhummavacanaṃ saṃsilesananissayavisayabyāpanavasena attānaṃ
tika-s0302t:59_1: bhinditvā viniyogaṃ gacchatīti “catūhi kāraṇehī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ekopi hi vibhattiniddeso
tika-s0302t:59_2: anekadhā viniyogaṃ gacchati yathā taddhitatthe uttarapadasamāhāreti. Tanti aññāṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t:59_3: Dukkhasaccanti hadayavatthulakkhaṇaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ. Assāti aññāṇassa. Nissayapaccayabhāvenāti
tika-s0302t:59_5: vattabbā. Ārammaṇapaccayabhāvena dukkhasaccaṃ assa ārammaṇanti yojanā. Dukkhasaccanti
tika-s0302t:59_6: upayogaekavacanaṃ. Etanti aññāṇaṃ. Tassāti dukkhasaccassa. “Paṭicchādetī”ti ettha
tika-s0302t:59_9: vatvā “ñāṇapavattiyā cettha appadānenā”ti vuttanti vadanti. Purimaṃ pana paṭivedhañāṇuppattiyā
tika-s0302t:59_10: nisedhakathādassanaṃ, pacchimaṃ anubodhañāṇuppattiyā. Evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0302t:60_0: Sahajātassa aññāṇassa samudayasaccaṃ vatthu hoti nissayapaccayabhāvatoti vuttaṃ “vatthuto”ti.
tika-s0302t:60_1: Ārammaṇatoti ārammaṇapaccayabhāvena. Yasmā samudayasaccaṃ aññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0302t:60_2: tasmā “dukkhasamudaye aññāṇa”nti vuttanti attho. Paṭicchādanaṃ dukkhasacce vuttanayameva
tika-s0302t:60_3: ekeneva kāraṇena itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ asambhavato, kiṃ pana etaṃ ekaṃ kāraṇanti āha “paṭicchādanato”ti.
tika-s0302t:60_4: Idaṃ vitthārato vibhāvetuṃ “nirodhapaṭipadānaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tadārabbhāti taṃ
tika-s0302t:60_5: ārabbha taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā. Pacchimañhi saccadvayanti nirodho maggo. Tañhi nayagambhīrattā.
tika-s0302t:60_6: Duddasanti saṇhasukhumadhammattā sabhāveneva gambhīratāya duddasaṃ duviññeyyaṃ duravaggāhaṃ.
tika-s0302t:60_7: Tatthāti purime saccadvaye. Andhabhūtanti andhakārabhūtaṃ. Na pavattati ārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0302t:60_8: kātuṃ na visahati. Vacanīyattenāti vācakabhāvena tathā upaṭṭhānato. Sabhāvalakkhaṇassa
tika-s0302t:60_9: duddasattāti pīḷanādiāyūhanādivasena “idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ayaṃ samudayo”ti yāthāvato sabhāvalakkhaṇassa
tika-s0302t:60_10: duddasattā duviññeyyattā purimadvayaṃ gambhīraṃ. Tatthāti purimasmiṃ saccadvaye.
tika-s0302t:60_11: Vipallāsaggāhavasena pavattatīti subhādiviparītaggāhānaṃ paccayabhāvavasena aññāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0302t:61_0: Idāni “dukkhe aññāṇa”ntiādīsu pakārantarenapi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:61_1: Tattha dukkheti ettāvatāti “aññāṇanti vuccamānāya avijjāya dukkhe”ti ettakena. Saṅgahatoti
tika-s0302t:61_2: samodhānato. Kiccatoti asampaṭivedhakiccato. Aññāṇamivāti visayasabhāvaṃ yāthāvato
tika-s0302t:61_3: paṭivijjhituṃ appadānakiccamiva. “Dukkhe”tiādinā tattha avijjā pavattati, visesato
tika-s0302t:61_4: niddiṭṭhaṃ hotīti katvā sabbattheva tathā avisiṭṭhasabhāvadassanaṃ idanti dassetuṃ
tika-s0302t:62_0: Khaṇikanirodhassa idha anadhippetattā ayujjamānattā virāgaggahaṇato ca avijjādīnaṃ
tika-s0302t:62_1: paṭipakkhavasena paṭibāhanaṃ idha “nirodho”ti adhippeto, so ca nesaṃ sabbaso anuppajjanamevāti
tika-s0302t:62_2: āha “nirodho hotīti anuppādo hotī”ti. “Avijjā nirujjhati etthāti avijjānirodho, saṅkhārā
tika-s0302t:62_3: nirujjhanti etthāti saṅkhāranirodho”ti evaṃ sabbehi etehi nirodhapadehi nibbānassa
tika-s0302t:62_4: desitattā daṭṭhabbā. Tenāha “nibbānaṃ hī”tiādi. Vaṭṭavivaṭṭanti vaṭṭañca vivaṭṭañca.
tika-s0302t:62_5: “Dvādasahī”ti idaṃ paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ “anulomato dvādasahi padehi vaṭṭaṃ, paṭilomato
tika-s0302t:65_0: 3. Micchā paṭipajjati etāyāti micchāpaṭipadā, vaṭṭagāmimaggo dukkhāvahattā. Taṃ micchāpaṭipadaṃ.
tika-s0302t:65_1: Tenāha “aniyyānikapaṭipadā”ti. So puññābhisaṅkhāro kathaṃ micchāpaṭipadā hotīti?
tika-s0302t:65_2: Sampattibhave sukhāvahova hotīti adhippāyo. Vaṭṭasīsattāti vaṭṭapakkhiyānaṃ uttamaṅgabhāvato.
tika-s0302t:65_3: Antamasoti ukkaṃsapariyantaṃ sandhāya vadati avakaṃsapariyantato. “Idaṃ me puññaṃ
tika-s0302t:65_4: nibbānādhigamāya paccayo hotū”ti evaṃ nibbānaṃ patthetvā pavattitaṃ. Paṇṇamuṭṭhidānamattanti
tika-s0302t:65_5: sākapaṇṇamuṭṭhidānamattaṃ. Appatvāti antogadhahetu esa niddeso, apāpetvāti attho.
tika-s0302t:65_6: Yadaggena vā paṭipajjanato arahattaṃ pattoti vuccati, tadaggena tadāvahā paṭipadāpi
tika-s0302t:65_8: Paṭilomavasenāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Paṭipadā pucchitāti etena paṭipadā desetuṃ āraddhāti
tika-s0302t:65_9: ayampi attho saṅgahito yathāraddhassa atthassa kathetukamyatāpucchāya idhāgatattā.
tika-s0302t:65_11: sati hoti saṅkhārānaṃ asambhavoti vuttaṃ “nibbānaṃ bhājita”nti. Sarūpena pana tāya
tika-s0302t:65_12: vaṭṭameva pakāsitaṃ. Vakkhati hi pariyosāne “vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathita”nti. Niyyātaneti
tika-s0302t:65_13: nigamane. Phalenāti pattabbaphalena paṭipadāya sampāpakahetuno dassitattā. Yathā
tika-s0302t:65_14: hi tividho hetu ñāpako, nibbattako, sampāpakoti, evaṃ tividhaṃ phalaṃ ñāpetabbaṃ,
tika-s0302t:65_15: nibbattetabbaṃ, sampāpetabbanti. Tasmā pattabbaphalena nibbānena taṃsampāpakahetubhūtāya
tika-s0302t:65_16: paṭipadāya dassitattāti attho. Tenāha “phalena hetthā”tiādi. Ayaṃ vuccatīti evaṃ
tika-s0302t:65_17: nibbānaphalā ayaṃ “sammāpaṭipadā”ti vuccati. Asesavirāgā asesanirodhāti samucchedappahānavasena
tika-s0302t:65_18: avijjāya asesavirajjanato asesanirujjhanato ca. Padadvayenapi anuppādanirodhameva
tika-s0302t:65_19: vadati. Tañhi nibbānaṃ. Dutiyavikappe ayaṃ ettha adhippāyo – yena maggena karaṇabhūtena
tika-s0302t:65_20: asesanirodho hoti, avijjāya asesanirodho yaṃ āgamma hoti, taṃ maggaṃ dassetunti.
tika-s0302t:65_21: Evañhi satīti evaṃ padabhājanassa nibbānassa padatthe sati. Sānubhāvā paṭipadā vibhattā
tika-s0302t:65_22: hotīti avijjāya asesanirodhahetupaṭipadā tattha sātisayasāmatthiyasamāyogato sānubhāvā
tika-s0302t:65_23: vibhattā hoti. Micchāpaṭipadāgahaṇenettha vaṭṭassapi vibhattattā vuttaṃ “vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathita”nti.
tika-s0302t:68_0: 4. Vipphandantīti nimisanavasena. Animisehīti vigatanimisehi ummīlanteheva. Tena
tika-s0302t:68_1: vuttaṃ mahāpadāne. Etthāti etasmiṃ “vipassī”ti pade, etasmiṃ vā “animisehī”tiādike yathāgate suttante.
tika-s0302t:69_0: Mahāpurisassa animisalocanato “vipassī”ti samaññāpaṭilābhassa kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ
tika-s0302t:69_1: akāraṇaṃ aññesampi mahāsattānaṃ carimabhave animisalocanattāti codanaṃ sandhāya “ettha
tika-s0302t:69_2: cā”tiādiṃ vatvā tato pana aññameva kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Palāḷayamānassāti
tika-s0302t:69_3: tosentassa. Anādare cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Aṭṭassāti atthassa.
tika-s0302t:70_0: Puññussayasaṅkhāto bhago assa atisayena atthīti bhagavāti “bhāgyasampannassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:70_1: Sammāti sammadeva yāthāvato, ñāyena kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hotīti āha “nayena hetunā”ti.
tika-s0302t:70_2: Saṃ-saddo “sāma”nti iminā samānatthoti āha “sāmaṃ paccattapurisakārenā”ti, sayambhuñāṇenāti
tika-s0302t:70_3: attho. Sammā, sāmaṃ bujjhi etenāti sambodho vuccati maggañāṇaṃ, “bujjhati etenā”ti
tika-s0302t:70_4: katvā idha sabbaññutaññāṇassapi saṅgaho. Bodhimā satto bodhisatto, purimapade uttarapadalopo
tika-s0302t:70_6: bodhi ca so sattavisesayogato satto cāti bodhisatto. Patthayamāno pavattatīti “kudāssu
tika-s0302t:70_7: nāma mahantaṃ bodhiṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti sañjātacchando paṭipajjati. Dukkhanti jātiādimūlakaṃ
tika-s0302t:70_8: dukkhaṃ. Kāmaṃ cutupapātāpi maraṇajātiyo, “jāyati mīyatī”ti pana vatvā “cavati upapajjatī”ti
tika-s0302t:70_9: vacanaṃ na ekabhavapariyāpannānaṃ tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ, atha kho nānābhavapariyāpannānaṃ
tika-s0302t:70_10: ekajjhaṃ gahaṇanti dassento āha “idaṃ…pe… vutta”nti. Tassa nissaraṇanti tassa jarāmaraṇassa
tika-s0302t:70_11: nissaraṇanti vuccati. Yasmā mahāsatto jiṇṇabyādhimate disvā pabbajito, tasmāssa jarāmaraṇameva ādito upaṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0302t:71_0: Upāyamanasikārenāti upāyena vidhinā ñāyena manasikārena pathena manasikārassa pavattanato.
tika-s0302t:71_1: Samāyogo ahosīti yāthāvato paṭivijjhanavasena samāgamo ahosi. Yoniso manasikārāti
tika-s0302t:71_2: hetumhi nissakkavacananti tassa “yoniso manasikārenā”ti hetumhi karaṇavacanena āha.
tika-s0302t:71_3: Jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇanti “kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, kiṃ paccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti
tika-s0302t:71_4: jarāmaraṇe kāraṇaṃ pariggaṇhantassa bodhisattassa “yasmiṃ sati yaṃ hoti, asati ca
tika-s0302t:71_5: na hoti, taṃ tassa kāraṇa”nti evaṃ abyabhicārajātikāraṇapariggaṇhanena “jātiyā kho
tika-s0302t:71_6: sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti yā jarāmaraṇassa kāraṇapariggāhikā
tika-s0302t:71_7: paññā uppajji, tāya uppajjantiyā cassa abhisamayo paṭivedho ahosīti attho.
tika-s0302t:72_0: Itīti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. Hīti nipātamattaṃ. Idanti yathāvuttassa vaṭṭassa paccakkhato
tika-s0302t:72_1: gahaṇaṃ. Tenāha “evamida”nti. Idha avijjāya samudayassa āgatattā “ekādasasu ṭhānesū”ti
tika-s0302t:72_2: vuttaṃ. Samudayaṃ sampiṇḍetvāti saṅkhārādīnaṃ samudayaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā. Anekavārañhi
tika-s0302t:72_3: samudayadassanavasena ñāṇassa pavattattā “samudayo samudayo”ti āmeḍitavacanaṃ. Atha
tika-s0302t:72_4: vā “evaṃ samudayo hotī”ti idaṃ na kevalaṃ nibbattidassanaparaṃ, atha kho paṭiccasamuppādasaddo
tika-s0302t:72_5: viya paṭiccasamuppādamukhena idha samudayasaddo nibbattimukhena paccayattaṃ vadati.
tika-s0302t:72_6: Viññāṇādayo ca yāvanto idha paccayadhammā niddiṭṭhā, te sāmaññarūpena byāpanicchāvasena
tika-s0302t:72_7: gaṇhanto “samudayo samudayo”ti avoca. Tenāha “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārānaṃ samudayo
tika-s0302t:72_8: hotī”ti. Dassanaṭṭhena cakkhūti samudayassa paccakkhato dassanabhāvo cakkhu. Ñātaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0302t:72_10: dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo”ti pakārato vā jānanaṭṭhena. Paṭivedhanaṭṭhenāti “ayaṃ
tika-s0302t:72_11: avijjādi paccayadhammo imassa saṅkhārādikassa paccayabhāvato samudayo”ti paṭivijjhanaṭṭhena.
tika-s0302t:72_13: avabhāsanavasena. Taṃ panetaṃ “cakkhu”ntiādinā vuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Nirodhavāreti paṭilomavāre.
tika-s0302t:72_14: So hi “kissa nirodhā jarāmaraṇanirodho”ti nirodhakittanavasena āgato.
tika-s0302t:75_0: 5-10. Na evaṃ yojetvāti “sikhissapī”tiādinā samuccayavasena evaṃ na yojetvā. Kasmātiādinā
tika-s0302t:75_1: tattha kāraṇaṃ vadati. Ekāsane adesitattāti vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “nānāṭhānesu
tika-s0302t:75_2: hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yadipi tāni visuṃ visuṃ vuttabhāvena desitāni, atthavaṇṇanā pana
tika-s0302t:75_3: ekasadisā tadatthassa abhinnattā. “Buddhā jātā”ti na añño ācikkhatīti yojanā. Na
tika-s0302t:75_4: hi mahābodhisattānaṃ pacchimabhave paropadesena payojanaṃ atthi. Gatamaggenevāti
tika-s0302t:75_5: paṭipattigamanena gatamaggeneva pacchimamahābodhisattā gacchanti, ayamettha dhammatā.
tika-s0302t:75_6: Gacchantīti catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu patiṭṭhitacittā satta bojjhaṅge yāthāvato bhāvetvā
tika-s0302t:75_7: sammāsambodhiyā abhisambujjhanavasena pavattantīti attho. Yathā pana tesaṃ paṭhamavipassanābhiniveso
tika-s0302t:75_8: hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “sabbabodhisattā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Buddhabhāvānaṃ vipassanā, buddhatthāya
tika-s0302t:80_0: 11. Āharantīti ānenti uppādenti, upatthambhentīti attho. Nibbattāti pasutā. Bhūtā
tika-s0302t:80_1: nāma yasmā tato paṭṭhāya loke jātavohāro paṭisandhiggahaṇato pana paṭṭhāya yāva mātukucchito
tika-s0302t:80_2: nikkhanto, tāva sambhavesino, esa tāva gabbhaseyyakesu bhūtasambhavesivibhāgo, itaresu
tika-s0302t:80_3: pana paṭhamacittādivasena vutto. Sambhava-saddo cettha gabbhaseyyakānaṃ vasena pasūtipariyāyo,
tika-s0302t:80_4: itaresaṃ vasena uppattipariyāyo. Paṭhamacittapaṭhamairiyāpathakkhaṇesu hi te sambhavaṃ
tika-s0302t:80_5: uppattiṃ esanti upagacchanti nāma, na tāva bhūtā upapattiyā na suppatiṭṭhitattā,
tika-s0302t:80_6: bhūtā eva sabbaso bhavesanāya samucchinnattā. Na puna bhavissantīti avadhāraṇena
tika-s0302t:80_7: nivattitamatthaṃ dasseti. Yo ca “kālaghaso bhūto”tiādīsu bhūta-saddassa khīṇāsavavācitā
tika-s0302t:80_8: daṭṭhabbā. Vā-saddo cettha sampiṇḍanattho “agginā vā udakena vā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0302t:81_0: Yathāsakaṃ paccayabhāvena attabhāvassa paṭhapanamevettha āhārehi kātabbaanuggaho
tika-s0302t:81_1: hotīti adhippāyenāha “vacanabhedo…pe… eko yevā”ti. Sattassa uppannadhammānanti sattassa
tika-s0302t:81_2: santāne uppannadhammānaṃ. Yathā “vassasataṃ tiṭṭhatī”ti vutte anuppabandhavasena
tika-s0302t:81_3: pavattatīti vuttaṃ hoti, evaṃ ṭhitiyāti anuppabandhavasena pavattiyāti attho, sā
tika-s0302t:81_4: pana avicchedoti āha “avicchedāyā”ti. Anuppabandhadhammuppattiyā sattasantāno anuggahito
tika-s0302t:81_5: nāma hotīti āha “anuppannānaṃ uppādāyā”ti. Etānīti ṭhitianuggahapadāni. Ubhayattha
tika-s0302t:82_0: Vatthugatā ojā vatthu viya tena saddhiṃ ajjhoharitabbataṃ gacchatīti vuttaṃ “ajjhoharitabbako
tika-s0302t:82_1: āhāro”ti, nibbattitaojaṃ pana sandhāya “kabaḷīkāro āhāro ojaṭṭhamakarūpāni āharatī”ti
tika-s0302t:82_2: vakkhati. Oḷārikatā appojatāya na vatthuno thūlatāya kathinatāya vā, tasmā yasmiṃ
tika-s0302t:82_3: vatthusmiṃ parittā ojā hoti, taṃ oḷārikaṃ. Sappādayo dukkhuppādakatāya oḷārikā veditabbā.
tika-s0302t:82_4: Visāṇādīnaṃ tivassachaḍḍitānaṃ pūtibhūtattā mudukatāti vadanti. Taracchakheḷatemitatāya
tika-s0302t:82_5: pana tathābhūtānaṃ tesaṃ mudukatā. Dhammasabhāvo hesa. Sasānaṃ āhāro sukhumo taruṇatiṇasassakhādanato.
tika-s0302t:82_6: Sakuṇānaṃ āhāro sukhumo tiṇabījādikhādanato. Paccantavāsīnaṃ āhāro sukhumo māsamuggakurādibhojanattā.
tika-s0302t:82_7: Tesanti paranimmitavasavattīnaṃ. Sukhumotvevāti na kiñci upādāya, atha kho sukhumoicceva
tika-s0302t:83_0: Vatthuvasena panettha āhārassa oḷārikasukhumatā vuttā, sā cassa appojamahojatāhi
tika-s0302t:83_1: veditabbāti dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādimāha. Parissayanti khudāvasena uppannaṃ vihiṃsaṃ
tika-s0302t:83_2: sarīradarathaṃ. Vinodetīti vatthu tassa vinodanamattaṃ karoti. Na pana sakkoti pāletunti
tika-s0302t:83_3: sarīraṃ yāpetuṃ nappahoti nirojattā. Na sakkoti parissayaṃ vinodetuṃ āmāsayassa apūraṇato.
tika-s0302t:84_0: Chabbidhopīti iminā kassaci phassassa anavasesitabbatamāha. Desanakkamenevettha phassādīnaṃ
tika-s0302t:84_1: dutiyāditā, na aññena kāraṇenāti āha “desanānayo eva cesā”tiādi. Manaso sañcetanā
tika-s0302t:84_2: na sattassāti dassanatthaṃ manogahaṇaṃ yathā “cittassa ṭhiti, cetovimutti cā”ti āha
tika-s0302t:84_3: “manosañcetanāti cetanāvā”ti. Cittanti yaṃ kiñci cittameva. Ekarāsiṃ katvāti ekajjhaṃ
tika-s0302t:84_4: gahetvā vibhāgaṃ akatvā, sāmaññena gahitāti attho. Tattha labbhamānaṃ upādiṇṇakādivibhāgaṃ
tika-s0302t:84_5: dassetuṃ “kabaḷīkāro āhāro”tiādi vuttaṃ. Āhāratthaṃ na sādhentīti tādisassa āhārassa
tika-s0302t:84_6: anāharaṇato. Tadāpīti bhijjitvā vigatakālepi. Upādiṇṇakāhāroti vuccantīti keci. Idaṃ
tika-s0302t:84_7: pana ācariyānaṃ na ruccati tadā upādiṇṇakarūpasseva abhāvato. Paṭisandhicitteneva
tika-s0302t:84_8: sahajātāti lakkhaṇavacanametaṃ, sabbāyapi kammajarūpapariyāpannāya ojāya atthibhāvassa
tika-s0302t:84_9: avicchedappavattisambhavadassanattho. Sattamāti uppannadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva sattamadivasāpi.
tika-s0302t:84_10: Rūpasantatiṃ pāleti paveṇighaṭanavasena. Ayamevāti kammajaojā. Kammajaojaṃ pana paṭicca
tika-s0302t:84_11: uppannaojā akammajattā anupādiṇṇaāhārotveva veditabbo. Anupādiṇṇakā phassādayo veditabbāti
tika-s0302t:84_12: ānetvā sambandho. Lokuttarā phassādayo kathanti āha “lokuttarā pana ruḷhīvasena kathitā”ti.
tika-s0302t:84_13: Yasmā tesaṃ kusalānaṃ upetapariyāyo natthi, tasmā vipākānaṃ upādiṇṇapariyāyo natthevāti
tika-s0302t:85_0: Pubbe “āhārāti paccayā”ti vuttattā yadi paccayaṭṭho āhāraṭṭhotiādinā codeti, atha
tika-s0302t:85_1: kasmā ime eva cattāro vuttāti atha kasmā cattārova vuttā. Ime eva ca vuttāti yojanā.
tika-s0302t:85_2: Visesappaccayattāti etena yathā aññe paccayadhammā attano paccayuppannassa paccayāva
tika-s0302t:85_3: honti, ime pana tathā ca hoti aññathā cāti samānepi paccayatte atirekapaccayā honti,
tika-s0302t:85_4: tasmā “āhārāti vuttā”ti imamatthaṃ dasseti. Idāni taṃ atirekapaccayataṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0302t:85_5: “visesapaccayo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Visesappaccayo rūpakāyassa kabaḷīkāro āhāro upathambhakabhāvato.
tika-s0302t:85_6: Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “rūpārūpānaṃ upathambhakattena upakārakā cattāro āhārā āhārapaccayo”ti.
tika-s0302t:85_7: Upathambhakattañhi satīpi janakatte arūpīnaṃ āhārānaṃ āhārajarūpasamuṭṭhānakarūpāhārassa
tika-s0302t:85_8: ca hoti, asati pana upathambhakatte āhārānaṃ janakattaṃ natthīti upathambhakattaṃ
tika-s0302t:85_9: padhānaṃ. Janayamānopi hi āhāro avicchedavasena upathambhayamāno eva janetīti upathambhakabhāvo
tika-s0302t:85_10: eva āhārabhāvo. Vedanāya phasso visesapaccayo. “Phassapaccayā vedanā”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:85_12: bhavaṃ janetī”ti hi vuttaṃ. “Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti pana vacanato nāmarūpassa
tika-s0302t:85_13: viññāṇaṃ visesapaccayo. Na hi okkantaviññāṇābhāve nāmarūpassa atthi sambhavo. Yathāha
tika-s0302t:85_14: “viññāṇañca hi, ānanda, mātukucchismiṃ na okkamissatha, api nu kho nāmarūpaṃ mātukucchismiṃ
tika-s0302t:86_0: Evaṃ yadipi paccayattho āhārattho, visesapaccayattā pana imeva āhārāti vuttāti taṃ
tika-s0302t:86_1: nesaṃ visesapaccayataṃ avibhāgato dassetvā idāni vibhāgato dassetuṃ “ko panetthā”tiādi
tika-s0302t:86_2: āraddhaṃ. Mukhe ṭhapitamatto eva asaṅkhādito, tattakenāpi abbhantarassa āhārassa
tika-s0302t:86_3: paccayo hoti eva. Tenāha “aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpetī”ti. Sukhavedanāya hito sukhavedanīyo.
tika-s0302t:86_4: Sabbathāpīti cakkhusamphassādivasena. Yattakā phassassa pakārabhedā, tesaṃ vasena
tika-s0302t:86_5: sabbappakāropi phassāhāro yathārahaṃ tisso vedanā āharati, anāhārako natthi.
tika-s0302t:87_0: Sabbathāpīti idhāpi phassāhāre vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo. Tisantativasenāti
tika-s0302t:87_3: paccayo hontoyeva āhārapaccayatāya taṃ āhāreti vuttaṃ, sahajātarūpesu pana vatthuno
tika-s0302t:87_5: ṭhapetvā itaresaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena yojanā kātabbā. Tānīti napuṃsakaniddeso anapuṃsakānampi
tika-s0302t:87_6: napuṃsakehi saha vacanato. Sāsavakusalākusalacetanāva vuttā visesapaccayabhāvadassanaṃ
tika-s0302t:87_7: hetanti, tenāha “avisesena panā”tiādi. Paṭisandhiviññāṇameva vuttanti etthāpi eseva
tika-s0302t:87_8: nayo. Yathā tassa tassa phalassa visesato paccayatāya etesaṃ āhārattho, evaṃ avisesatopīti
tika-s0302t:88_0: Upatthambhento āhārakiccaṃ sādhetīti upatthambhento eva rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, ojaṭṭhamakasamuṭṭhāpaneneva
tika-s0302t:88_1: panassa upathambhanakiccasiddhi. Phusantoyevāti phusanakiccaṃ karonto eva. Āyūhamānāvāti
tika-s0302t:88_2: cetayamānā eva abhisandahantī eva. Vijānantamevāti upapattiparikappanavasena vijānantameva
tika-s0302t:88_3: āhārakiccaṃ sādhetīti yojanā. Sabbattha āhārakiccasādhanañca tesaṃ vedanādiuppattihetutāya
tika-s0302t:88_4: attabhāvassa pavattanameva. Kāyaṭṭhapanenāti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu kammajādirūpaṃ kammādināva
tika-s0302t:89_1: hotīti “dvinnaṃ rūpasantatīna”nti vuttaṃ. Upatthambhanameva sandhāya “anupālako hutvā”ti
tika-s0302t:89_2: ca vuttaṃ. Rūpakāyassa ṭhitihetutā hi yāpanā anupālanā. Sukhādivatthubhūtanti sukhādīnaṃ
tika-s0302t:89_3: pavattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ. Ārammaṇampi hi vasati ettha ārammaṇakaraṇavasena tadārammaṇā
tika-s0302t:89_4: dhammāti vatthūti vuccati. Phusantoyevāti idaṃ phassassa phusanasabhāvattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:89_5: Na hi dhammānaṃ sabhāvena vinā pavatti atthi, vedanāpavattiyā vinā sattānaṃ sandhāvanatā
tika-s0302t:89_6: natthīti āha “sukhādi…pe… hotī”ti. Na cettha saññībhavakathāyaṃ asaññībhavo dassetabbo,
tika-s0302t:89_7: tassāpi vā kāraṇabhūtavedanāpavattivaseneva ṭhitiyā hetuno abyāpitattā, tathā hi
tika-s0302t:89_8: “manosañcetanā…pe… bhavamūlanipphādanato sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hotī”ti vuttā. Tato eva
tika-s0302t:90_0: Cattāri bhayāni daṭṭhabbāni ādīnavavibhāvanato. Nikantīti nikāmanā, rasataṇhaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0302t:90_1: vadati. Sā hi kabaḷīkāre āhāre balavatī, tenevettha avadhāraṇaṃ kataṃ. Bhāyati etasmāti
tika-s0302t:90_2: bhayaṃ, nikantiyeva bhayaṃ mahānatthahetuto. Upagamanaṃ visayindriyaviññāṇesu visayaviññāṇesu
tika-s0302t:90_3: ca saṅgativasena pavatti, taṃ vedanādiuppattihetutāya “bhaya”nti vuttaṃ. Avadhāraṇe
tika-s0302t:90_4: payojanaṃ vuttanayameva. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo. Āyūhanaṃ abhisandahanaṃ, saṃvidhānantipi
tika-s0302t:90_5: vadanti. Taṃ bhavūpapattihetutāya “bhaya”nti vuttaṃ. Abhinipāto tattha tattha bhave
tika-s0302t:90_6: paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena viññāṇassa nibbatti. So bhavūpapattihetukānaṃ sabbesaṃ anatthānaṃ
tika-s0302t:90_7: mūlakāraṇatāya “bhaya”nti vuttaṃ. Idāni nikantiādīnaṃ sappaṭibhayataṃ vitthārato
tika-s0302t:90_8: dassetuṃ “kiṃ kāraṇā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha nikantiṃ katvāti ālayaṃ janetvā, taṇhaṃ
tika-s0302t:90_9: uppādetvāti attho. Sītādīnaṃ purakkhatāti sītādīnaṃ purato ṭhitā, sītādīhi bādhiyamānāti attho.
tika-s0302t:91_0: Phassaṃ upagacchantāti cakkhusamphassādibhedaṃ phassaṃ pavattentā. Phassassādinoti
tika-s0302t:91_1: kāyasamphassavasena phoṭṭhabbasaṅkhātassa assādanasīlā. Kāyasamphassavasena hi sattānaṃ
tika-s0302t:91_2: phoṭṭhabbataṇhā pavattatīti dassetuṃ phassāhārādīnavadassane phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ uddhaṭaṃ
tika-s0302t:91_4: Sati hi phassāhāre sattānaṃ phassārammaṇe assādo, nāsati, tenāha “phassassādamūlaka”ntiādi.
tika-s0302t:92_0: Jātinimittassa bhayassa abhinipātasabhāvena gahitattā “tammūlaka”nti vuttaṃ. Kammāyūhananimittanti
tika-s0302t:92_1: attho. Bhayaṃ sabbanti pañcavīsati, tividhamahābhayaṃ, aññañca sabbabhayaṃ āgatameva
tika-s0302t:93_0: Abhinipatatīti abhinibbattati. Paṭhamābhinibbatti hi sattānaṃ tattha tattha aṅgārakāsusadise
tika-s0302t:93_1: bhave abhinipātasadisī. Tammūlakattāti nāmarūpanibbattimūlakattā. Sabbabhayānaṃ abhinipātoyeva
tika-s0302t:94_0: Appeti viyāti phalassa attalābhahetubhāvato kāraṇaṃ, taṃ niyyādeti viya. Tanti phalaṃ.
tika-s0302t:94_1: Tatoti kāraṇato. Etesanti āhārānaṃ. Yathāvuttenāti “phalaṃ nidetī”tiādinā vuttappakārena
tika-s0302t:95_0: Paṭisandhiṃ ādiṃ katvāti paṭisandhikkhaṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā. Upādiṇṇakaāhāre sandhāya “attabhāvasaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-s0302t:95_1: āhārāna”nti vuttaṃ. Te hi nippariyāyato taṇhānidānā. Paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃ sattānaṃ
tika-s0302t:95_2: sattasantativasenāti paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃ sabhāvakānaṃ cakkhu sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhā kāyo
tika-s0302t:95_3: bhāvo vatthūti imesaṃ sattannaṃ santatīnaṃ vasena. Sesānaṃ aparipuṇṇāyatanānaṃ andhabadhiraabhāvakānaṃ.
tika-s0302t:95_4: Ūnaūnasantativasenāti cakkhunā, sotena, tadubhayena, bhāvena ca ūnaūnasantativasena.
tika-s0302t:95_5: Paṭisandhiyaṃ jātā paṭisandhikā. Paṭhamabhavaṅgacittakkhaṇādīti ādi-saddena tadārammaṇacittassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0302t:96_0: Taṇhāyapi nidānaṃ jānātīti yojanā. Taṇhānidānantipi pāṭho. Vaṭṭaṃ dassetvāti sarūpato
tika-s0302t:96_1: nayato ca sakalameva vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā. Idāni tamatthaṃ vitthārato vibhāvetuṃ “imasmiñca
tika-s0302t:96_2: pana ṭhāne”tiādimāha. Atītābhimukhaṃ desanaṃ katvāti paccuppannabhavato paṭṭhāya
tika-s0302t:96_3: atītadhammābhimukhaṃ tabbisayaṃ desanaṃ katvā tathākāraṇena. Atītena vaṭṭaṃ dassetīti
tika-s0302t:96_4: atītabhavena kammakilesavipākavaṭṭaṃ dasseti. Attabhāvoti paccuppanno attabhāvo.
tika-s0302t:96_5: Yadi evaṃ kasmā “atītena vaṭṭaṃ dassetī”ti vuttanti? Nāyaṃ doso “atītenevā”ti anavadhāraṇato,
tika-s0302t:96_6: evañca katvā atītābhimukhaggahaṇaṃ janakakammaṃ gahitaṃ, taṇhāsīsena nānantariyabhāvato.
tika-s0302t:96_7: Na hi kammunā vinā taṇhā bhavanetti yujjati.
tika-s0302t:97_0: Taṃ kammanti taṇhāsīsena vuttakammaṃ. Dassetunti taṃ atītaṃ attabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ.
tika-s0302t:97_1: Tassattabhāvassa janakaṃ kammanti tassa yathāvuttassa attabhāvassa janakaṃ. Tato
tika-s0302t:97_2: parampi attabhāvaṃ āyūhitaṃ kammaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Avijjā ca nāma taṇhā viya kammattāti
tika-s0302t:97_3: kammasseva gahaṇaṃ. Dvīsu ṭhānesūti āhāraggahaṇena vedanādiggahaṇenāti dvīsu ṭhānesu.
tika-s0302t:97_4: Attabhāvoti paccuppannakāliko atītakāliko ca attabhāvo. Puna dvīsūti taṇhāggahaṇe
tika-s0302t:97_5: avijjāsaṅkhāraggahaṇeti dvīsu ṭhānesu. Tassa janakanti paccuppannassa ceva atītassa
tika-s0302t:97_6: ca attabhāvassa janakaṃ kammaṃ vuttanti yojanā. Kammaggahaṇena cettha yattha taṃ
tika-s0302t:97_7: kammaṃ āyūhitaṃ, sā atītā jāti atthato dassitā hoti. Tena saṃsāravaṭṭassa anamataggataṃ
tika-s0302t:97_8: dīpeti. Saṅkhepenāti saṅkhepena hetupañcakaphalapañcakaggahaṇampi hi saṅkhepo eva
tika-s0302t:98_0: Yadi atītena vaṭṭaṃ dassitaṃ, evaṃ sati sappadesā paṭiccasamuppādadhammadesanā hotīti
tika-s0302t:98_1: dassento “tatrāya”ntiādimāha. Tena hi yadipi sarūpato anāgatena vaṭṭaṃ idha na dassitaṃ,
tika-s0302t:98_2: nayato pana tassapi dassitattā nippadesā eva paṭiccasamuppādadesanāti dasseti. Idāni
tika-s0302t:98_3: tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Udakapiṭṭhe nipannanti udakaṃ
tika-s0302t:98_4: pariplavavasena nipannaṃ. Parabhāganti parauttamaṅgabhāgaṃ. Oratoti tato aparabhāgato
tika-s0302t:98_5: olokento. Aparipuṇṇoti vikalāvayavo. Evaṃsampadantiādi upamāya saṃsandanaṃ.
tika-s0302t:99_0: Yathā hi gīvā sarīrasandhārakakaṇḍarānaṃ mūlaṭṭhānabhūtā, evaṃ attabhāvasandhārakānaṃ
tika-s0302t:99_1: saṅkhārānaṃ mūlabhūtā taṇhāti vuttaṃ “gīvāya diṭṭhakālo”ti. Yathā vedanādianekāvayavasamudāyabhūto
tika-s0302t:99_3: tassa diṭṭhakālo”ti vuttaṃ. Taṇhāsaṅkhātanti taṇhāya kathitaṃ. Idha desanāya paccayā
tika-s0302t:99_4: avijjāsaṅkhārā veditabbāti “naṅguṭṭhamūlassa diṭṭhakālo viyā”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi
tika-s0302t:99_5: pariyosāne “naṅguṭṭhamūlaṃ passeyyā”ti upamādassanaṃ kataṃ. Nayato paripuṇṇabhāvaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0302t:99_6: veditabbaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ anāgatassāpi paccayavaṭṭassa hetuvasena phalavasena vā paripuṇṇabhāvassa
tika-s0302t:99_7: mukhamattadassanīyattā ādito phalahetusandhi, majjhe hetuphalasandhi, antepi phalahetusandhīti
tika-s0302t:102_0: 12. Imasmiṃyeva ṭhāneti “cattārome bhikkhu…pe… āhārā”ti evaṃ cattāro āhāre sarūpato
tika-s0302t:102_1: dassetvā “ime kho bhikkhave…pe… anuggahāyā”ti nigamanavasena dassite imasmiṃyeva
tika-s0302t:102_2: ṭhāne. Desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi catuāhāravibhāgadīpakaṃ desanaṃ uddesavaseneva niṭṭhāpesi,
tika-s0302t:102_3: upari āvajjetvā tuṇhī nisīdi. Diṭṭhigatikoti attadiṭṭhivasena diṭṭhigatiko. Varagandhavāsitanti
tika-s0302t:102_4: sabhāvasiddhena candanagandhena ceva tadaññanānāgandhena ca paribhāvitattā varagandhavāsitaṃ.
tika-s0302t:102_6: yathādesitāya desanāya anusandhiṃ ghaṭento, yathā uparidesanā vaddheyya, evaṃ ussāhaṃ
tika-s0302t:102_7: karonto. Viññāṇāhāraṃ āhāretīti tassa āhāraṇakiriyāya vuttapucchāya taṃ diṭṭhigataṃ
tika-s0302t:103_0: Viññāṇāhāre nāma icchite tassa upabhuñjakenapi bhavitabbaṃ, so “ko nu kho”ti ayaṃ
tika-s0302t:103_1: pucchāya adhippāyo. Utusamayeti gabbhavuṭṭhānasamaye. So hi utusamayassa mattakasamayattā
tika-s0302t:103_2: tathā vutto. “Udakena aṇḍāni mā nassantū”ti mahāsamuddato nikkhamitvā. Gijjhapotakā
tika-s0302t:103_3: viya āhārasañcetanāya tāni kacchapaṇḍāni manosañcetanāhārena yāpentīti ayaṃ tassa
tika-s0302t:103_4: therassa laddhi. Kiñcāpi ayaṃ laddhīti phassamanosañcetanāhāresu kiñcāpi therassa
tika-s0302t:103_5: yuttā ayuttā vā ayaṃ laddhi. Imaṃ pañhanti “ko nu kho, bhante, viññāṇāhāraṃ āhāretī”ti
tika-s0302t:103_6: imaṃ pañhaṃ etāya yathāvuttāya laddhiyā na pana pucchati, atha kho sattupaladdhiyā
tika-s0302t:103_7: pucchatīti adhippāyo. Soti diṭṭhigatiko. Na niggahetabbo ummattakasadisattā adhippāyaṃ
tika-s0302t:103_8: ajānitvā pucchāya katattā. Tenāha “āhāretīti nāhaṃ vadāmī”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:104_0: Tasmiṃ mayā evaṃ vutteti tasmiṃ vacane mayā “āhāretī”ti evaṃ vutte sati. Ayaṃ pañhoti
tika-s0302t:104_1: “ko nu kho, bhante, viññāṇāhāraṃ āhāretī”ti ayaṃ pañho yutto bhaveyya. Evaṃ pucchite
tika-s0302t:104_2: pañheti sattupaladdhiṃ anādāya “katamassa dhammassa paccayo”ti evaṃ dhammapavattavaseneva
tika-s0302t:104_3: pañhe pucchite. Teneva viññāṇenāti teneva paṭisandhiviññāṇena saha uppannaṃ nāmañca
tika-s0302t:104_4: rūpañca atītabhave diṭṭhigatikassa vasena āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattīti idhādhippetaṃ.
tika-s0302t:104_5: Nāmarūpe jāte satīti nāmarūpe nibbatte tappaccayabhūtaṃ bhinditvā saḷāyatanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0302t:105_0: Tatrāyaṃ paccayavibhāgo – nāmanti vedanādikhandhattayaṃ idhādhippetaṃ, rūpaṃ pana
tika-s0302t:105_1: sattasantatipariyāpannaṃ, niyamato cattāri bhūtāni cha vatthūni jīvitindriyaṃ āhāro
tika-s0302t:105_2: ca. Tattha vipākanāmaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe hadayavatthuno sahāyo hutvā chaṭṭhassa manāyatanassa
tika-s0302t:105_4: Kiñci panettha hetupaccayena kiñci āhārapaccayenāti evaṃ ukkaṃsāvakaṃso veditabbo.
tika-s0302t:105_5: Itaresaṃ pana pañcāyatanānaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ sahāyo hutvā sahajātanissayavipākavippayuttaatthiavigatavasena
tika-s0302t:105_6: chadhā paccayo hoti. Kiñci panettha hetupaccayena kiñci āhārapaccayenāti sabbaṃ purimasadisaṃ.
tika-s0302t:105_7: Pavatte vipākanāmaṃ vipākassa chaṭṭhāyatanassa vuttanayena sattadhā paccayo hoti,
tika-s0302t:105_8: avipākaṃ pana avipākassa chaṭṭhassa tato vipākapaccayaṃ apanetvā paccayo hoti. Cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ
tika-s0302t:105_9: pana paccuppannaṃ cakkhupasādādivatthukampi itarampi vipākanāmaṃ pacchājātavippayuttaatthiavigatapaccayehi
tika-s0302t:105_10: catudhā paccayo hoti, tathā avipākampi veditabbaṃ. Rūpato pana vatthurūpaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ
tika-s0302t:105_12: hoti. Cattāri pana bhūtāni cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ sahajātanissayaatthiavigatapaccayehi
tika-s0302t:105_13: catudhā paccayo hoti. Rūpajīvitaṃ atthiavigatindriyavasena tidhā paccayo hotīti ayañhettha
tika-s0302t:106_0: Pañhassa okāsaṃ dentoti “ko nu kho, bhante, phusatī”ti imassa diṭṭhigatikapañhassa
tika-s0302t:106_1: okāsaṃ dento. Tato vivecetukāmoti adhippāyo. Sabbapadesūti diṭṭhigatikena bhagavatā
tika-s0302t:106_2: ca vuttapadesu. Sattoti attā. So pana ucchedavādinopi yāva na ucchijjati, tāva atthevāti
tika-s0302t:106_3: laddhi, pageva sassatavādino. Bhūtoti vijjamāno. Nipphattoti nipphanno. Na tassa
tika-s0302t:106_4: dāni nipphādetabbaṃ kiñci atthīti laddhi. Idappaccayā idanti imasmā viññāṇāhārapaccayā
tika-s0302t:106_5: idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ. Puna idappaccayā idanti imasmā nāmarūpapaccayā idaṃ saḷāyatananti
tika-s0302t:106_6: evaṃ bahūsu ṭhānesu bhagavatā kathitattā yathā paccayato nibbattaṃ saṅkhāramattamidanti
tika-s0302t:106_7: saññattiṃ upagato. Tenāpīti saññattupagatenāpi. Ekābaddhaṃ katvāti yathā pucchāya
tika-s0302t:106_8: avasaro na hoti, tathā ekābaddhaṃ katvā. Desanāruḷhanti yato saḷāyatanapadato paṭṭhāya
tika-s0302t:106_11: evaṃ desite, “vineyyajano paṭivijjhatī”ti evamāha. Viññāṇāhāro āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiyāti
tika-s0302t:106_12: evaṃ purimabhavato āyatibhavassa paccayavasena mūlakāraṇavasena ca desitattā “viññāṇanāmarūpānaṃ
tika-s0302t:106_13: antare eko sandhī”ti vuttaṃ. Tadaminā viññāṇaggahaṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassāpi gahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:109_0: 13. Ye paccayasamavāye tenattabhāvena saccāni paṭivijjhituṃ samatthā, te bāhirakaliṅge
tika-s0302t:109_1: ṭhitāpi teneva tattha samatthatāyogena bhāvinaṃ samitabāhitapāpataṃ apekkhitvā samaṇasammatāyeva
tika-s0302t:109_2: brāhmaṇasammatāyevāti te nivattetuṃ “saccāni paṭivijjhituṃ asamatthā”ti vuttaṃ. Dukkhasaccavasenāti
tika-s0302t:109_3: dukkhaariyasaccavasena. Aññathā kathaṃ bāhirakāpi jarāmaraṇaṃ dukkhanti na jānanti.
tika-s0302t:109_4: Saccadesanābhāvato “saha taṇhāyā”ti vuttanti keci. Taṃ na suṭṭhu. Yasmā tattha tattha
tika-s0302t:109_5: bhave paṭhamābhinibbatti, idha jātīti adhippetā, sā ca taṇhā eva santānena, taṇheva
tika-s0302t:109_6: sā jāti. Jarāmaraṇañcettha pākaṭameva adhippetaṃ, na khaṇikaṃ, tasmā sataṇhā eva
tika-s0302t:109_7: jātijarāmaraṇassa samudayoti bhūtakathanametaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Samudayasaccavasena na
tika-s0302t:109_8: jānantīti yojanā. Esa nayo sesapadesupi. Sabbapadesūti yattha taṇhā visesanabhāvena
tika-s0302t:109_9: vattabbā, tesu sabbapadesu. Yena samannāgatattā puggalo paramatthato samaṇo brāhmaṇoti
tika-s0302t:109_10: vuccati, taṃ sāmaññaṃ brahmaññañcāti āha “ariya…pe… brahmaññañcā”ti. Yena hi pavattinimittena
tika-s0302t:109_11: samaṇa-saddo brāhmaṇa-saddo ca sake atthe niruḷho, tassa vasena abhinnopi veneyyajjhāsayato
tika-s0302t:109_12: dvidhā katvā vattuṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ “ubhayatthāpī”ti. Ekādasasu ṭhānesu cattāri
tika-s0302t:112_0: 14. Ime dhamme katame dhammeti ca ettha iti-saddo ādiattho. Tena “imesaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0302t:112_1: katamesaṃ dhammāna”nti imesaṃ padānaṃ saṅgaho. Etāni hi padāni jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvena
tika-s0302t:112_2: vuttāni imissā desanāya papañcabhūtānīti āha “ettakaṃ papañcaṃ katvā kathitaṃ, desanaṃ…pe…
tika-s0302t:112_3: ajjhāsayenā”ti. Iminā tāneva jarāmaraṇādīni gahetvā puggalajjhāsayavasena ādito “ime
tika-s0302t:112_4: dhamme”tiādinā sabbapadasādhāraṇato desanā āraddhā. Yathānulomasāsanañhi suttantadesanā,
tika-s0302t:115_0: 15. Yasmā idha jānantāpi “sammādiṭṭhī”ti vadanti ajānantāpi bāhirakāpi sāsanikāpi
tika-s0302t:115_1: anussavādivasenapi attapaccakkhenapi, tasmā taṃ bahūnaṃ vacanaṃ upādāya āmeḍitavasena
tika-s0302t:115_3: hissa ayaṃ āmeḍitapayogo. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – “aparehipi sammādiṭṭhīti vuccati,
tika-s0302t:115_4: sā panāyaṃ evaṃ vuccamānā atthañca lakkhaṇañca upādāya kittāvatā nu kho, bhante,
tika-s0302t:115_5: sammādiṭṭhi hotī”ti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sammādiṭṭhī”ti vacane yasmā viññū eva pamāṇaṃ,
tika-s0302t:115_6: na aviññū, tasmā “yaṃ paṇḍitā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Dve avayavā assāti dvayaṃ, duvidhaṃ diṭṭhigāhavatthu,
tika-s0302t:115_7: dvayaṃ diṭṭhigāhavasena nissito apassitoti dvayanissito. Tenāha “dve koṭṭhāse nissito”ti.
tika-s0302t:115_8: Yāya diṭṭhiyā “sabboyaṃ loko atthi vijjati sabbakālaṃ upalabbhatī”ti diṭṭhigatiko
tika-s0302t:115_9: gaṇhāti, sā diṭṭhi atthitā, sā eva sadā sabbakālaṃ loko atthīti pavattagāhatāya sassato,
tika-s0302t:115_10: taṃ sassataṃ. Yāya diṭṭhiyā “sabboyaṃ loko natthi na hoti ucchijjatī”ti diṭṭhigatiko
tika-s0302t:115_11: gaṇhāti, sā diṭṭhi natthitā, sā eva ucchijjatīti uppannagāhatāya ucchedo, taṃ ucchedaṃ.
tika-s0302t:115_12: Loko nāma saṅkhāraloko tamhi gahetabbato. Sammappaññāyāti aviparītapaññāya yathābhūtapaññāya.
tika-s0302t:115_13: Tenāha “savipassanā maggapaññā”ti. Nibbattesu dhammesūti yathā paccayuppannesu rūpārūpadhammesu.
tika-s0302t:115_14: Paññāyante svevāti santānanibandhanavasena paññāyamānesu eva. Yā natthīti yā ucchedadiṭṭhi
tika-s0302t:115_15: tattha tattheva sattānaṃ ucchijjanato vinassanato koci ṭhito nāma satto dhammo vā
tika-s0302t:115_16: natthīti saṅkhāraloke uppajjeyya. “Natthi sattā opapātikā”ti pavattamānāpi micchādiṭṭhi
tika-s0302t:115_17: tathāpavattasaṅkhārārammaṇāva. Sā na hotīti kammāvijjātaṇhādibhedaṃ paccayaṃ paṭicca
tika-s0302t:115_18: saṅkhāralokassa samudayanibbattiṃ sammappaññāya passato, sā ucchedadiṭṭhi, na hoti,
tika-s0302t:115_19: nappavattati avicchedena saṅkhārānaṃ nibbattidassanato. Lokanirodhanti saṅkhāralokassa
tika-s0302t:115_20: khaṇikanirodhaṃ. Tenāha “saṅkhārānaṃ bhaṅga”nti. Yā atthīti hetuphalasambandhena
tika-s0302t:115_21: pavattamānassa santānānupacchedassa ekattaggahaṇena saṅkhāraloke yā sassatadiṭṭhi
tika-s0302t:115_22: sabbakālaṃ loko atthīti uppajjeyya. Sā na hotīti uppannuppannānaṃ nirodhassa navanavānañca
tika-s0302t:115_23: uppādassa dassanato, sā sassatadiṭṭhi na hoti.
tika-s0302t:116_0: Loko samudeti etasmāti lokasamudayoti āha “anulomapaccayākāra”nti. Paccayadhammānañhi
tika-s0302t:116_1: attano phalassa paccayabhāvo anulomapaccayākāro. Paṭilomaṃ paccayākāranti ānetvā
tika-s0302t:116_2: sambandho. Taṃtaṃhetunirodhato taṃtaṃphalanirodho hi paṭilomapaccayākāro. Yo hi avijjādīnaṃ
tika-s0302t:116_3: paccayadhammānaṃ hetuādipaccayabhāvo, so nippariyāyato lokasamudayo. Paccayuppannassa
tika-s0302t:116_4: saṅkhārādikassa. Anucchedaṃ passatoti anucchedadassanassa hetu. Ayampīti na kevalaṃ
tika-s0302t:116_5: khaṇato udayavayanīharaṇanayo, atha kho paccayato udayavayanīharaṇanayopi.
tika-s0302t:117_0: Upagamanaṭṭhena taṇhāva upayo. Tathā diṭṭhupayo. Eseva nayoti iminā upayehi upādānādīnaṃ
tika-s0302t:117_1: anatthantarataṃ atidisati. Tathā ca pana tesu duvidhatā upādīyati. Nanu ca cattāri
tika-s0302t:117_2: upādānāni aññattha vuttānīti? Saccaṃ vuttāni, tāni ca kho atthato dve evāti idha
tika-s0302t:117_3: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Kāmaṃ “ahaṃ mama”nti ayathānukkamena vuttaṃ, yathānukkamaṃyeva pana
tika-s0302t:117_4: attho veditabbo. Ādi-saddena paroparassa subhaṃ asubhantiādīnañca saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-s0302t:117_5: Te dhammeti tebhūmakadhamme. Vinivisantīti virūpaṃ nivisanti, abhinivisantīti attho.
tika-s0302t:117_6: Tāhīti taṇhādiṭṭhīhi. Vinibaddhoti virūpaṃ vimuccituṃ vā appadānavasena niyametvā baddho.
tika-s0302t:118_0: “Abhiniveso”ti upayupādānānaṃ pavattiākāraviseso vuttoti āha “tañcāyanti tañca upayupādāna”nti.
tika-s0302t:118_1: Cittassāti akusalacittassa. Patiṭṭhānabhūtanti ādhārabhūtaṃ. Dosamohavasenapi akusalacittappavatti
tika-s0302t:118_2: taṇhādiṭṭhābhinivesūpanissayā evāti taṇhādiṭṭhiyo akusalassa cittassa adhiṭṭhānanti
tika-s0302t:118_3: vuttā. Tasminti akusalacitte. Abhinivisantīti “etaṃ mama, eso me attā”tiādinā abhinivesanaṃ
tika-s0302t:118_4: pavattenti. Anusentīti thāmagatā hutvā appahānabhāvena anusenti. Tadubhayanti taṇhādiṭṭhidvayaṃ.
tika-s0302t:118_5: Na upagacchatīti “etaṃ mamā”tiādinā taṇhādiṭṭhigatiyā na upasaṅkamati na allīyati.
tika-s0302t:118_6: Na upādiyatīti na daḷhaggāhaṃ gaṇhāti. Na adhiṭṭhātīti na taṇhādiṭṭhigāhena adhiṭṭhāya
tika-s0302t:118_7: pavattati. Attaniyagāho nāma sati attagāhe hotīti vuttaṃ “attā me”ti. Idaṃ dukkhaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0302t:118_8: upādānakkhandhāpassayaṃ tabbinimuttassa dukkhassa abhāvāti vuttaṃ “dukkhamevāti pañcupādānakkhandhamattamevā”ti.
tika-s0302t:118_9: “Saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Kaṅkhaṃ na karotīti saṃsayaṃ
tika-s0302t:119_0: Na parappaccayenāti parassa asaddahanena. Missakasammādiṭṭhiṃ āhāti nāmarūpaparicchedato
tika-s0302t:119_1: paṭṭhāya sammādiṭṭhiyā vuttattā lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ sammādiṭṭhiṃ avoca. Nikūṭantoti
tika-s0302t:119_2: nihīnanto. Nihīnapariyāyo hi ayaṃ nikūṭa-saddo. Tenāha “lāmakanto”ti. Paṭhamakanti
tika-s0302t:119_3: ca garahāyaṃ ka-saddo. Sabbaṃ natthīti yathāsaṅkhataṃ bhaṅguppattiyā natthi eva,
tika-s0302t:119_4: sabbaṃ natthi ucchijjati vinassatīti adhippāyo. Sabbamatthīti ca yathā asaṅkhataṃ
tika-s0302t:119_5: atthi vijjati, sabbakālaṃ upalabbhatīti adhippāyo. Sabbanti cettha sakkāyasabbaṃ
tika-s0302t:119_7: Iti-saddo nidassane. Kiṃ nidasseti? Atthi-saddena vuttaṃ. “Atthita”nti niccataṃ.
tika-s0302t:119_8: Sassataggāho hi idha paṭhamo antoti adhippeto. Ucchedaggāho dutiyoti tadubhayavinimuttā
tika-s0302t:119_9: ca idappaccayatā. Ettha ca uppannanirodhakathanato sassatataṃ, nirujjhantānaṃ asati
tika-s0302t:119_10: nibbānappattiyaṃ yathāpaccayaṃ punūpagamanakathanato ucchedatañca anupagamma majjhimena
tika-s0302t:119_11: bhagavā dhammaṃ deseti idappaccayatānayena. Tena vuttaṃ “ete…pe… ante”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:122_0: 16. Nibbindanatthāyāti nibbidānupassanāpaṭilābhāya. Sā hi jarāmaraṇasīsena vuttesu
tika-s0302t:122_2: Sīlato paṭṭhāyāti vivaṭṭasannissitasīlasamādānato paṭṭhāya. Sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato
tika-s0302t:122_3: vivaṭṭasannissitasīle patiṭṭhito upāsakopi pageva catupārisuddhisīle patiṭṭhito bhikkhu
tika-s0302t:122_4: sammāpaṭipanno nāma. Tenāha “yāva arahattamaggā paṭipannoti veditabbo”ti. Nibbānadhammassāti
tika-s0302t:122_5: nibbānāvahassa ariyassa maggassa. Anurūpasabhāvabhūtanti nibbānādhigamassa anucchavikasabhāvabhūtaṃ.
tika-s0302t:122_6: Nibbidāti iminā vuṭṭhānagāminipariyosānaṃ vipassanaṃ vadati. Virāgā nirodhāti padadvayena
tika-s0302t:122_7: ariyamaggaṃ, itarena phalaṃ. Etthāti imasmiṃ sutte. Ekena nayenāti paṭhamena nayena.
tika-s0302t:122_8: Tattha hi bhagavā tena bhikkhunā dhammakathikalakkhaṇaṃ pucchito taṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā
tika-s0302t:122_9: vissajjesi. Yo hi vipassanaṃ maggaṃ anupādāvimuttiṃ pāpetvā kathetuṃ sakkoti, so
tika-s0302t:122_10: ekantadhammakathiko. Tenāha “dhammakathikassa pucchā kathitā”ti. Dvīhīti dutiyatatiyanayehi.
tika-s0302t:122_11: Tanti pucchaṃ. Visesetvāti visiṭṭhaṃ katvā. Yathāpucchitamattameva akathetvā apucchitampi
tika-s0302t:122_12: atthaṃ dassento dhammānudhammapaṭipattiṃ anupādāya vimuttisaṅkhātaṃ visesaṃ pāpetvā.
tika-s0302t:122_13: Bhagavā hi appaṃ yācito bahuṃ dento uḷārapuriso viya dhammakathikalakkhaṇaṃ pucchito
tika-s0302t:122_14: paṭiccasamuppādamukhena tañceva tato ca uttariṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipattiṃ anupādāvimuttañca
tika-s0302t:122_15: vissajjesi. Tattha “nibbidāya…pe… dhammaṃ desetī”ti iminā dhammadesanaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0302t:122_16: katvā dassesi. “Nirodhāya paṭipanno hotī”ti iminā nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ, “anupādāvimutto
tika-s0302t:122_17: hotī”ti iminā desanaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ katvā dassesi. Tenāha “sekkhāsekkhabhūmiyo niddiṭṭhā”ti.
tika-s0302t:125_0: 17. Liṅgena acelakoti pabbajitaliṅgena acelako. Tena acelakacaraṇena acelo, na niccelatāmattenāti
tika-s0302t:125_1: dasseti. Nāmenāti gottanāmena kassapoti. Deseti pavedeti saṃsayavigamanaṃ etenāti
tika-s0302t:125_2: deso, nicchayahetūti āha “kiñcideva desa”ntiādi. So hi saṃsayavigamanaṃ karotīti
tika-s0302t:125_3: kāraṇaṃ. Okāsanti avasaṃsandanapadesaṃ. Tenāha “khaṇaṃ kāla”nti. Antaragharaṃ antonivesanaṃ.
tika-s0302t:125_4: Antare gharāni etassāti antaragharaṃ, antogāmo. Yadākaṅkhasīti yaṃ ākaṅkhasi. Iti
tika-s0302t:125_5: bhagavā sabbaññupavāraṇāya pavāreti. Tenāha “yaṃ icchasī”ti. Yadākaṅkhasīti yaṃ ākaṅkhasi,
tika-s0302t:125_6: kassapa, tikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipantopi pucchasi, yaṃ ākaṅkhasi, tameva pucchāti attho.
tika-s0302t:126_0: “Yāvatatiyaṃ paṭikkhipī”ti vuttattā “tatiyampi kho”tiādinā pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ. So
tika-s0302t:126_1: pana nayavasena saṃkhittoti daṭṭhabbo. Yena kāraṇena bhagavā acelakassa tikkhattuṃ
tika-s0302t:126_2: yācāpetvā cassa pañhaṃ kathesi, taṃ dassetuṃ “kasmā panā”tiādimāha. Gāravajananatthaṃ
tika-s0302t:126_3: yāvatatiyaṃ paṭikkhipi tañca dhammassa sussūsāya. Dhammagarukā hi buddhā bhagavanto.
tika-s0302t:126_4: Sattānaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpetīti vibhattivipariṇāmavasena
tika-s0302t:126_5: sādhāraṇato padaṃ yojetvā puna “ettakena kālenā”ti kassapassa vasena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:127_0: Māti paṭisedhe nipāto. Bhaṇīti punavacanavasena kiriyāpadaṃ vadati. Mā evaṃ bhaṇi,
tika-s0302t:127_1: kathesīti attho. “Iti bhagavā avocā”ti pana saṅgītikāravacanaṃ. Sayaṃkataṃ dukkhanti
tika-s0302t:127_2: purisassa uppajjamānadukkhaṃ, tena kataṃ nāma tassa kāraṇassa pubbe teneva kammassa
tika-s0302t:127_3: upacitattāti ayaṃ nayo anavajjo. Diṭṭhigatiko pana pañcakkhandhavinimuttaṃ niccaṃ
tika-s0302t:127_4: kārakavedakalakkhaṇaṃ attānaṃ parikappetvā tassa vasena “sayaṃkataṃ dukkha”nti pucchatīti
tika-s0302t:127_5: bhagavā “mā heva”nti avoca, tenāha “sayaṃkataṃ dukkhanti vattuṃ na vaṭṭatī”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:127_6: Ettha ca yadi bāhirakehi parikappito attā nāma koci atthi, so ca nicco, tassa nibbikāratāya,
tika-s0302t:127_7: purimarūpāvijahanato kassaci visesādhānassa kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ahitato nivattanatthaṃ,
tika-s0302t:127_8: hite ca vattanatthaṃ upadeso ca nippayojano siyā attavādino. Kathaṃ vā so upadeso
tika-s0302t:127_9: pavattīyati? Vikārābhāvato. Evañca attano ajaṭākāsassa viya dānādikiriyā hiṃsādikiriyā
tika-s0302t:127_10: ca na sambhavati, tathā sukhassa dukkhassa ca anubhavanabandho eva attavādino na
tika-s0302t:127_11: yujjati kammabandhābhāvato. Jātiādīnañca asambhavato kuto vimokkho. Atha pana “dhammamattaṃ
tika-s0302t:127_12: tassa uppajjati ceva vinassati ca. Yassa vasenāyaṃ kiriyāvohāro”ti vadeyya, evampi
tika-s0302t:127_13: purimarūpāvijahanena avaṭṭhitassa attano dhammamattanti na sakkā sambhāvetuṃ. Te
tika-s0302t:127_14: vā panassa dhammā avatthābhūtā, tato aññe vā siyuṃ anaññe vā. Yadi aññe, na tāhi
tika-s0302t:127_15: tassa uppannāhipi koci viseso atthi. Yo hi karoti paṭisaṃvedeti cavati upapajjati
tika-s0302t:127_16: cāti icchitaṃ, tasmā tadattho eva yathāvuttadoso. Kiñca dhammakappanāpi niratthikā
tika-s0302t:127_17: siyā. Atha anaññe, uppādavināsavantīhi avatthāhi anaññassa attano tāsaṃ viya uppādavināsasambhavato
tika-s0302t:127_18: kuto niccatāvakāso. Tāsampi vā attano viya niccatāpattīti bandhavimokkhānaṃ asambhavo
tika-s0302t:127_19: evāti na yujjatevāyaṃ attavādo. Tenāha “attā nāma koci dukkhassa kārako natthīti
tika-s0302t:127_20: dīpetī”ti. Paratoti “paraṃkataṃ dukkha”ntiādike parasmiṃ tividhepi naye. Adhiccasamuppannanti
tika-s0302t:127_21: adhicca yadicchāya kiñci kāraṇaṃ kassaci vā pubbaṃ vinā samuppannaṃ. Tenāha “akāraṇena
tika-s0302t:127_22: yadicchāya uppanna”nti. Kasmā evamāhāti evaṃ vakkhamānoti adhippāyo. Assāti acelassa.
tika-s0302t:127_23: Ayanti bhagavantaṃ sandhāya vadati. Sodhentoti sayaṃ visuddhaṃ katvā pucchitamatthaṃ
tika-s0302t:127_24: eva attano pucchāya suddhiṃ dassento. Laddhiyā “sayaṃkataṃ dukkha”nti micchāgahaṇassa paṭisedhanatthāya.
