tika-s0302t:128_0: So karotīti so kammaṃ karoti. So paṭisaṃvedayatīti kārakavedakānaṃ anaññattadassanaparaṃ
tika-s0302t:128_1: etaṃ, na pana kammakiriyāphalānaṃ paṭisaṃvedanānaṃ samānakālatādassanaparaṃ. Itīti
tika-s0302t:128_2: nidassanatthe nipāto. Khoti avadhāraṇe. “So evā”ti dassito. Aniyatādesā hi ete nipātā.
tika-s0302t:128_3: Āditoti bhummatthe nissakkavacananti āha “ādimhiyevā”ti. “Sayaṃkataṃ dukkha”nti laddhiyā
tika-s0302t:128_4: pageva “so karoti, so paṭisaṃvedayatī”ti saññācittavipallāsā bhavanti. Saññāvipallāsato
tika-s0302t:128_5: hi cittavipallāso, cittavipallāsato diṭṭhivipallāso, tenāha “evaṃ sati pacchā sayaṃkataṃ
tika-s0302t:128_6: dukkhanti ayaṃ laddhi hotī”ti. Evaṃ sati saññācittavipallāsānaṃ brūhito micchābhiniveso,
tika-s0302t:128_7: yadidaṃ “sayaṃkataṃ dukkha”nti laddhi. Tasmā paṭinissajjetuṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigatanti
tika-s0302t:128_8: dasseti. Tenāha bhagavā “sayaṃkataṃ…pe… etaṃ paretī”ti. Vaṭṭadukkhaṃ adhippetaṃ avisesato
tika-s0302t:128_9: atthīti ca vuttattā. Sassataṃ sassatagāhaṃ dīpeti paresaṃ pakāseti, tathābhūto ca
tika-s0302t:128_10: sassataṃ daḷhaggāhaṃ gaṇhātīti. Tassāti diṭṭhigatikassa. Taṃ “sayaṃkataṃ dukkha”nti
tika-s0302t:128_11: evaṃ pavattaṃ viparītadassanaṃ. Etaṃ sassataggahaṇaṃ. Pareti upeti. Tenāha “kārakañca…pe…
tika-s0302t:128_12: attho”ti. Ekameva gaṇhantanti satipi vatthubhede ayoniso uppajjanena ekameva katvā gaṇhantaṃ.
tika-s0302t:129_0: Idha “ādimhiyevā”ti pade. “Paraṃkataṃ dukkha”nti laddhiyā pagevātiādinā hettha vuttanayānusārena
tika-s0302t:129_1: attho veditabbo. Ayañhettha yojanā – “paraṃkataṃ dukkha”nti laddhiyā pageva añño
tika-s0302t:129_2: karoti, añño paṭisaṃvedayatīti saññācittavipallāsā bhavantīti sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
tika-s0302t:129_3: yojetabbaṃ. Evaṃ satīti evaṃ muduke ucchedavipallāse paṭhamuppanne sati pacchā “paraṃkataṃ
tika-s0302t:129_4: dukkha”nti ayaṃ laddhi hotīti sambandho. Kārakoti kammassa kārako. Tena katanti kammakārakena
tika-s0302t:129_5: kataṃ. Kammunā hi phalassa vohāro abhedopacārakattā. Evanti diṭṭhisahagatā vedanā
tika-s0302t:129_6: sātasabhāvā kilesapariḷāhādinā saparissayā saupāyāsā, evaṃ. “Pageva itare”ti vuttavedanāya
tika-s0302t:129_7: abhitunnassa viddhassa. “Vuttanayena yojetabba”nti vatvā taṃ yojanaṃ dassento “tatrāya”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0302t:129_8: Ucchedanti sato sattassa ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ, vibhavanti attho. Asato hi vināsāsambhavato
tika-s0302t:129_9: atthibhāvanibandhano ucchedo. Yathā hetuphalabhāvena pavattamānānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ
tika-s0302t:129_10: satipi ekasantānapariyāpannānaṃ bhinnasantatipatitehi visese hetuphalānaṃ paramatthato
tika-s0302t:129_12: micchāgahaṇaṃ ucchedābhinivesassa kāraṇaṃ. Evaṃ hetuphalabhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ vijjamānepi
tika-s0302t:129_14: dassetuṃ “sattassā”ti vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ. Santānavasena hi vattamānesu khandhesu ghanavinibbhogābhāvena
tika-s0302t:129_15: ekattagahaṇanibandhano sattaggāho, sattassa ca atthibhāvaggāhanibandhano ucchedaggāho,
tika-s0302t:129_16: yāvāyaṃ attā na ucchijjati, tāvāyaṃ vijjatiyevāti gahaṇato nirudayavināso idha ucchedoti
tika-s0302t:129_17: adhippetoti “uccheda”nti vuttaṃ. Visesena nāso vināso, abhāvo. So pana maṃsacakkhupaññācakkhūnaṃ
tika-s0302t:129_18: dassanapathātikkamoyeva hotīti vuttaṃ “adassana”nti. Adassane hi nāsasaddo loke niruḷhoti.
tika-s0302t:129_19: Sabhāvavigamo sabhāvāpagamo vibhavo. Yo hi nirudayavināsena ucchijjati, na so attano sabhāvena tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0302t:130_0: Ete teti vā ye ime tayā “sayaṃkataṃ dukkha”nti ca puṭṭhena mayā “so karoti, so paṭisaṃvedayatī”tiādinā,
tika-s0302t:130_1: “añño karoti, añño paṭisaṃvedayatī”tiādinā ca paṭikkhittā sassatucchedasaṅkhātā antā,
tika-s0302t:130_2: te ubho anteti yojanā. Atha vā ete teti yattha puthū aññatitthiyā anupacitañāṇasambhāratāya
tika-s0302t:130_3: paramagambhīraṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ suññataṃ appajānantā sassatucchede nimuggā sīsaṃ
tika-s0302t:130_4: ukkhipituṃ na visahanti, ete te ubho ante anupagammāti yojanā. Desetīti paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0302t:130_5: tāva anaññasādhāraṇe paṭipattidhamme ñāṇānubhāvena majjhimāya paṭipadāya ṭhito, karuṇānubhāvena
tika-s0302t:130_6: desanādhamme majjhimāya paṭipadāya ṭhito dhammaṃ deseti. Ettha hīti hi-saddo hetuattho.
tika-s0302t:130_7: Yasmā kāraṇato…pe… niddiṭṭho, tasmā majjhimāya paṭipadāya ṭhito dhammaṃ desetīti
tika-s0302t:130_8: yojanā. Kāraṇato phalaṃ dīpitanti yojanā, abhidheyyānurūpañhi liṅgavacanāni honti.
tika-s0302t:130_9: Assāti phalassa. Na koci kārako vā vedako vā niddiṭṭho, aññadatthu paṭikkhitto hetuphalamattatādassanato
tika-s0302t:130_10: kevalaṃ dukkhakkhandhagahaṇatoti. Ettāvatāti “ete te, kassapa…pe… dukkhakkhandhassa
tika-s0302t:130_11: nirodho hotī”ti ettakena tāva padena. Sesapañhāti “sayaṃkatañca paraṃkatañca dukkha”ntiādikā
tika-s0302t:130_12: sesā cattāro pañhā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, natthi dukkha”nti
tika-s0302t:130_13: pañho pāḷiyaṃ sarūpeneva paṭikkhittoti na uddhato. Paṭisedhitā hontīti tatiyapañho,
tika-s0302t:130_14: tāva paṭhamadutiyapañhapaṭikkhepeneva paṭikkhitto, so hi pañho visuṃ visuṃ paṭikkhepena
tika-s0302t:130_15: ekajjhaṃ paṭikkhepena ca. Tenāha “ubho…pe… paṭikkhitto”ti. Ettha ca yassa attā kārako
tika-s0302t:130_16: vedako vā icchito, tena vipariṇāmadhammo attā anuññāto hoti. Tathā ca sati anupubbadhammappavattiyā
tika-s0302t:130_17: rūpādidhammānaṃ viya, sukhādidhammānaṃ viya cassa paccayāyattavuttitāya uppādavantatā
tika-s0302t:130_18: āpajjati. Uppāde ca sati avassaṃbhāvī nirodhoti anavakāsā niccatāti. Tassa “sayaṃkata”nti
tika-s0302t:130_19: paṭhamapañhapaṭikkhepo pacchā ce attano niruḷhassa samudayo hotīti pubbe viya anena
tika-s0302t:130_20: bhavitabbaṃ, pubbe viya vā pacchāpi. Sesapañhāti tatiyapañhādayo. Tatiyapañho paṭikkhittoti
tika-s0302t:130_21: evañca tatiyapañho paṭikkhitto veditabbo – “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā satataṃ
tika-s0302t:130_22: samitaṃ paccayāyattassa dīpanena dukkhassa adhiccasamuppannatā paṭikkhittā, tato
tika-s0302t:130_23: eva tassa ajānanañca paṭikkhittaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā “evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī”ti.
tika-s0302t:131_0: Yaṃ parivāsaṃ samādiyitvā parivasatīti yojanā. Vacanasiliṭṭhatāvasenāti “bhagavato
tika-s0302t:131_1: santike pabbajjaṃ labheyyaṃ upasampada”nti yācantena tena vuttavacanasiliṭṭhatāvasena.
tika-s0302t:131_3: kiccesu dakkhatādi, uddesādīsu tibbacchandatā, titthiyānaṃ avaṇṇabhaṇane attamanatā,
tika-s0302t:131_4: buddhādīnaṃ avaṇṇabhaṇane anattamanatā, titthiyānaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇane anattamanatā, buddhādīnaṃ
tika-s0302t:131_5: vaṇṇabhaṇane attamanatāti imesaṃ saṅgaho. Aṭṭha vattānīti imāni aṭṭha titthiyavattāni
tika-s0302t:131_6: pūrentena. Ettha ca nātikālena gāmappavesanā tattha visuddhakāyavacīsamācārena piṇḍāya
tika-s0302t:132_0: Ayamettha pāṭhoti etasmiṃ kassapasutte ayaṃ pāṭho. Aññatthāti sīhanādasuttādīsu.
tika-s0302t:132_1: Ghaṃsitvā koṭṭetvāti yathā suvaṇṇaṃ nighaṃsitvā adhikaraṇiyā koṭṭetvā niddosameva
tika-s0302t:132_2: gayhati, evaṃ parivāsavattacaraṇena ghaṃsitvā suddhabhāvavīmaṃsanena koṭṭetvā suddho
tika-s0302t:132_3: eva aññatitthiyapubbo idha gayhati. Tibbacchandatanti sāsanaṃ anupavisitvā brahmacariyavāse
tika-s0302t:132_4: tibbacchandataṃ daḷhatarābhirucitaṃ. Aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesīti nāmagottena apākaṭaṃ
tika-s0302t:132_5: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpesi ehibhikkhuupasampadāya upanissayābhāvato. Gaṇe nisīditvāti
tika-s0302t:132_6: bhikkhū attano santike pattāsanavasena gaṇe nisīditvā.
tika-s0302t:135_0: 18. Yasmā timbaruko “vedanā attā. Attāva vedayatī”ti evaṃladdhiko, tasmā tāya laddhiyā
tika-s0302t:135_1: “sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkha”nti vadati, taṃ paṭisaṃharituṃ bhagavā “sā vedanā”tiādiṃ
tika-s0302t:135_2: avoca. Tenāha “sā vedanātiādi sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkhanti laddhiyā nisedhanatthaṃ vutta”nti.
tika-s0302t:135_3: Etthāpīti imasmimpi sutte. Tatrāti yaṃ vuttaṃ “sā vedanā…pe… sukhadukkha”nti, tasmiṃ
tika-s0302t:135_4: pāṭhe. Ādimhiyevāti ettha bhummavacanena “ādito”ti to-saddo na nissakkavacane. Eva-kārena
tika-s0302t:135_5: kho-saddo avadhāraṇeti dasseti. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ anantarasutte vuttameva.
tika-s0302t:135_6: Tattha pana “vedanāto añño attā, vedanāya kārako”ti laddhikassa diṭṭhigatikassa vādo
tika-s0302t:135_7: paṭikkhitto, idha “vedanā attā”ti evaṃladdhikassāti ayameva viseso. Tenāha “evañhi
tika-s0302t:135_8: sati vedanāya eva vedanā katā hotī”tiādi. Imissāti yāya vedanāya sukhadukkhaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0302t:135_9: imissā. Pubbepīti sassatākārato pubbepi. Purimañhi atthanti anantarasutte vuttaṃ
tika-s0302t:135_10: atthaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyanti porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Tanti purimasutte vuttamatthaṃ. Assāti
tika-s0302t:135_11: imassa suttassa. Yasmā timbaruko “vedanāva attā”ti gaṇhāti, tasmā vuttaṃ “ahaṃ sā
tika-s0302t:136_0: Aññā vedanātiādīsupi yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ anantarasutte vuttanayameva. Kārakavedanāti
tika-s0302t:136_1: kattubhūtavedanā. Vedanāsukhadukkhanti vedanābhūtasukhadukkhaṃ kathitaṃ, na vaṭṭasukhadukkhaṃ.
tika-s0302t:139_0: 19. Avijjā nīvaraṇā bhavādi-ādīnavassa nivāritapaṭicchādikā etassāti avijjānīvaraṇo,
tika-s0302t:139_1: avijjāya nivutoti āha “avijjāya nivāritassā”ti. Ayaṃ kāyoti bālassa appahīnakilesassa
tika-s0302t:139_2: paccuppannaṃ attabhāvaṃ rakkhaṃ katvā avijjāya paṭicchāditādīnave ayāthāvadassanavasena
tika-s0302t:139_3: taṇhāya paṭiladdhacittassa taṃtaṃbhavūpagā saṅkhārā saṅkharīyanti. Tehi ca attabhāvassa
tika-s0302t:139_4: abhinibbatti, tasmā ayañca avijjāya kāyo nibbattoti. Assāti bālassa. Ayaṃ atthoti
tika-s0302t:139_5: “ayaṃ kāyo nāmarūpanti ca vutto”ti attho dīpetabbo upādānakkhandhasaḷāyatanasaṅgahato
tika-s0302t:139_6: tesaṃ dhammānaṃ. Evametaṃ dvayanti evaṃ avijjāya nivāritattā, taṇhāya ca saṃyuttattā
tika-s0302t:139_7: evaṃ saparasantānagatasaviññāṇakakāyasaṅkhātaṃ dvayaṃ hoti. Aññatthāti suttantaresu.
tika-s0302t:139_8: “Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”tiādinā
tika-s0302t:139_10: vuttā, idha pana abhinditvā cha ajjhattikabāhirāyatanāni paṭicca cakkhusamphassādayo
tika-s0302t:139_11: vuttā “dvayaṃ paṭicca phasso”ti, tasmā mahādvayaṃ nāma kiretaṃ anavasesato ajjhattikabāhirāyatanānaṃ
tika-s0302t:139_12: gahitattā. Ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanānīti etthāpi hi saḷāyatanāni saṅgahitāneva.
tika-s0302t:139_13: Phassakāraṇānīti phassapavattiyā paccayāni. Yehīti hetudassanamattanti āha “yehi
tika-s0302t:139_14: kāraṇabhūtehī”ti. Phasso eva phusanakicco, na phassāyatanānīti vuttaṃ “phassena phuṭṭho”ti.
tika-s0302t:139_15: Paripuṇṇavasenāti avekallavasena. Aparipuṇṇāyatanānaṃ hīnāni phassassa kāraṇāni honti,
tika-s0302t:139_16: tesaṃ viyāti “etesaṃ vā aññatarenā”ti vuttaṃ. Kāyanibbattanādimhīti saviññāṇakassa
tika-s0302t:139_17: kāyassa nibbattanaṃ kāyanibbattanaṃ, kāyo vā nibbattati etenāti kāyanibbattanaṃ,
tika-s0302t:139_18: kilesābhisaṅkhārā. Ādisaddena phassasaḷāyatanādisaṅgaho. Adhikaṃ payasati payuñjati
tika-s0302t:140_0: Bhagavā amhākaṃ uppādakabhāvena mūlabhāvena bhagavaṃmūlakā. Ime dhammāti ime kāraṇadhammā.
tika-s0302t:140_1: Yehi mayaṃ bālapaṇḍitānaṃ samānepi kāyanibbattanādimhi visesaṃ jāneyyāma, tenāha
tika-s0302t:140_2: “pubbe kassapasammāsambuddhena uppāditā”tiādi. Ājānāmāti abhimukhaṃ paccakkhato jānāma.
tika-s0302t:140_3: Paṭivijjhāmāti tasseva vevacanaṃ, adhigacchāmāti attho. Netāti amhākaṃ santāne pāpetā.
tika-s0302t:140_4: Vinetāti yathā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso hoti, evaṃ visesato netā, tadaṅgavinayādivasena
tika-s0302t:140_5: vā vinetā. Anunetāti anurūpaṃ netā. Antarantarā yathādhammapaññattiyā paññāpitānaṃ
tika-s0302t:140_6: dhammānaṃ anurūpato dassanaṃ hotīti āha “yathāsabhāvato …pe… dassetā”ti. Āpāthaṃ
tika-s0302t:140_7: upagacchantānaṃ bhagavā paṭisaraṇaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānanti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā dhammā.
tika-s0302t:140_8: Tenāha “catubhūmakadhammā”tiādi. Paṭisarati paṭivijjhatīti paṭisaraṇaṃ, tasmā paṭivijjhanavasena
tika-s0302t:140_9: bhagavā paṭisaraṇaṃ etesanti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā. Tenāha “api cā”tiādi. Phasso āgacchatīti
tika-s0302t:140_10: paṭivijjhanakavasena phasso ñāṇassa āpāthaṃ āgacchati, āpāthaṃ āgacchantoyeva so
tika-s0302t:140_11: atthato “ahaṃ kinnāmo”ti nāmaṃ pucchanto viya, bhagavā cassa nāmaṃ karonto viya hotīti
tika-s0302t:140_12: vuttaṃ “ahaṃ bhagavā”tiādi. Upaṭṭhātūti ñāṇassa paccupaṭṭhātu. Bhagavantaṃyeva paṭibhātūti
tika-s0302t:140_13: bhagavato eva bhāgo hotu, bhagavāva naṃ attano bhāgaṃ katvā vissajjetūti attho, bhagavato
tika-s0302t:140_14: bhāgo yadidaṃ dhammassa akkhānaṃ, amhākaṃ pana savanaṃ bhāgoti ayamettha adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t:140_15: Evañhi saddalakkhaṇena sameti. Keci pana paṭibhātūti atthaṃ vadanti ñāṇena dissatu
tika-s0302t:140_16: desīyatūti vā attho. Tenāha “tumheyeva no kathetvā dethāti attho”ti.
tika-s0302t:141_0: Bālassa paṇḍitassa ca kāyassa nibbattiyā paccayabhūtā avijjā ca taṇhā ca. Tenāha
tika-s0302t:141_1: “kammaṃ…pe… niruddhā”ti. Javāpetvāti gahitajavanaṃ katvā, yathā paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ
tika-s0302t:141_2: samatthaṃ hoti, evaṃ katvā. Yadi niruddhā, kathaṃ appahīnāti vuttanti āha “yathā
tika-s0302t:141_3: panā”tiādi. Bhavati hi taṃsadisepi tabbohāro yathā “sā eva tittirī, tāneva osadhāni,
tika-s0302t:141_4: tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesenā”ti ca. Dukkhakkhayāyāti tadatthavisesanatthanti āha
tika-s0302t:141_6: karaṇavacanaṃ nissakketi āha “bālato”ti. Bhāvinā saha paṭisandhinā sappaṭisandhiko.
tika-s0302t:141_7: Yo pana ekantato tenattabhāvena arahattaṃ pattuṃ bhabbo, so bhāvinā paṭisandhinā
tika-s0302t:141_9: so ca yāva ariyabhūmiṃ na okkamati, tāva bāladhammasamaṅgī evāti katvā “sabbopi puthujjano
tika-s0302t:141_10: bālo”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi “appaṭisandhiko khīṇāsavo paṇḍito”ti khīṇāsava-saddena appaṭisandhiko
tika-s0302t:141_11: visesito. Yadi evaṃ sekkhā kathanti āha “sotāpannā”tiādi. Te hi sikhāpattapaṇḍiccabhāvalakkhaṇābhāvato
tika-s0302t:141_12: paṇḍitāti na vattabbā khīṇāsavā viya, balavatarānaṃ pana bāladhammānaṃ pahīnattā
tika-s0302t:141_13: bālātipi na vattabbā puthujjanā viya. Bhajiyamānā pana catusaccasampaṭivedhaṃ upādāya
tika-s0302t:144_0: 20. Sabbampi saṅkhataṃ appaṭicca uppannaṃ nāma natthīti paccayadhammopi attano paccayadhammaṃ
tika-s0302t:144_1: upādāya paccayuppanno, tathā paccayuppannadhammopi attano paccayuppannaṃ upādāya
tika-s0302t:144_2: paccayadhammoti yathārahaṃ dhammānaṃ paccayapaccayuppannatā. Yesaṃ vineyyānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādadesanāyeva
tika-s0302t:144_3: subodhato upaṭṭhāti, tesaṃ vasena suṭṭhu vibhāgaṃ katvā paṭiccasamuppādo desito.
tika-s0302t:144_4: Yesaṃ pana vineyyānaṃ tadubhayasmiṃ vibhajja sute eva dhammābhisamayo hoti, te sandhāya
tika-s0302t:144_5: bhagavā tadubhayaṃ vibhajja dassento “paṭiccasamuppādañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi
tika-s0302t:144_6: paṭiccasamuppanne ca dhamme”ti imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhīti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento “satthā
tika-s0302t:144_7: imasmiṃ sutte”tiādimāha. Paccayassa bhāvo paccayattaṃ, paccayanibbattatā. Asabhāvadhamme
tika-s0302t:144_8: na labbhatīti “sabhāvadhamme”ti vuttaṃ. Nanu ca jāti jarā maraṇañca sabhāvadhammo
tika-s0302t:144_9: na hoti, yesaṃ pana khandhānaṃ jāti jarā maraṇañca, te eva sabhāvadhammā, atha kasmā
tika-s0302t:144_10: desanāya te gahitāti? Nāyaṃ doso, jāti jarā maraṇañhi paccayanibbattānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ
tika-s0302t:144_11: vikāramattaṃ, naññesaṃ, tasmā te gahitāti. Uppādā vā tathāgatānanti na vineyyapuggalānaṃ
tika-s0302t:144_12: maggaphaluppatti viya jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇuppatti tathāgatuppādāyattā, atha kho
tika-s0302t:144_13: sā tathāgatānaṃ uppādepi anuppādepi hotiyeva. Tasmā sā kāmaṃ asaṅkhatā viya dhātu
tika-s0302t:144_14: na niccā, tathāpi “sabbakālikā”ti etena jātipaccayato jarāmaraṇuppattīti dasseti.
tika-s0302t:144_15: Tenāha “jātiyeva jarāmaraṇassa paccayo”ti. Jātipaccayāti ca jātisaṅkhātapaccayā.
tika-s0302t:144_16: Hetumhi nissakkavacanaṃ. Ṭhitāva sā dhātu, yāyaṃ idappaccayatā jātiyā jarāmaraṇassa
tika-s0302t:144_17: paccayatā tassa byabhicārābhāvato. Idāni na kadāci jāti jarāmaraṇassa paccayo na
tika-s0302t:144_18: hoti hotiyevāti jarāmaraṇassa paccayabhāve niyameti. Ubhayenapi yathāvuttassa paccayabhāvo
tika-s0302t:144_19: yattha hoti, tattha avassaṃbhāvitaṃ dasseti. Tenāha bhagavā “ṭhitāva sā dhātū”ti.
tika-s0302t:144_20: Dvīhi padehi. Tiṭṭhantīti yassa vasena dhammānaṃ ṭhiti, sā idappaccayatā dhammaṭṭhitatā.
tika-s0302t:144_21: Dhammeti paccayuppanne dhamme. Niyameti viseseti. Hetugatavisesasamāyogo hi hetuphalassa
tika-s0302t:145_0: Aparo nayo – ṭhitāva sā dhātūti yāyaṃ jarāmaraṇassa idappaccayatā “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti,
tika-s0302t:145_1: esā dhātu esa sabhāvo. Tathāgatānaṃ uppādato pubbe uddhañca appaṭivijjhiyamāno, majjhe
tika-s0302t:145_2: ca paṭivijjhiyamāno na tathāgatehi uppādito, atha kho sambhavantassa jarāmaraṇassa
tika-s0302t:145_3: sabbakālaṃ jātipaccayato sambhavoti ṭhitāva sā dhātu, kevalaṃ pana sayambhuñāṇena
tika-s0302t:145_4: abhisambujjhanato “ayaṃ dhammo tathāgatena abhisambuddho”ti pavedanato ca tathāgato
tika-s0302t:145_5: “dhammasāmī”ti vuccati, na apubbassa uppādanato. Tena vuttaṃ “ṭhitāva sā dhātū”ti.
tika-s0302t:145_6: Sā eva “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti ettha vipallāsābhāvato evaṃ avabujjhamānassa etassa
tika-s0302t:145_7: sabhāvassa, hetuno vā tatheva bhāvato ṭhitatāti dhammaṭṭhitatā, jāti vā jarāmaraṇassa
tika-s0302t:145_9: ṭhitatā “dhammaṭṭhitatā”ti phalaṃ pati sāmatthiyato hetumeva vadati. Dhārīyati paccayehīti
tika-s0302t:145_10: vā dhammo, tiṭṭhati tattha tadāyattavuttitāya phalanti ṭhiti, dhammassa ṭhiti dhammaṭṭhiti.
tika-s0302t:145_11: Dhammoti vā kāraṇaṃ paccayabhāvena phalassa dhāraṇato, tassa ṭhiti sabhāvo, dhammato
tika-s0302t:145_12: ca añño sabhāvo natthīti dhammaṭṭhiti, paccayo. Tenāha “paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti.
tika-s0302t:145_13: Dhammaṭṭhiti eva dhammaṭṭhitatā. Sā eva dhātu “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti imassa
tika-s0302t:145_14: sabhāvassa, hetuno vā aññathattābhāvato, “na jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti viññāyamānassa
tika-s0302t:145_15: ca tabbhāvābhāvato niyāmatā vavatthitabhāvoti dhammaniyāmatā. Phalassa vā jarāmaraṇassa
tika-s0302t:145_16: jātiyā sati sambhavo dhamme hetumhi ṭhitatāti dhammaṭṭhitatā, asati asambhavo dhammaniyāmatāti
tika-s0302t:145_17: evaṃ phalena hetuṃ vibhāveti, taṃ “ṭhitāva sā dhātū”tiādinā vuttaṃ. Imesaṃ jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ
tika-s0302t:145_18: paccayatāsaṅkhātaṃ idappaccayataṃ abhisambujjhati paccakkhakaraṇena abhimukhaṃ bujjhati
tika-s0302t:145_19: yāthāvato paṭivijjhati, tato eva abhisameti abhimukhaṃ samāgacchati, ādito kathento
tika-s0302t:145_20: ācikkhati, uddisatīti attho. Tameva uddesaṃ pariyosāpento deseti. Yathāuddiṭṭhamattaṃ
tika-s0302t:145_21: niddisanavasena pakārehi ñāpento paññāpeti. Pakārehi eva patiṭṭhapento paṭṭhapeti.
tika-s0302t:145_22: Yathāniddiṭṭhaṃ paṭiniddesavasena vivarati vibhajati. Vivaṭañhi vibhattañca atthaṃ
tika-s0302t:145_23: hetūdāharaṇadassanehi pākaṭaṃ karonto uttānīkaroti. Uttānīkaronto tathā paccakkhabhūtaṃ
tika-s0302t:146_0: Jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇantiādīsūti jātiādīnaṃ jarāmaraṇapaccayabhāvesu. Tehi tehi paccayehīti
tika-s0302t:146_1: yāvatakehi paccayehi yaṃ phalaṃ uppajjamānārahaṃ, avikalehi teheva tassa uppatti,
tika-s0302t:146_2: na ūnādhikehīti. Tenāha “anūnādhikehevā”ti. Yathā taṃ cakkhurūpālokamanasikārehi
tika-s0302t:146_3: cakkhuviññāṇassa sambhavoti. Tena taṃtaṃphalanipphādane tassā paccayasāmaggiyā tappakāratā
tika-s0302t:146_4: tathatāti vuttāti dasseti. Sāmagginti samodhānaṃ, samavāyanti attho. Asambhavābhāvatoti
tika-s0302t:146_5: anuppajjanassa abhāvato. Tathāvidhapaccayasāmaggiyañhi satipi phalassa anuppajjane
tika-s0302t:146_6: tassāvitathatā siyā. Aññadhammapaccayehīti aññassa phaladhammassa paccayehi. Aññadhammānuppattitoti
tika-s0302t:146_7: tato aññassa phaladhammassa anuppajjanato. Na hi kadāci cakkhurūpālokamanasikārehi
tika-s0302t:146_8: sotaviññāṇassa sambhavo atthi. Yadi siyā, tassā sāmaggiyā aññathatā nāma siyā, na
tika-s0302t:146_9: cetaṃ atthīti “anaññathatā”ti vuttaṃ. Paccayatoti paccayabhāvato. Paccayasamūhatoti
tika-s0302t:146_10: etthāpi eseva nayo. Idappaccayā eva idappaccayatāti tā-saddena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ yathā
tika-s0302t:146_11: “devoyeva devatā”ti, idappaccayānaṃ samūho idappaccayatāti samūhattho tāsaddo yathā
tika-s0302t:146_12: “janānaṃ samūho janatā”ti imamatthaṃ sandhāyāha “lakkhaṇaṃ panettha saddasatthato veditabba”nti.
tika-s0302t:147_0: Na niccaṃ sassatanti aniccaṃ. Jarāmaraṇaṃ na aniccaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ vikārabhāvato anipphannattā,
tika-s0302t:147_1: tathāpi “anicca”nti pariyāyena vuttaṃ. Esa nayo saṅkhatādīsupi. Samāgantvā kataṃ
tika-s0302t:147_2: sahiteheva paccayehi nibbattetabbato yathāsabhāvaṃ samecca sambhuyya paccayehi katanti
tika-s0302t:147_3: saṅkhataṃ. Paccayārahaṃ paccayaṃ paṭicca na vinā tena sahitasametameva uppannanti
tika-s0302t:147_4: paṭiccasamuppannaṃ. Tenāha “paccaye nissāya uppanna”nti. Khayasabhāvanti bhijjanasabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0302t:147_6: Nirujjhanakasabhāvanti khaṇabhaṅgavasena pabhaṅgusabhāvaṃ. Vuttanayenāti jarāya vuttanayena.
tika-s0302t:147_7: Janakappaccayānaṃ kammādīnaṃ. Kiccānubhāvakkhaṇeti ettha kiccānubhāvo nāma yathā
tika-s0302t:147_8: pavattamāne paccaye tassa phalaṃ uppajjati, tathā pavatti, evaṃ santassa pavattanakkhaṇe.
tika-s0302t:147_9: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmiṃ khaṇe paccayo attano phaluppādanaṃ pati byāvaṭo nāma hoti,
tika-s0302t:147_10: imasmiṃ khaṇe ye dhammā rūpādayo upalabbhanti tato pubbe, pacchā ca anupalabbhamānā,
tika-s0302t:147_11: tesaṃ tato uppatti niddhārīyati, evaṃ jātiyāpi sā niddhāretabbā taṃkhaṇūpaladdhatoti.
tika-s0302t:147_12: Yadi evaṃ nippariyāyatova jātiyā kutoci uppatti siddhi, atha kasmā “ekena pariyāyenā”ti
tika-s0302t:147_13: vuttanti? Jāyamānadhammānaṃ vikārabhāvena upaladdhabbattā. Yadi nipphannadhammā viya
tika-s0302t:147_14: jāti upalabbheyya, nippariyāyatova tassā kutoci uppatti siyā, na cevaṃ upalabbhati,
tika-s0302t:147_15: atha kho anipphannattā vikārabhāvena upalabbhati. Tasmā “ekena pariyāyenettha aniccātiādīni
tika-s0302t:147_16: yujjantī”ti vuttaṃ. Na pana jarāmaraṇe, janakappaccayānaṃ kiccānubhāvakkhaṇe tassa
tika-s0302t:147_17: alabbhanato. Teneva “ettha ca aniccanti…pe… aniccaṃ nāma jāta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:148_1: viya. Appadhānabhūtā hi vipassanā, yathābhūtadassanamaggapaññā pajānāti. “Purimaṃ
tika-s0302t:148_2: anta”nti vuccamāne paccuppannabhāvassapi gahaṇaṃ siyāti “purimaṃ antaṃ atīta”nti
tika-s0302t:148_3: vuttaṃ. Vijjamānatañca avijjamānatañcāti sassatāsaṅkaṃ nissāya “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”nti
tika-s0302t:148_4: atīte attano vijjamānataṃ, adhiccasamuppattiāsaṅkaṃ nissāya “yato pabhuti ahaṃ, tato
tika-s0302t:148_5: pubbe na nu kho ahosi”nti atīte attano avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati. Kasmā? Vicikicchāya
tika-s0302t:148_6: ākāradvayāvalambanato. Tassā pana atītavatthutāya gahitattā sassatādhiccasamuppattiākāranissitatā
tika-s0302t:148_7: dassitā eva. Āsappanaparisappanapavattikaṃ katthacipi appaṭivattihetubhūtaṃ vicikicchaṃ
tika-s0302t:148_8: kasmā uppādetīti na vicāretabbametanti dassento āha “kiṃkāraṇanti na vattabba”nti.
tika-s0302t:148_9: Kāraṇaṃ vā vicikicchāya ayonisomanasikāro, tassa andhabālaputhujjanabhāvo, ariyānaṃ
tika-s0302t:148_10: adassāvitā cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Jātiliṅgupapattiyoti khattiyabrāhmaṇādijātiṃ, gahaṭṭhapabbajitādiliṅgaṃ,
tika-s0302t:148_11: devamanussādiupapattiñca. Nissāyāti upādāya. Tasmiṃ kāle yaṃ santānaṃ majjhimaṃ pamāṇaṃ,
tika-s0302t:148_12: tena yutto pamāṇiko, tadabhāvato adhikabhāvato vā “appamāṇiko”ti veditabbo. Kecīti
tika-s0302t:148_13: sārasamāsācariyā. Te hi “kathaṃ nu kho”ti issarena vā brahmunā vā pubbakatena vā
tika-s0302t:148_14: ahetuto vā nibbattoti cintetīti vadanti. Ahetuto nibbattikaṅkhāpi hi hetuparāmasanamevāti.
tika-s0302t:148_15: Paramparanti pubbāparappavattiṃ. Addhānanti kālādhivacanaṃ, tañca bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ
tika-s0302t:148_16: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vijjamānatañca avijjamānatañcāti sassatāsaṅkaṃ nissāya “bhavissāmi nu
tika-s0302t:148_17: kho ahaṃ anāgatamaddhāna”nti anāgate attano vijjamānataṃ, ucchedāsaṅkaṃ nissāya “yasmiñca
tika-s0302t:148_18: attabhāve ucchedanakaṅkhā, tato paraṃ nu kho bhavissāmī”ti anāgate attano avijjamānatañca
tika-s0302t:149_1: vuttaṃ. “Idaṃ kathaṃ, idaṃ katha”nti pavattanato kathaṃkathā, vicikicchā, sā assa
tika-s0302t:149_2: atthīti kathaṃkathī. Tenāha “vicikicchī”ti. Kā ettha cintā? Ummattako viya bālaputhujjanoti
tika-s0302t:149_3: paṭikacceva vuttanti adhippāyo. Taṃ mahāmātāya puttaṃ. Muṇḍesunti muṇḍena anicchantaṃ
tika-s0302t:149_4: jāgaraṇakāle na sakkāti suttaṃ muṇḍesuṃ kuladhammavasena yathā ekacce kulatāpasā.
tika-s0302t:149_5: Rājabhayenāti ca vadanti. Sītibhūtanti idaṃ madhurakabhāvappattiyā kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0302t:149_6: “Setabhūta”ntipi pāṭho, udake ciraṭṭhānena setabhāvaṃ pattanti attho.
tika-s0302t:150_0: Attano khattiyabhāvaṃ kaṅkhati kaṇṇo viya sūtaputtasaññī, sūtaputtasaññīti sūriyadevaputtassa
tika-s0302t:150_1: puttasaññī. Jātiyā vibhāviyamānāya “aha”nti tassa attano parāmasanaṃ sandhāyāha “evampi
tika-s0302t:150_2: siyā kaṅkhā”ti. Manussāpi ca rājāno viyāti manussāpi ca keci ekacce rājāno viyāti
tika-s0302t:150_3: adhippāyo. Vuttanayameva “saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāyā”tiādinā. Etthāti “kathaṃ nu khosmī”ti
tika-s0302t:150_4: pade. Abbhantare jīvoti paraparikappitaṃ antarattānaṃ vadati. Soḷasaṃsādīnanti ādi-saddena
tika-s0302t:150_6: diṭṭhigatikānaṃ matimattaṃ, paramatthato pana sā attabhāvavisayāvāti āha “attabhāvassa
tika-s0302t:150_7: āgatigatiṭṭhāna”nti. Yatāyaṃ āgato, yattha ca gamissati, taṃ ṭhānanti attho. Sotāpanno
tika-s0302t:150_8: adhippeto vicikicchāpahānassa diṭṭhattā. Itarepi tayoti sakadāgāmīādayo avāritā eva.
tika-s0302t:155_0: 21. Paṭhamaṃ dutiyasseva saṅkhepo paṭhamasutte saṅkhepavuttassa atthassa vitthāravasena
tika-s0302t:155_1: dutiyasuttassa desitattā, tañca pana bhagavā paṭhamasuttaṃ saṅkhepato desesi, dutiyaṃ
tika-s0302t:155_2: tato vitthārato. Paṭhamaṃ vā saṃkhittarucīnaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayena saṅkhepato desesi,
tika-s0302t:155_3: dutiyaṃ pana attano ruciyā tato vitthārato. Sīhasamānavuttikā hi buddhā bhagavanto,
tika-s0302t:155_4: te attano ruciyā kathentā attano thāmaṃ dassentāva kathenti, tasmā dutiyasuttavasena
tika-s0302t:155_5: cettha atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma, tasmiṃ saṃvaṇṇite paṭhamaṃ saṃvaṇṇitameva hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t:158_0: 22. Tatthāti dutiyasutte. Dasahi balehīti dasahi anaññasādhāraṇehi ñāṇabalehi, tāni
tika-s0302t:158_1: tathāgatasseva balānīti tathāgatabalānīti vuccanti. Kāmañca tāni ekaccānaṃ sāvakānampi
tika-s0302t:158_2: uppajjanti, yādisāni pana buddhānaṃ ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇādīni uppajjanti, na tādisāni tadaññesaṃ
tika-s0302t:158_4: kulasaddāpekkhāya napuṃsakaniddeso. Esa nayo sesesupi. Pakatihatthikulanti giricaranadicaravanacarādippabhedā
tika-s0302t:158_5: gocariyakāḷāvakanāmā sabbāpi balena pākatikā hatthijāti. Dasannaṃ purisānanti thāmamajjhimānaṃ
tika-s0302t:158_6: dasannaṃ purisānaṃ. Ekassa tathāgatassa kāyabalanti ānetvā sambandho. Ekassāti ca
tika-s0302t:158_7: tathā heṭṭhākathāyaṃ āgatattā desanāsotena vuttaṃ. Nārāyanasaṅghātabalanti ettha
tika-s0302t:158_8: nārā vuccanti rasmiyo, tā bahū nānāvidhā ito uppajjantīti nārāyanaṃ, vajiraṃ, tasmā
tika-s0302t:158_9: nārāyanasaṅghātabalanti vajirasaṅghātabalanti attho. Tathāgatassa kāyabalanti tathāgatassa
tika-s0302t:158_10: pākatikakāyabalaṃ. Saṅgahaṃ na gacchati attano balābhāvato, tato evassa bāhirakatā
tika-s0302t:158_11: lāmakatā ca. Tadubhayaṃ panassa kāraṇena dassetuṃ “etañhi nissāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Aññanti
tika-s0302t:158_12: kāyabalato aññaṃ tato visuṃyeva. Dasasu ṭhānesu dasasu ñātabbaṭṭhānesu. Yāthāvapaṭivedhato
tika-s0302t:158_13: sayañca akampayaṃ, puggalañca taṃsamaṅgiṃ neyyesu adhibalaṃ karotīti āha “akampanaṭṭhena
tika-s0302t:159_0: Ṭhānañca ṭhānatoti kāraṇañca kāraṇato. Kāraṇañhi yasmā phalaṃ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttitāya
tika-s0302t:159_1: uppajjati ceva pavattati ca, tasmā “ṭhāna”nti vuccati. Vipariyāyena aṭṭhānanti akāraṇaṃ
tika-s0302t:159_2: veditabbaṃ. Tadubhayaṃ bhagavā yena ñāṇena ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ hetū
tika-s0302t:159_3: paccayā uppādāya, taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ, ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ na hetū na paccayā
tika-s0302t:159_4: uppādāya, taṃ taṃ aṭṭhānanti pajānāti. Taṃ sandhāyāha “ṭhānañca…pe… jānanaṃ eka”nti.
tika-s0302t:159_5: Kammasamādānānanti kammaṃ samādiyitvā katānaṃ kusalākusalakammānaṃ, kammaññeva vā
tika-s0302t:159_6: kammasamādānaṃ. Ṭhānaso hetusoti paccayato ca hetuto ca. Tattha gatiupadhikālapayogā
tika-s0302t:159_7: vipākassa ṭhānaṃ, kammaṃ hetu. Sabbatthagāminīpaṭipadājānananti sabbagatigāminiyā
tika-s0302t:159_8: agatigāminiyā ca paṭipadāya maggassa jānanaṃ, bahūsupi manussesu ekameva pāṇaṃ hanantesu
tika-s0302t:159_9: “imassa cetanā nirayagāminī bhavissati, imassa tiracchānayonigāminī”ti iminā nayena
tika-s0302t:159_12: tāsaṃyeva dhātūnaṃ viparītatāya nānappakāradhātuno khandhāyatanadhātulokassa jānanaṃ.
tika-s0302t:159_13: Parasattānanti paresaṃ sattānaṃ. Nānādhimuttikatājānananti hīnādīhi adhimuttīhi nānādhimuttikabhāvassa
tika-s0302t:159_15: indriyānaṃ parabhāvassa aparabhāvassa vuddhiyā ceva hāniyā ca jānanaṃ. Jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnanti
tika-s0302t:159_16: paṭhamādīnaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ, “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ,
tika-s0302t:159_19: “vodānampi vuṭṭhānaṃ, tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhānampi vuṭṭhāna”nti evaṃ vuttapaguṇajjhānassa
tika-s0302t:159_20: ceva bhavaṅgaphalasamāpattīnañca jānanaṃ. Heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimañhi paguṇajjhānaṃ uparimassa
tika-s0302t:159_21: uparimassa padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tasmā vodānampi “vuṭṭhāna”nti vuccati. Bhavaṅgena pana
tika-s0302t:159_22: sabbajhānehi vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Phalasamāpattiyā nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhānameva sandhāya
tika-s0302t:159_23: “tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ. Pubbenivāsajānananti pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena
tika-s0302t:159_24: nivuṭṭhakkhandhānaṃ jānanaṃ. Cutūpapātajānananti sattānaṃ cutiyā upapattiyā ca yāthāvato
tika-s0302t:159_25: jānanaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-s0302t:159_26: Āsavakkhayajānanaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ, maggañāṇanti attho. Yattha panetāni vitthārato
tika-s0302t:160_0: Byāmohabhayavasena saraṇapariyesanaṃ sārajjanaṃ sārado, byāmohabhayaṃ. Vigato sārado
tika-s0302t:160_1: etassāti visārado, tassa bhāvo vesārajjaṃ. Taṃ pana ñāṇasampadaṃ pahānasampadaṃ desanāvisesasampadaṃ
tika-s0302t:160_2: khemaṃ nissāya pavattaṃ catubbidhaṃ paccavekkhaṇāñāṇaṃ. Tenāha “catūsu ṭhānesū”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:160_3: Catūsūti paraparikappitesu vatthūsu. Paraparikappitesu vā vatthumattesu codanākāraṇesu.
tika-s0302t:160_4: Sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānatoti “ahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti evaṃ paṭijānantena tayā.
tika-s0302t:160_5: Ime dhammāti “idaṃ pañcamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, ayaṃ chaṭṭho upādānakkhandho, idaṃ terasamaṃ
tika-s0302t:160_6: āyatana”nti veditabbā ime dhammā. Anabhisambuddhā appaṭividdhattāti.
tika-s0302t:161_0: Tatrāti tasmiṃ anabhisambuddhadhammasaṅkhāte codanāvatthusmiṃ. Kocīti samaṇādīhi
tika-s0302t:161_1: añño vā yo koci. Saha dhammenāti saha hetunā. “Dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu viya hetupariyāyo
tika-s0302t:161_2: idha dhamma-saddo. Hetūti ca uppattisādhanahetu veditabbo, na kārako sampāpako vā.
tika-s0302t:161_3: Nimittanti kāraṇaṃ, taṃ panettha codanāvatthumeva. Na samanupassāmi sammāsambuddhabhāvato.
tika-s0302t:161_4: Khemappattoti akhemappattarūpāya codanāya anupaddavaṃ patto niccalabhāvappatto. Vesārajjappattoti
tika-s0302t:161_5: visāradabhāvappatto. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – ime āsavāti kāmāsavādīsu
tika-s0302t:161_6: ime nāma āsavā na parikkhīṇāti āsavakkhayavacanenettha sabbakilesappahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:161_7: Na hi so kileso atthi, yo sabbaso āsavesu khīṇesu nappahīyeyya. Antarāyikāti antarāyakarā,
tika-s0302t:161_8: saggavimokkhādhigamassa antarāyakarāti attho. Dhammo hi yo saṃkilesato niyyāti, so
tika-s0302t:161_9: “niyyāniko”ti vutto. Dhamme niyyante taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo niyyānikoti voharito hotīti
tika-s0302t:161_10: tassa paṭikkhipanto “so na niyyātī”ti āha. Kathaṃ pana desanādhammo niyyātīti vuccati?
tika-s0302t:161_11: Niyyānatthasamādhānato, so abhedopacārena “niyyātī”ti vutto. Atha vā “dhammo desito”ti
tika-s0302t:162_0: Usabhassa idanti āsabhaṃ, asantasanaṭṭhena āsabhaṃ viyāti āsabhaṃ, seṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0302t:162_1: sabbaññutaṃ. Āsabhaṭṭhānaṭṭhāyitāya āsabhā nāma pubbabuddhā. Sabbaññutapaṭijānanavasena
tika-s0302t:162_2: abhimukhaṃ gacchanti, catasso vā parisā upasaṅkamantīti āsabhā. Catassopi hi parisā
tika-s0302t:162_3: buddhābhimukhā evaṃ tiṭṭhanti, na tiṭṭhanti parammukhā. Idampīti “usabho”ti idampi
tika-s0302t:162_4: padaṃ. Tassāti nisabhassa. Yesaṃ baluppādāvaṭṭhānānaṃ vasena usabhassa āsabhaṇṭhānaṃ
tika-s0302t:162_5: icchitaṃ, tato sātisayānaṃ eva tesaṃ vasena āsabhaṇṭhānaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ
tika-s0302t:162_6: kiñci loke upamaṃ nāma buddhaguṇānaṃ nidassanabhāvena vuccati, sabbaṃ taṃ nihīnameva.
tika-s0302t:162_7: Tiṭṭhamāno cāti atiṭṭhantopi tiṭṭhamāno eva paṭijānāti nāma. Upagacchatīti anujānāti.
tika-s0302t:163_0: Aṭṭha kho imāti idaṃ vesārajjañāṇassa baladassanaṃ. Yathā hi byattaṃ parisaṃ ajjhogāhetvā
tika-s0302t:163_1: viññūnaṃ cittaṃ ārādhanasamatthāya kathāya dhammakathikassa chekabhāvo paññāyati,
tika-s0302t:163_2: evaṃ imā aṭṭha parisā patvā satthu vesārajjañāṇassa balaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0302t:163_3: “parisāsū”ti. Khattiyaparisāti khattiyānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ samūho. Esa nayo sabbattha.
tika-s0302t:163_4: Māraparisāti mārakāyikānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ samūho. Mārasadisānaṃ mārānaṃ parisāti
tika-s0302t:163_5: māraparisā. Sabbā cetā parisā uggaṭṭhānadassanavasena gahitā. Manussā hi “ettha rājā
tika-s0302t:163_6: nisinno”ti vutte pakativacanampi vattuṃ na sakkonti, kacchehi sedā muccanti, evaṃ
tika-s0302t:163_7: uggā khattiyaparisā, brāhmaṇā tīsu vedesu kusalā honti, gahapatayo nānāvohāresu ca
tika-s0302t:163_8: akkharacintāya ca kusalā, samaṇā sakavādaparavādesu kusalā, tesaṃ majjhe dhammakathākathanaṃ
tika-s0302t:163_9: nāma ativiya bhāriyaṃ. Devānaṃ uggabhāve vattabbameva natthi. Amanussoti hi vuttamatte
tika-s0302t:163_10: manussānaṃ sakalasarīraṃ kampati, tesaṃ rūpaṃ disvāpi saddaṃ sutvāpi sattā visaññitāpi
tika-s0302t:163_11: honti. Evaṃ amanussaparisā uggā. Iti cetā parisā uggaṭṭhānadassanavasena vuttā. Kasmā
tika-s0302t:163_12: panettha yāmādiparisā na gahitāti? Bhusaṃ kāmābhigiddhatāya yonisomanasikāravirahato.
tika-s0302t:163_13: Yāmādayo hi uḷāruḷāre kāme paṭisevantā tatthābhigiddhatāya dhammassavanāya sabhāvena
tika-s0302t:163_14: cittampi na uppādenti, mahābodhisattānaṃ pana buddhānañca ānubhāvena ākaḍḍhiyamānā
tika-s0302t:163_15: kadāci nesaṃ payirupāsanādīni karonti tādise mahāsamaye. Teneva hi vimānavatthudesanāpi
tika-s0302t:163_16: taṃnimittā bahulā nāhosi. Seṭṭhanādanti kenaci appaṭihatabhāvena uttamanādaṃ. Abhītanādanti
tika-s0302t:163_17: vesārajjayogato kutoci nibbhayanādaṃ. Sīhanādasuttenāti khandhiyavagge āgatena sīhanādasuttena.
tika-s0302t:163_18: Sahanatoti khamanato. Hananatoti vidhamanato viddhaṃsanato. Yathā vātiādi “sīhanādasadisaṃ
tika-s0302t:163_19: vā nādaṃ nadatī”ti saṅkhepato vuttassa atthassa viññāpanaṃ.
tika-s0302t:164_0: Etanti “brahmacakka”nti etaṃ padaṃ. Paññāpabhāvitanti cirakālaparibhāvitāya pāramitāpaññāya
tika-s0302t:164_1: vipassanāpaññāya ca uppāditaṃ. Karuṇāpabhāvitanti “kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno”tiādinayappavattāya
tika-s0302t:164_2: mahākaruṇāya uppāditaṃ. Yathā abhinikkhamanato pabhuti mahābodhisattānaṃ ariyamaggādhigamanavirodhinī
tika-s0302t:164_3: paṭipatti natthi, evaṃ tusitabhavanato niyatabhāvāpattito ca paṭṭhāyāti dutiyatatiyanayā
tika-s0302t:164_4: ca gahitā. Phalakkhaṇeti aggaphalakkhaṇe. Paṭivedhaniṭṭhattā arahattamaggañāṇaṃ vajirūpamatāyeva
tika-s0302t:164_5: sātisayo paṭivedhoti “phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Tena paṭiladdhassapi desanāñāṇassa
tika-s0302t:164_6: kiccanipphatti parassa bujjhanamattena hotīti “aññāsikoṇḍaññassa sotāpatti…pe… phalakkhaṇe
tika-s0302t:164_7: pavattanaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Tato paraṃ pana yāva parinibbānā desanāñāṇappavatti, tasseva
tika-s0302t:164_8: pavattitassa dhammacakkassa ṭhānanti veditabbaṃ pavattitacakkassa cakkavattino cakkaratanassa
tika-s0302t:164_9: ṭhānaṃ viya. Ubhayampīti pi-saddena lokiyadesanāñāṇassa itarena anaññasādhāraṇatāvasena
tika-s0302t:164_10: samānataṃ sampiṇḍeti. Urasi jātatāya uraso sambhūtanti orasaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t:165_0: Iti rūpanti ettha iti-saddo anavasesato rūpassa sarūpanidassanatthoti tassa “idaṃ
tika-s0302t:165_1: rūpa”nti etena sādhāraṇato ca sarūpanidassanamāha. Ettakaṃ rūpanti etena anavasesato
tika-s0302t:165_2: “ito uddhaṃ rūpaṃ natthī”ti nimittassa aññassa abhāvaṃ. Idāni tamatthaṃ vitthārato
tika-s0302t:165_4: visadisuppatti. Ādi-saddena ajjhattikabāhirādibhedaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Lakkhaṇa…pe… vasenāti
tika-s0302t:165_6: bhūtattayādipadaṭṭhānavasena ca. Evaṃ pariggahitassāti evaṃ sādhāraṇato ca lakkhaṇādito
tika-s0302t:165_7: ca pariggahitassa. Avijjāsamudayāti avijjāya uppādā, atthibhāvāti attho. Nirodhavirodhī
tika-s0302t:165_8: hi atthibhāvo hoti, tasmā nirodhe asati atthibhāvo hoti, tasmā purimabhave siddhāya
tika-s0302t:165_9: avijjāya sati imasmiṃ bhave rūpassa samudayo rūpassa uppādo hotīti attho. Taṇhāsamudayā
tika-s0302t:165_10: kammasamudayāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Avijjādīhi ca tīhi atītakālikattā tesaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhūtaṃ
tika-s0302t:165_11: upādānampi gahitamevāti veditabbaṃ. Pavattipaccayesu kabaḷīkāraāhārassa balavatāya,
tika-s0302t:165_12: so eva gahito, “āhārasamudayā”ti pana gahitena pavattipaccayatāmattena utucittānipi
tika-s0302t:165_13: gahitāneva hontīti dvādasasamuṭṭhānikaṃ rūpassa paccayato dassanampi bhavitabbamevāti
tika-s0302t:165_14: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nibbattilakkhaṇantiādinā kālavasena udayadassanamāha. Tattha bhūtavasena
tika-s0302t:165_15: magge udayaṃ passitvā ṭhito idha santativasena anukkamena khaṇavasena passati. Avijjānirodhā
tika-s0302t:165_16: rūpanirodhoti aggamaggañāṇena avijjāya anuppādanirodhato anāgatassa anuppādanirodho
tika-s0302t:165_17: hoti paccayābhāve abhāvato. Paccayanirodhenāti avijjāsaṅkhātassa paccayassa nirodhabhāvena.
tika-s0302t:165_18: Taṇhānirodhāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Āhāranirodhāti pavattipaccayassa kabaḷīkārāhārassa
tika-s0302t:165_19: abhāvā. Rūpanirodhāti taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa abhāvo hoti. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena
tika-s0302t:165_20: veditabbaṃ. Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇanti bhavakālavasena hetudvayadassanaṃ. Tasmā taṃ padaṭṭhānavasena
tika-s0302t:165_21: pageva passitvā ṭhito idha santativasena disvā anukkamena khaṇavasena passati.
tika-s0302t:166_0: Iti vedanātiādīsupi vuttanayena attho veditabbo. Sukhādibhedanti sukhadukkhaadukkhamasukhādivibhāgaṃ.
tika-s0302t:166_1: Rūpasaññādibhedanti rūpasaññā, sadda… gandha… rasa… phoṭṭhabba … dhammasaññādivibhāgaṃ.
tika-s0302t:166_4: “Phuṭṭho vedeti, phuṭṭho sañjānāti, phuṭṭho cetetī”ti vacanato tīsu vedanādīsu khandhesu
tika-s0302t:166_5: phassasamudayāti vattabbaṃ. Viññāṇappaccayā nāmarūpa”nti vacanato viññāṇakkhandhe
tika-s0302t:167_0: Upādānakkhandhānaṃ samudayatthaṅgamavasena titthiyānaṃ avisayopi sappadeso sīhanādo
tika-s0302t:167_1: dassito. Idāni nippadeso anulomapaṭilomavasena saṅkhepato vitthārato paccayākāravisayo
tika-s0302t:167_2: anaññasādhāraṇo dassīyatīti āha, “ayampi aparo sīhanādo”ti. Tassāti “imasmiṃ satī”tiādinā
tika-s0302t:167_3: saṅkhepato vuttapaṭiccasamuppādapāḷiyā. Ettha ca “imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imassa
tika-s0302t:167_4: nirodhā idaṃ nirujhtī”ti avijjādīnaṃ bhāve saṅkhārādīnaṃ bhāvassa, avijjādīnaṃ nirodhe
tika-s0302t:167_5: saṅkhārādīnaṃ nirodhassa kathanena purimasmiṃ paccayalakkhaṇe niyamo dassito “imasmiṃ
tika-s0302t:167_6: sati eva, nāsati, imassa uppādā eva, nānuppādā, nirodhā eva, nānirodhā”ti. Tenedaṃ
tika-s0302t:167_7: lakkhaṇaṃ antogadhaniyamaṃ idha paṭiccasamuppādassa vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nirodhoti
tika-s0302t:167_8: ca avijjādīnaṃ virāgā vigamena āyatiṃ anuppādo appavatti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “avijjāya
tika-s0302t:167_9: tveva asesavirāganirodhā”tiādi. Nirodhavirodhī ca uppādo, yena so uppādanirodhavibhāgena
tika-s0302t:167_10: vutto “imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatī”ti. Tenetaṃ dasseti “asati nirodhe uppādo nāma,
tika-s0302t:167_11: so cettha atthibhāvoti vuccatī”ti. “Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotī”ti idameva hi lakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t:167_12: Pariyāyantarena “imassa uppādā idaṃ uppajjatī”ti vadantena parena purimaṃ visesitaṃ
tika-s0302t:167_13: hoti. Tasmā na vattamānaṃyeva sandhāya “imasmiṃ satī”ti vuttaṃ, atha kho maggena
tika-s0302t:167_14: anirujjhanasabhāvañcāti viññāyati. Yasmā ca “imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti, imassa nirodhā
tika-s0302t:167_15: idaṃ nirujjhatī”ti dvidhāpi uddiṭṭhassa lakkhaṇassa niddesaṃ vadantena bhagavatā
tika-s0302t:167_16: “avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā saṅkhāranirodho”tiādinā nirodhova vutto, tasmā
tika-s0302t:167_17: natthibhāvopi nirodho evāti natthibhāvaviruddho atthibhāvo anirodhoti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0302t:167_18: Tena anirodhasaṅkhātena atthibhāvena uppādaṃ viseseti. Tato idha na kevalaṃ atthibhāvamattaṃ
tika-s0302t:167_19: uppādoti attho adhippeto, atha kho anirodhasaṅkhāto atthibhāvo cāti ayamattho vibhāvito
tika-s0302t:167_20: hoti. Evametaṃ lakkhaṇadvayavacanaṃ aññamaññaṃ visesanavisesitabbabhāvena sātthakanti
tika-s0302t:167_21: veditabbaṃ. Ko panāyaṃ anirodho nāma, yo “atthibhāvo, uppādo”ti ca vuttoti? Appahīnabhāvo
tika-s0302t:167_22: ca anibbattitaphalabhāvena phaluppādanārahatā cāti ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana
tika-s0302t:168_1: vibhajanavasena. Imasmiñhi dasabalasutte dhammassa desitākāro pañcakkhandhapaccayākāramatto.
tika-s0302t:168_3: pana atthato ca saddato ca pihito heṭṭhāmukhajāto vā na hotīti āha “anikujjito”ti.
tika-s0302t:168_4: Vivaṭoti vibhāvito. Tenāha “vivaritvā ṭhapito”ti. Pakāsitoti ñāṇobhāsena obhāsito
tika-s0302t:168_5: ādīpitoti āha “dīpito jotito”ti. Tattha tattha chinnabhinnaṭṭhāne. Sibbitagaṇṭhitanti
tika-s0302t:168_6: vākaṃ gahetvā sibbitaṃ, sibbituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṭṭhāne vākena gaṇṭhitañca. Chinnapilotikābhāvena
tika-s0302t:168_7: vigatapilotiko dhammo, tassa chinnapilotikassa paṭilomatā chinnabhinnatābhāvenāti
tika-s0302t:168_8: dassento “na hetthā”tiādimāha. Nivāsanapārupanaṃ pariggahaṇaṃ. Sayaṃ paṭibhānaṃ kappetvā.
tika-s0302t:168_9: Vaḍḍhentā attano samayaṃ. Samaṇakacavaranti samaṇavesadhāraṇavasena samaṇapaṭirūpatāya
tika-s0302t:168_10: samaṇānaṃ kacavarabhūtaṃ. Attano rūpapavattiyā karaṇḍaṃ kucchitaṃ dhuttaṃ vāti pavattetīti
tika-s0302t:168_11: kāraṇḍavo, dussīlo. Taṃ kāraṇḍavaṃ. Niddhamathāti nīharatha. Kasambunti samaṇakasaṭaṃ.
tika-s0302t:168_12: Apakassathāti apakaḍḍhatha nanti attho. Palāpeti palāpasadise. Tathā hi taṇḍulasārarahito
tika-s0302t:168_13: dhaññapaṭirūpako thusamattako palāpoti vuccati, evaṃ sīlādisārarahito samaṇapaṭirūpako
tika-s0302t:168_14: palāpo viyāti palāpo, dussīlo. Te palāpe. Vāhethāti apanetha. Patissatāti bāḷhasatitāya patissatā hothāti.
tika-s0302t:169_0: Saddhāya pabbajitenāti rājūpaddavādīhi anupaddutena “evañhi taṃ otiṇṇaṃ jātiādisaṃsārabhayaṃ
tika-s0302t:169_1: vijinissāmī”ti vaṭṭanissaraṇatthaṃ āgatāya saddhāya vasena pabbajitena. Ācārakulaputtoti
tika-s0302t:169_2: ācārena abhijāto. Tenāha “yato kutocī”tiādi. Jātikulaputtoti jātisampattiyā abhijāto.
tika-s0302t:169_3: Viññuppasatthāni aṅgāni sammāpadhāniyaṅgabhāvena, kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkhabhāvena
tika-s0302t:169_4: vīriyaṃ ārabhantassa tathāpavattavīriyavasena “taco ekaṃ aṅga”nti vuttaṃ. Esa nayo
tika-s0302t:169_5: sesesupi. Navasu ṭhānesu samādhātabbanti “kālavasena pañcasu, iriyāpathavasena catūsū”ti
tika-s0302t:169_6: evaṃ navasu ṭhānesu vīriyaṃ samādhātabbaṃ pavattetabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:170_0: So dukkhaṃ viharatīti kusītapuggalo niyyānikasāsane vīriyārambhassa akaraṇena sāmaññatthassa
tika-s0302t:170_1: anuppattiyā dukkhaṃ viharati. Sakaṃ vā atthaṃ sadatthaṃ ka-kārassa da-kāraṃ katvā.
tika-s0302t:170_2: Kusītassa atthaparihāyanaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ “cha dvārānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Nisajjāvasena
tika-s0302t:170_3: pīṭhamaddanato pīṭhamaddano, nirassanavacanaṃ tassa, kassacipatthassa adhāraṇato
tika-s0302t:170_4: kevalaṃ pīṭhabhārabhūtoti adhippāyo. Aññattha pana “makhamaddano”ti vuccati, tattha
tika-s0302t:170_5: dānamicchāya paresaṃ makhaṃ passantoti attho. Laṇḍapūrakoti kucchipūraṃ bhuñjitvā vaccakuṭipūrako.
tika-s0302t:171_1: āsīsāya vasena thomito. Āraddhavīriyeti paggahitavīriye. Pahitatteti nibbānaṃ patipesitacitte.
tika-s0302t:172_0: Hīnenāti vaṭṭanissitena dhammena. Tenāha “hīnāya saddhāyā”tiādi. Aggenāti seṭṭhena
tika-s0302t:172_1: vivaṭṭanissitena dhammena, īsakampi katakālusiyavigataṭṭhena maṇḍaṭṭhena ca pasannampi
tika-s0302t:172_2: surādi na pātabbaṃ. Sāsananti pariyattipaṭipattipaṭivedhalakkhaṇaṃ sāsanaṃ. Pasannaṃ
tika-s0302t:172_3: vigatadosamalattā pasādaniyattā ca. Pātabbañca pattena viya sukhena paribhuñjitabbato
tika-s0302t:173_0: Maṇḍabhūtā bodhipakkhiyadhammadesanāpi desanāmaṇḍo. Tassa ekasseva pana desanāmaṇḍassa
tika-s0302t:173_1: paṭiggāhakā suppaṭipannā dosarahitā catasso parisā paṭiggahamaṇḍo. Maggabrahmacariyaṃ
tika-s0302t:173_2: taggatikattā sakalopi bodhipakkhiyadhammarāsi brahmacariyamaṇḍo. Tenāha “katamo desanāmaṇḍo”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:173_3: Tattha viññātāroti saccānaṃ abhisametāvino. Tathā hi ādito “catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ
tika-s0302t:173_4: ācikkhaṇā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pubbabhāge “atthi ayaṃ loko”tiādinā idhalokaparalokagatasammosavigamena
tika-s0302t:173_5: pavatto adhimokkhova adhimokkhamaṇḍo. Chaḍḍetvā samucchedavasena vijahitvā. Catubhūmakassa
tika-s0302t:173_7: vīriyindriyaṃ kosajjakasaṭa”ntiādiṃ pāḷisesaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Etthāti etasmiṃ sāsane,
tika-s0302t:173_8: “maṇḍasmi”nti vā vacane. Kāraṇavacanaṃ, tena “satthā sammukhībhūto”ti sammukhabhāvanāyogo
tika-s0302t:173_9: nirāsaṅkaphalāvahoti dasseti. Tenāha “asammukhā”tiādi. Pamāṇanti anurūpaṃ bhesajjassa
tika-s0302t:173_10: pamāṇaṃ. Uggamananti bhesajjassa vamanaṃ virecanaṃ, tassa vā vasena dosadhātūnaṃ
tika-s0302t:173_11: vamanaṃ virecanaṃ. Evamevāti yathā bhesajjamaṇḍaṃ vejjasammukhā nirāsaṅkā pivanti,
tika-s0302t:173_12: evameva “satthā sammukhībhūto”ti nirāsaṅkā vīriyaṃ katvā, maṇḍapeyya sāsanaṃ pivathāti
tika-s0302t:173_13: yojanā. Abhiññāsamāpattipaṭilābhena sānisaṃsā. Maggaphalādhigamanena savaḍḍhi. Paratthanti
tika-s0302t:173_14: attano diṭṭhānugatiāpattiyā, tathā sammāpaṭipajjantānaṃ paresaṃ atthanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0302t:176_0: 23. Jānato passatoti ettha dassanaṃ paññācakkhunāva dassanaṃ adhippetaṃ, na maṃsacakkhunāti
tika-s0302t:176_1: āha “dvepi padāni ekatthānī”ti. Evaṃ santepīti padadvayassa ekatthattepi ñāṇalakkhaṇañāṇappabhāvavisayasssa
tika-s0302t:176_3: ñāṇānubhāvena ñāṇakiccavisayobhāsanti attho. Tenāha “ñāṇena vivaṭṭe dhamme passatī”ti.
tika-s0302t:176_4: Jānato passatoti ca jānanadassanamukhena puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā pavattāti āha –
tika-s0302t:176_5: “ñāṇalakkhaṇaṃ upādāyā”tiādi. Jānatoti vā pubbabhāgañāṇena jānato, aparabhāgena ñāṇena
tika-s0302t:176_6: passato. Jānatoti vā vatvā na jānanaṃ anussavākāraparivitakkamattavasena idhādhippetaṃ,
tika-s0302t:176_7: atha kho rūpāni viya cakkhuviññāṇena rūpādīni tesañca samudayādike paccakkhe katvā
tika-s0302t:176_8: dassananti vibhāvetuṃ “passato”ti vuttanti evaṃ vā ettha attho.
tika-s0302t:177_0: Āsavānaṃ khayanti āsavānaṃ accantappahānaṃ. So pana tesaṃ anuppādanirodho sabbena
tika-s0302t:177_1: sabbaṃ abhāvo evāti āha “asamuppādo khīṇākāro natthibhāvo”ti. Āsavakkhayasaddassa
tika-s0302t:177_2: khīṇākārādīsu āgataṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ “āsavānaṃ khayā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ujumaggānusārinoti
tika-s0302t:177_4: Yadeva hissa parikkhīṇaṃ. Khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ “tato aññā anantarā”ti khayasaṅkhāte
tika-s0302t:177_5: aggamagge tappariyāpannameva ñāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati, tadanantaraṃ pana aññā arahattanti.
tika-s0302t:177_6: Yadipi gāthāya “khayasmiṃ”icceva vuttaṃ, samucchedavasena pana “āsave khīṇe maggo
tika-s0302t:177_7: khayo”ti vuccatīti āha “maggo āsavakkhayoti vutto”ti. Samaṇoti samitapāpo adhippeto,
tika-s0302t:177_8: so pana khīṇāsavo hotīti. “Āsavānaṃ khayā”ti idha phalaṃ, pariyāyena pana āsavakkhayo
tika-s0302t:177_9: maggo, tena pattabbato phalaṃ. Eteneva nibbānassapi āsavakkhayabhāvo vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-s0302t:178_0: Jānato eva passato evāti evamettha niyamo icchito, na aññathā visesābhāvato aniṭṭhāpannovāti
tika-s0302t:178_1: tassa niyamassa phalaṃ dassetuṃ “no ajānato no apassato”ti vuttanti āha “yo pana
tika-s0302t:178_2: na jānāti, na passati, tassa no vadāmīti attho”ti. Iminā khandhānaṃ pariññā āsavakkhayassa
tika-s0302t:178_3: ekantikakāraṇanti dasseti. Etenāti “no ajānato, no apassato”ti etena vacanena. Te
tika-s0302t:178_4: paṭikkhittāti ke pana teti? “Bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ
tika-s0302t:178_5: karissanti ahetū appaccayā sattā visujjhantī”ti evamādivādā. Tesu keci abhijātisaṅkantimattena
tika-s0302t:178_6: saṃsārasuddhiṃ paṭijānanti, aññe issarapajāpatikāraṇādivasena. Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ saṃsārādīhīti
tika-s0302t:178_7: ettheva saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Purimena padadvayenāti “jānato passato”ti iminā
tika-s0302t:178_8: padadvayena. Upāyo vutto “āsavakkhayā”ti adhikārato. Imināti “no ajānato, no apassato”ti
tika-s0302t:178_9: iminā padadvayena. Anupāyo hoti esa āsavānaṃ khayassa, yadidaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ
tika-s0302t:178_10: apariññāti “jānato passato”ti imināva aniyamavacanena anupāyapaṭisedhopi atthato
tika-s0302t:178_11: bodhito hotīti. Tameva hi atthato bodhitabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ evaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā katāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:179_0: Dabbajātikoti dabbarūpo. So hi “drabyo”ti vuccati “drabyaṃ vinassati nādrabya”ntiādīsu.
tika-s0302t:179_1: Dabbajātiko vā sārasabhāvo, sāruppasīlācāroti attho. Yathāha “na kho dabba dabbā
tika-s0302t:179_2: evaṃ nibbeṭhentī”ti. Vattasīse ṭhatvāti vattaṃ uttamaṃ dhuraṃ katvā. Yo hi parisuddhājīvo
tika-s0302t:179_3: kātuṃ ajānantānaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ attano vā vassavātādipaṭibāhanatthaṃ chattādīni
tika-s0302t:179_4: karoti, so vattasīse ṭhatvā karoti nāma. Padaṭṭhānaṃ na hotīti na vattabbaṃ nāthakaraṇadhammabhāvena
tika-s0302t:179_5: maggaphalādhigamassa upanissayabhāvato. Vuttañhi “yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnaṃ uccāvacāni
tika-s0302t:179_6: kiccakaraṇīyāni, tattha dakkho hotī”tiādi. Evaṃ jānatoti evaṃ vejjakammādīnaṃ jānanahetu
tika-s0302t:179_7: micchājīvapaccayā kāmāsavādayo āsavā vaḍḍhantiyeva, na pahīyanti. “Evaṃ kho…pe… āsavānaṃ
tika-s0302t:179_8: khayo hotī”ti imāya pāḷiyā arahattasseva gahaṇaṃ yuttaṃ phalaggahaṇena hetuno avuttasiddhattā.
tika-s0302t:180_0: Āgamanaṃ āgamo, taṃ āvahatīti āgamanīyā, pubbabhāgapaṭipadā. Khayasminti bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇe
tika-s0302t:180_1: bhummaṃ, khayeti pana visaye. Tenāha “āsavakkhayasaṅkhāte”ti. Upanisīdati phalaṃ
tika-s0302t:180_2: etthāti kāraṇaṃ upanisā. Arahattaphalavimutti ukkaṭṭhaniddesato. Sāti vimutti. Assāti
tika-s0302t:180_3: paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa. Manasmiṃ vivaṭṭanissite pana anantarūpanissayāpi paccayā sambhavantīti
tika-s0302t:181_0: Virajjati asesasaṅkhārato etenāti virāgo, maggo. Nibbindati etāyāti nibbidā, balavavipassanā.
tika-s0302t:181_3: taruṇavipassanā”ti hi vacanato upakkilesavimuttaudayabbayañāṇato paraṃ balavavipassanā.
tika-s0302t:181_4: Rūpārūpadhammānaṃ visesabhūto sāmaññabhūto ca yo yo sabhāvo yathāsabhāvo, tassa jānanaṃ
tika-s0302t:181_5: yathāsabhāvajānanaṃ. Tadeva dassanaṃ. Paccakkhakaraṇatthena ñātapariññā tīraṇapariññā
tika-s0302t:181_6: ca gahitā hoti. Tenāha “taruṇavipassana”ntiādi. Saṅkhāraparicchedeñāṇanti nāmarūpapariggahañāṇaṃ
tika-s0302t:181_7: vadati. Kaṅkhāvitaraṇaṃ paccayapariggaho dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇantipi vuccati. Nayavipassanādikaṃ
tika-s0302t:181_8: anupassanāñāṇaṃ sammasanaṃ. Maggāmaggeñāṇanti maggāmaggaṃ vavatthapetvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t:181_9: So hi pādakajjhānasamādhi taruṇavipassanāya paccayo hoti. “Samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti
tika-s0302t:182_1: paṭipassambhanaṃ. “Sukhaṃpāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṃ vadāmī”ti ettha adhippetasukhaṃ
tika-s0302t:182_3: vuttaappanāsukhassa passaddhiyā paccayatte vattabbameva natthi. Sukhanti etthāpi
tika-s0302t:182_4: eseva nayo. Balavapītīti pharaṇalakkhaṇappattā pīti. Tādisā hi vitakkavicārasukhasamādhīhi
tika-s0302t:182_5: laddhappaccayā nīvaraṇaṃ vikkhambhantī taṃnimittaṃ darathaṃ pariḷāhaṃ paṭipassambheti.
tika-s0302t:182_6: Tenāha “sā hi darathappassaddhiyā paccayo hotī”ti. Dubbalapītīti taruṇapīti. Tenāha
tika-s0302t:182_7: “sā hi balavapītiyā paccayo hotī”ti. Saddhāti ratanattayaguṇānaṃ kammaphalassa ca
tika-s0302t:182_8: saddahanavasena pavatto adhimokkho, sā pana yasmā attano visaye punappunaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0302t:182_9: na ekavārameva, tasmā āha “aparāparaṃ uppajjanasaddhā”ti. Yasmā saddahanto saddheyyavatthusmiṃ
tika-s0302t:182_10: pamudito hoti, tasmā āha “sā hi dubbalapītiyā paccayo hotī”ti. Dukkhadukkhādibhedassa
tika-s0302t:182_11: sabbassapi dukkhassa vaṭṭadukkhantogadhattā tassa ca idhādhippetattā vuttaṃ “dukkhanti
tika-s0302t:182_12: vaṭṭadukkha”nti. Jarāmaraṇadukkhanti keci, sokādayo cāti apare. Tadubhayassapi saṅgaṇhanato
tika-s0302t:182_13: paṭhamo evattho yutto. Yasmā dukkhappatto kammassa phalāni saddahati, ratanattaye
tika-s0302t:182_14: ca pasādaṃ uppādeti, tasmā vuttaṃ “tañhi aparāparasaddhāya paccayo hotī”ti. Yasmā
tika-s0302t:182_15: “ācariyānaṃ santike dhammaṃ sutvā pavattidukkha”nti cintayato “ekantato ayaṃ dhammo
tika-s0302t:182_16: imassa dukkhassa samatikkamāya hotī”ti saddhā uppajjati. Tenāha “dhammaṃ sutvā tathāgate
tika-s0302t:182_17: saddhaṃ paṭilabhatī”tiādi. Savikārāti uppādavikārena savikārā khandhajāti jāyanaṭṭhena.
tika-s0302t:182_18: Jātiyā pana asati tattha tattha bhave natthi dukkhassa sambhavoti āha “sā hi vaṭṭadukkhassa
tika-s0302t:182_19: paccayo”ti. Kammabhavoti kammabhavādiko tividhopi kammabhavo. So hi upapattibhavassa
tika-s0302t:182_20: paccayo. Evamādiṃ sandhāyāha “etenupāyenā”ti. Sesapadānīti upādānādipadāni. Anulomañāṇaṃ
tika-s0302t:182_22: āvajjanaṃ. So hi tena vipassanāya kiñci kiñci visesaṭṭhānaṃ kayiratīti taṃ anāmasitvā
tika-s0302t:183_0: Kena udakena vidārayitvā gatapadesoti katvā kandaro. Nitambotipi udakassa. Yathā
tika-s0302t:183_1: ninnaṃ udakaṃ pavattati, tathā nivattanabhāvena nadīkuñchotipi vuccati. Hemantagimhautuvasena
tika-s0302t:183_2: aṭṭha māse pavatto pathavīvivaroti katvā padaro. Khuddikā udakavāhiniyo sākhā viyāti
tika-s0302t:183_3: sākhā, khuddakā sobbhā kusubbhā o-kārassa u-kāraṃ katvā. Evameva khotiādi “seyyathāpi,
tika-s0302t:183_4: bhikkhave”tiādinā upanītāya upamāya upameyyena saṃsandananti, taṃ yojetvā dassetuṃ
tika-s0302t:183_5: “avijjā pabbatoti daṭṭhabbā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha avijjā ca santānavasena ciraṃtanakālappavattanato
tika-s0302t:183_7: ca abhisaṅkhārā meghasadisā. Abhisaṅkhārā meghoti daṭṭhabbāti ānetvā sambandho. Tathā
tika-s0302t:183_8: sesapadadvayepi. Viññāṇādivaṭṭaṃ anupavattito paramparapaccayato ca kandarādisadisā.
tika-s0302t:183_9: Vimutti ekarasattā, hānivuddhiabhāvato ca sāgarasadisāti upamāsaṃsandanaṃ.
tika-s0302t:184_0: Tattha yasmā purimasiddhāya avijjāya sati abhisaṅkhārā, nāsati, tasmā te uparipabbate
tika-s0302t:184_1: pavattā viya hontīti vuttaṃ “avijjā…pe… vassanaṃ veditabba”nti. Assutavā hītiādi
tika-s0302t:184_2: vuttasseva atthassa samatthanaṃ. Taṇhāya abhilāsaṃ katvāti etena sabbassapi abhisaṅkhāravuṭṭhitemanatthaṃ
tika-s0302t:184_3: dīpeti. Taṇhā hi “sneho”ti vuttā. Antimabhavikassa antabhavanibbattako abhisaṅkhāro
tika-s0302t:184_4: nibbānaṃ na patto, tadantassa bhāgassa nibbānaṃ āhacca ṭhito viya hotīti “mahāsamuddaṃ
tika-s0302t:184_5: āhacca ṭhitakālo viyā”ti upamānidassanaṃ kataṃ. Viññāṇādivaṭṭaṃ pūretvāpi imināpi
tika-s0302t:184_6: hi antimabhavikasseva viññāṇappavatti dassitā. Sā hi pūritāti vattabbā tato paraṃ
tika-s0302t:184_7: viññāṇādivaṭṭasseva abhāvato. Jātassa puggalassa jātipaccayavaṭṭadukkhavedanāya dhammassavanaṃ
tika-s0302t:184_8: icchitabbaṃ, taṃ pana yadipi imasmiṃ sutte na āgataṃ, suttantaresu pana āgatamevāti
tika-s0302t:184_9: tato āharitvā taṃ vattabbanti dassento “buddhavacanaṃ panā”tiādimāha. Tayidaṃ sāvakabodhisattānaṃ
tika-s0302t:184_10: vasenāyaṃ desanāti katvā vuttaṃ. Itaresaṃ pana vasena vuccamānaṃ suttantaraggahaṇatthaṃ
tika-s0302t:184_11: payojanaṃ natthīti “yā hī”tiādimāha. Pāḷiyā vasena gahitamevāti saṅkhepato vuttaatthassa
tika-s0302t:184_12: vitthārato dassanaṃ. Nibbattīti nibbattamānā khandhā gahitāti āha “savikārā”ti. Aniccatālakkhaṇādidīpanato
tika-s0302t:184_13: lakkhaṇāhaṭaṃ. Kammākammanti vinicchayaṃ. Nijjaṭanti niggumbaṃ, suddhanti attho.
tika-s0302t:184_14: Pathavīkasiṇādīsu kammaṃ ārabhatītiādi pāḷiyaṃ samathapubbaṅgamā vipassanā dassitāti
tika-s0302t:184_15: katvā vuttaṃ. Evañhi pāmojjādidassanaṃ sambhavatīti. Devassāti meghassa. Kasmā panettha
tika-s0302t:184_16: “khīṇāsavassa…pe… ṭhitakālo veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ, nanu pubbe devaṭṭhāniyo abhisaṅkhāro
tika-s0302t:184_17: vutto, na abhisaṅkhāro khīṇāsavoti? Nāyaṃ doso, kāraṇūpacārena phalassa vuttattā.
tika-s0302t:184_18: Abhisaṅkhāramūlako hi khandhasantāno khandhasantāne ca ucchinnasaṃyoge khīṇāsavasamaññāti.
tika-s0302t:187_0: 24. Soti sāriputtatthero. Yadi na tāva paviṭṭho, kasmā “pāvisī”ti vuttanti āha “pavisissāmī”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:187_1: Tena avassambhāvini bhūte viya upacāro hotīti dasseti. Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvento
tika-s0302t:187_3: ativiya pāto eva vihārato nikkhantadivasabhāgo. Etadahosīti etaṃ “atippago kho”tiādikaṃ
tika-s0302t:187_4: cintanaṃ ahosi. Dakkhiṇadvārassāti rājagahanagare dakkhiṇadvārassa veḷuvanassa ca
tika-s0302t:187_5: antarā ahosi, tasmā “tenupasaṅkamissa”nti cintanā ahosīti adhippāyo. Kiṃ vādīti catūsu
tika-s0302t:187_6: vādesu kataraṃ vādaṃ vadasi. Kimakkhāyīti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Kiṃ vadatīti pana cattāro
tika-s0302t:187_7: vāde sāmaññato gahetvā napuṃsakaliṅgena vadati yathā kiṃ te jātaliṅgaṃ. Sabbanāmañhetaṃ,
tika-s0302t:187_8: yadidaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ. Vadati etenāti vādo, dassanaṃ. Taṃ sandhāyāha “kiṃ ettha…pe…
tika-s0302t:187_10: āha “yaṃ vuttaṃ kāraṇaṃ, tassa anukāraṇa”nti. Vādassa vacanassa anuppatti vādappavatti.
tika-s0302t:188_0: Idaṃ vacananti “ekamidāha”ntiādivacanaṃ. Sāti “eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā”ti evaṃ
tika-s0302t:188_1: pavattakathā. Accharaṃ aṅguliphoṭanaṃ arahatīti acchariyaṃ. Abbhutanti niruttinayena
tika-s0302t:188_2: padasiddhi daṭṭhabbā. Sabbavādānanti sabbesaṃ catubbidhavādānaṃ. Paṭhamo hettha sassatavādo,
tika-s0302t:188_3: dutiyo ucchedavādo, tatiyo ekaccasassatavādo, catuttho adhiccasamuppannavādo, tesaṃ
tika-s0302t:188_4: sabbesaṃ paṭikkhepato paṭikkhepakāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Paṭiccasamuppādakittanaṃ vā pacurajanañāṇassa
tika-s0302t:188_5: alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhatāya gambhīrañceva, tathā avabhāsanato cetasi upaṭṭhānato gambhīrāvabhāsañca
tika-s0302t:188_6: karonto. Tadeva padanti phassapadaṃyeva ādibhūtaṃ gahetvā.
tika-s0302t:191_0: 25. Purimasutteti anantare purime sutte. Vuttanayeneva veditabbanti padatthe tato
tika-s0302t:191_1: visiṭṭhaṃ aniddisitvā itaraṃ atthato vibhāvetuṃ “ayaṃ pana viseso”tiādimāha. Na kevalaṃ
tika-s0302t:191_2: phassapaccayā uppajjati, atha kho phassassa sahakārīkāraṇabhūtaaññapaccayā ca uppajjatīti.
tika-s0302t:191_3: Kāyenāti copanakāyena, kāyaviññattiyāti attho. Sā hi kāmaṃ paṭṭhāne āgatesu catuvīsatiyā
tika-s0302t:191_4: paccayesu kenaci paccayena cetanāya paccayo na hoti. Yasmā pana kāye sati eva kāyakammaṃ
tika-s0302t:191_5: nāma hoti, nāsati, tasmā sā tassā sāmaggiyabhāvena icchitabbāti vuttaṃ “kāyenapi
tika-s0302t:191_6: kariyamānaṃ karīyatī”ti. Tenāha bhagavā “kāye vā, hānanda, sati kāyasañcetanāhetu
tika-s0302t:191_7: uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhaṃ dukkha”nti. Vācāyapīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Manasāti pātubhūtena
tika-s0302t:191_8: manasā, na manamattenāti. Attanā parehi anussāhitena. Parenāti parena anussāhena.
tika-s0302t:191_9: Sampajānenāti ñāṇasampayuttacittavasena pajānantena. Asampajānenāti tathā na sampajānantena.
tika-s0302t:191_10: Tassāti sukhadukkhassa. Kāyasañcetanāhetūti kāyakammanimittaṃ, kāyikassa kammassa
tika-s0302t:191_11: katattā upacitattāti attho. Esa nayo sesasañcetanāsupi. Uddhaccasahagatacetanā pavattiyaṃ
tika-s0302t:191_12: vipākaṃ detiyevāti “vīsati cetanā labbhantī”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā vacīdvāreti ettha “kāmāvacarakusalākusalavasena
tika-s0302t:191_13: vīsati cetanā labbhantī”ti idaṃ tathā-saddena upasaṃharati. Rūpārūpacetanāhīti rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakusalacetanāhi.
tika-s0302t:191_14: Tappaccayaṃ yathārahanti adhippāyo. Tāpi cetanāti yathāvuttā ekūnavīsati cetanā avijjāpaccayā
tika-s0302t:191_15: honti kusalānampi pageva itarādhiṭṭhahitāvijjasseva uppajjanato, aññathā anuppajjanato.
tika-s0302t:191_16: Yathāvuttacetanābhedanti yathāvuttaṃ kāyacetanādivibhāgaṃ. Parehi anussāhito saraseneva
tika-s0302t:191_17: pavattamāno. Parehi kāriyamānoti parehi ussāhito hutvā kayiramāno. Jānantopīti anussavādivasena
tika-s0302t:191_18: jānantopi. Kammameva jānantoti tadā attanā kariyamānakammameva jānanto.
tika-s0302t:192_0: Catūsūti “sāmaṃ vā pare vā sampajāno vā asampajāno vā”ti evaṃ vuttesu catūsu ṭhānesu.
tika-s0302t:192_2: catuguṇe katvā vuttaṃ “chasattati dvesatā cetanādhammā”ti. Yesaṃ sahajātakoṭi labbhati,
tika-s0302t:192_3: tesampi upanissayakoṭi labbhatevāti “upanissayakoṭiyā anupatitā”tiicceva vuttā. Teti
tika-s0302t:192_4: yathāvuttā sabbepi dhammā. So kāyo na hotīti ettha pasādakāyopi gahetabbo. Tenāha
tika-s0302t:192_5: “yasmiṃ kāye satī”tiādi. So kāyo na hotīti so kāyo paccayanirodhena na hoti. Vācāti
tika-s0302t:192_6: saddavācā. Manoti yaṃ kiñci viññāṇaṃ. Idāni kammavaseneva yojetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:192_7: Eseva nayo “vācāpi dvārabhūtā manopi dvārabhūto”ti. Khīṇāsavassa kathaṃ kāyo na hoti,
tika-s0302t:192_8: na tassa kāyakammādhiṭṭhānanti adhippāyo. Avipākattāti avipākadhammattāti attho.
tika-s0302t:193_0: Tanti kammaṃ. Khettaṃ na hotīti tassa dukkhassa aviruhanaṭṭhānattā. Viruhanaṭṭhānādayo
tika-s0302t:193_1: byatirekavasena vuttā. Tenāha “na hotī”ti. Kāraṇaṭṭhenāti ādhārabhūtakāraṇabhāvena.
tika-s0302t:193_3: vuttānaṃ atthānaṃ. Iminā viruhanādibhāvena vedanā “sukhadukkhavedanā”ti kathitā,
tika-s0302t:193_4: nayidha jeṭṭhalakkhaṇaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ nippayojakassa sukhassa dukkhassa ca adhippetattā.
tika-s0302t:199_0: 27. Paṭipāṭiyāti paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapanena. Catusaccayojanaṃ dassetuṃ pariyosāna…pe… ādi
tika-s0302t:199_1: vuttaṃ. Dukkhasaccavasenāti pariññeyyabhāvavasena. Jarāmaraṇāpadesena hi pañcupādānakkhandhā
tika-s0302t:199_2: vuttā, te cassa attano phalassa paccayā na honti. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “paccayaṃ jānātī”ti.
tika-s0302t:199_3: Vineyyajjhāsayavasena hettha desanā pavattā. Sampannoti samannāgato. Āgatoti upagato,
tika-s0302t:199_4: adhigatoti attho. Passatīti paccavekkhaṇañāṇena paccakkhato passati, maggapaññāya
tika-s0302t:199_5: evaṃ asammohapaṭivedhavasena passati. Maggañāṇeneva, na phalañāṇena. Dhammasotaṃ
tika-s0302t:199_6: samāpannoti ariyadhammasotaṃ sammadeva āpanno patto. Anaye nairiyanato, aye ca iriyanato,
tika-s0302t:199_7: sadevakena ca lokena “saraṇa”nti akaraṇīyato ariyapakkhaṃ bhajanto puthujjanabhūmiṃ
tika-s0302t:199_8: atikkanto. Nibbedhikapaññāyāti catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ nibbijjhanakapaññāya. Āhacca
tika-s0302t:199_9: tiṭṭhati maggakkhaṇe, phalakkhaṇe pana āhacca ṭhito nāma.
tika-s0302t:202_0: 28. Uttānameva sabbasova sattame āgatanayattā, vineyyajjhāsayavasena hi idaṃ suttaṃ
tika-s0302t:202_1: satthārā aññasmiṃ āsane desitaṃ, parisāya vivaṭṭena sātthikāti satthu desanā āgatāti
tika-s0302t:202_2: ayaṃ paṭiggāhakādhīnā hotīti dhammagāravena saṅgahaṃ āropentiyeva.
tika-s0302t:205: 29. Akkharabhāṇakānanti akkhararucīnaṃ. Upasaggena padavaḍḍhanampi ruccanti. Tenāha “te hī”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:213_1: māṇavena. Saṅkhā vuccati paññā, saṅkhātā pariññātā dhammā yesaṃ te saṅkhātadhammā,
tika-s0302t:213_2: paṭividdhasaccā khīṇāsavā. Sekkhā pana vipākassa apariññātattā “saṅkhātadhammā”ti
tika-s0302t:213_3: na vuccanti. Sekkhadhammasamannāgamena te sekkhā. Te pana kāmaṃ puggalapaṭilābhavasena
tika-s0302t:213_4: anekasahassāva honti, catumaggaheṭṭhimaphalattayassa pana vasena taṃsamaṅgitāsāmaññena
tika-s0302t:213_5: na sattajanato uddhanti āha “satta jane”ti niyametvā viseseti. Saṃkilesavajjaṃ, tato
tika-s0302t:213_6: vā attānaṃ viya vineyyalokaṃ nipāti rakkhatīti nipako, tassa bhāvo nepakkaṃ, ñāṇanti
tika-s0302t:213_7: āha “nepakkaṃ vuccati paññā, tāya samannāgatattā nipako”ti.
tika-s0302t:214_0: “Ko nu kho imassa pañhassa attho”ti cintento pañhāya kaṅkhati nāma. “Kathaṃ byākaramāno
tika-s0302t:214_1: nu kho satthu ajjhāsayaṃ na virodhemī”ti cintento ajjhāsayaṃ kaṅkhati nāma. Sujānanīyatthaparicchedaṃ
tika-s0302t:214_2: katvā cintanā hettha “kaṅkhā”ti adhippetā, na vicikicchāti. Pahīnavicikiccho hi mahāthero
tika-s0302t:214_3: āyasmato assajimahātherassa santikeyeva, vicinanabhūtaṃ kukkuccasadisaṃ panetaṃ vīmaṃsanamattanti
tika-s0302t:214_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pattaṃ ādāya carantoti pabbajitabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ. Dhammasenāpatibhāvena
tika-s0302t:214_5: vā mama pattadhammadesanāvāraṃ ādāya carantoti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0302t:215_0: Jātanti yathārahaṃ paccayato uppannaṃ, saṅkhatanti attho. Pañhabyākaraṇaṃ upaṭṭhāsīti
tika-s0302t:215_1: pañhassa byākaraṇatā paṭibhāsi. “Sammappaññāya passatī”ti pāṭho, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana
tika-s0302t:215_2: “sammappaññāya passato”ti padaṃ uddharitvā “passantassā”ti attho vutto. Taṃ “bhūtanti…pe…
tika-s0302t:215_3: paṭipanno hotī”ti imāya pāḷiyā na sameti, tasmā yathādassitapāṭho eva yutto. Yāva
tika-s0302t:215_4: arahattamaggā nibbidādīnaṃ atthāyāti samitāpekkhadhammavasā padaṃ vadanti. Āhārasambhavanti
tika-s0302t:215_5: paccayahetukaṃ. Sekkhapaṭipadā kathitā “nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hotī”ti
tika-s0302t:215_6: vacanato. Esa nayo nirodhavārepi. Nibbidāti karaṇe paccattavacanaṃ, virāgā nirodhāti
tika-s0302t:215_7: karaṇe nissakkavacananti āha “sabbāni kāraṇavacanānī”ti. Anupādāti anupādāya. Bhūtamidantiādimāha
tika-s0302t:218_0: 32. Tassa therassa nāmaṃ jātisamudāgataṃ. Nivattoti pubbe vaṭṭasotassa paṭisotaṃ
tika-s0302t:218_1: gantuṃ āraddho, taṃ avisahanto anusotameva gacchanto, tato nivatto pariklesavidhame
tika-s0302t:218_2: asaṃsaṭṭho viyutto hoti. Ettha cetanāti vā assāso. Hīnāyāvattanaṃ nāma kāmesu sāpekkhatāya,
tika-s0302t:218_3: tattha ca nirapekkhatā tatiyamaggādhigamenāti dassento “tayo magge”tiādimāha. Sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ
tika-s0302t:218_4: therassa arahattādhigamena nipphannaṃ, tasmā tassa taṃ uparimakoṭiyā assāso vutto.
tika-s0302t:218_5: Ugghāṭitāti vivaṭā, vūpasamitāti attho. Tatthāti arahattappattiyaṃ. Vicikicchābhāvanti nibbematikataṃ.
tika-s0302t:219: Na evaṃ byākatāti “khīṇā jātī”tiādikā evaṃ uttānakaṃ na byākatā, pariyāyena pana byākatā. Kenacīti kenacipi kāraṇena. Evaṃ uttānakaṃ byākarissati.
tika-s0302t:220_0: Tassa paccayassa khayāti tassa kammabhavasaṅkhātassa paccayassa avijjāya sahakāritāyaṃ
tika-s0302t:220_1: saṅgahitassa khayā anuppādā nirodhā. Khīṇasminti khīṇe. Anuppādanirodhena niruddhe
tika-s0302t:220_2: jātiyā yathāvutte paccaye. Jātisaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ khīṇaṃ anuppattidhammataṃ āpāditanti.
tika-s0302t:220_3: Viditaṃ ñātaṃ. Ājānāti catusaccaṃ heṭṭhimamaggehi ñātaṃ anatikkamitvāva paṭivijjhatīti
tika-s0302t:220_4: aññā aggamaggo. Tadupacārena aggaphalaṃ idha “aññā” nāma. Paccayoti bhavūpapattiyā
tika-s0302t:221: Meti mayā. Aññāsi ākāraggahaṇena cittācāraṃ jānāti. Tenāti bhagavatā. Byākaraṇaṃ anumoditaṃ pañhabyākaraṇassa visayakatabhāvato.
tika-s0302t:222_0: Ayamassa visayoti ayaṃ vedanā assa sāriputtattherassa savisayo tattha visayabhāvena
tika-s0302t:222_1: pavattattā. Kiñcāpīti kiñcāpi sukhā vedanā ṭhitisukhā dukkhā vedanā vipariṇāmasukhā,
tika-s0302t:222_2: adukkhamasukhā vedanā ñāṇasukhā. Vipariṇāmakoṭiyāti aniccabhāvena sabbāva vedanā
tika-s0302t:222_3: dukkhā nāma. Sukhapaṭikkhepatopi hi sukhapītiyā pharaṇatāya sukhāti tikkhamattena
tika-s0302t:222_5: hi vuttaṃ papañcasūdaniyaṃ “sukhāya vedanāya atthibhāvo sukha”nti. Sukhakāmo dukkhaṃ
tika-s0302t:222_6: titikkhati. Apariññātavatthukānañhi sukhavedanuparamo dukkhato upaṭṭhāti, tasmāyamattho
tika-s0302t:222_7: viyogena dīpetabbo. “Dukkhā vipariṇāmasukhā”ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Tathācāha papañcasūdaniyaṃ
tika-s0302t:222_8: “dukkhāya vedanāya natthibhāvo sukha”nti. Dukkhavedanuparamo hi vuttānaṃ sukhato
tika-s0302t:222_9: upaṭṭhāti evāti vadanti. Tassa yogassa vūpasamena “aho sukhaṃ jāta”nti majjhattavedanāya
tika-s0302t:222_10: jānanabhāvo yāthāvato avabujjhanaṃ sukhaṃ. Adukkhamasukhāpi vedanā vijānantassa sukhaṃ
tika-s0302t:222_11: hoti tassa sukhumatāya viññeyyabhāvato. Yathā rūpārūpadhammānaṃ salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato
tika-s0302t:222_12: ca sammadeva avabodho paramaṃ sukhaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0302t:225_0: Aññāṇadukkhāti ajānanabhāvo adukkhamasukhāvedanāya dukkhaṃ. Sammā vibhāgajānanasabhāvo
tika-s0302t:225_1: ñāṇassa sambhavo. Ñāṇasampayuttā hi ñāṇūpanissayā adukkhamasukhā vedanā pasatthākārā,
tika-s0302t:225_2: yato sā iṭṭhā ceva iṭṭhaphalā cāti. Ajānanabhāvoti ettha vuttavipariyāyena attho
tika-s0302t:225_3: veditabbo. “Dukkhanti vidito”ti pāḷi, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana viditanti paduddhāro kato,
tika-s0302t:226_0: Vedanāparicchedajānaneti “tisso imā vedanā”ti evaṃ paricchedato jānane. Aññāsīti
tika-s0302t:226_1: kadā aññāsi? Imasmiṃ desanākāleti vadanti, paṭivedhakāleti pana yuttaṃ. Yathāpaṭividdhā
tika-s0302t:226_2: hi vedanā idha therena desitāti. Iminā kāraṇenāti “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti vedanānaṃ
tika-s0302t:226_3: aniccatāya dukkhabhāvajānanasaṅkhātena kāraṇena. Taṃnimittaṃ hissa vedanāsu taṇhā
tika-s0302t:226_4: na uppajjati. Atippapañcoti ativitthāro. Dukkhasmiṃ antogadhaṃ dukkhapariyāpannattā.
tika-s0302t:226_5: Dukkhanti sabbaṃ vedayitaṃ dukkhaṃ saṅkhāradukkhabhāvato. Ñātamatteti yāthāvato avabujjhanamatte.
tika-s0302t:226_6: Taṇhā na tiṭṭhatīti na santiṭṭhati nappavattati.
tika-s0302t:227_0: Kathaṃ vimokkhāti ajjhattabahiddhābhedesu vimuttā. Hetumhi cetaṃ nissakkavacananti
tika-s0302t:227_1: hetuatthena karaṇavacanena atthamāha “katarena vimokkhenā”ti. Karaṇatthepi vā etaṃ
tika-s0302t:227_2: nissakkavacananti tathā vuttaṃ. Abhinivesoti vipassanārambho. Bahiddhādhammāpi daṭṭhabbāyeva
tika-s0302t:227_3: sabbassapi pariññeyyassa parijānitabbato. Ñāṇaṃ pavattetvā. Teti ajjhattasaṅkhāre.
tika-s0302t:227_4: Vavatthapetvāti salakkhaṇato paricchinditvā. Bahiddhā otāretīti bahiddhāsaṅkhāresu
tika-s0302t:227_5: ñāṇaṃ otāreti. Ajjhattaṃ otāretīti ajjhattasaṅkhāre sammasati. Tatra tasmiṃ catukke.
tika-s0302t:228_0: Sabbupādānakkhayāti sabbaso upādānānaṃ khayā. Kāmaṃ diṭṭhisīlabbataattavādupādānāni
tika-s0302t:228_1: paṭhamamaggeneva khīyanti, kāmupādānaṃ pana aggamaggenāti tassa vasena “sabbupādānakkhayā”ti
tika-s0302t:228_2: vadanto thero attano arahattapattiṃ byākaroti. Tenāha “āsavā nānussavantī”ti. Satoti
tika-s0302t:228_3: iminā sativepullappattiṃ dasseti. Cakkhuto rūpe savantīti cakkhuviññāṇavīthiyaṃ tadanugatamanoviññāṇavīthiyañca
tika-s0302t:228_4: rūpārammaṇā āsavā pavattantīti. Kiñcāpi tattha kusalādīnampi pavatti atthi, kāmāsavādayo
tika-s0302t:228_5: eva vaṇato yūsaṃ viya paggharaṇakaasucibhāvena sandanti, tathā sesavāresu. Tenāha
tika-s0302t:228_6: “eva”ntiādi, tasmā te eva “āsavā”ti vuccanti. Tattha hi paggharaṇakaasucimhi niruḷho
tika-s0302t:228_7: āsavasaddo. “Attānaṃ nāvajānāmī”ti vuttattā “omānapahānaṃ kathita”nti āha. Tena āsavesu
tika-s0302t:228_8: samudāyupalakkhaṇaṃ kathitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi seyyamānādippahānena vinā hīnamānaṃyeva
tika-s0302t:229: Sarūpabhedatopīti “cattāro”ti evaṃ parimāṇaparicchedatopi. Idaṃ bhagavā dassento āhāti sambandho. Idanti ca “ayampi kho”tiādivacanaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0302t:230_0: Asambhinnāya evāti yathānisinnāya eva, avuṭṭhitāya evāti attho. Puggalathomanatthanti
tika-s0302t:230_1: desanākusalānaṃ ānandattherādīnaṃ puggalānaṃ pasaṃsanatthaṃ ukkaṃsanatthaṃ. Dhammathomanatthanti
tika-s0302t:230_2: paṭipattidhammassa pasaṃsanatthaṃ. Tepīti ānandattherādayo bhikkhūpi. Dhammapaṭiggāhakā
tika-s0302t:231_0: Assāti bhagavato. Ānubhāvaṃ karissati “divasañcepi bhagavā”tiādinā. Nanti sāriputtattheraṃ.
tika-s0302t:231_1: Ahampi tatheva thomessāmi “sā hi bhikkhū”tiādinā. Evaṃ cintesīti evaṃ vakkhamānena
tika-s0302t:231_3: samānādhippāyāya. Matiyāti paññāya. Ayaṃ desanā aggāti bhagavā dhammasenāpatiṃ guṇato
tika-s0302t:232_0: Pakāsetvāti guṇato pākaṭaṃ paññātaṃ katvā sabbasāvakehi seṭṭhabhāve ṭhapetukāmo.
tika-s0302t:232_1: Cittagatiyā cittavasena kāyassa pariṇāmanena “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū”ti
tika-s0302t:232_2: kāyasamānagatikattādhiṭṭhānena. Kathaṃ pana kāyo dandhappavattiko lahuparivattena
tika-s0302t:232_3: cittena samānagatiko hotīti? Na sabbathā samānagatiko. Yatheva hi kāyavasena cittavipariṇāmane
tika-s0302t:232_4: cittaṃ sabbathā kāyena samānagatikaṃ hoti. Na hi tadā cittaṃ sabhāvasiddhena attano
tika-s0302t:232_5: khaṇena avattitvā dandhavuttikassa rūpadhammassa khaṇena vattituṃ sakkoti, “idaṃ
tika-s0302t:232_6: cittaṃ ayaṃ kāyo viya hotū”ti panādhiṭṭhānena dandhagatikassa kāyassa anuvattanato
tika-s0302t:232_7: yāva icchitaṭṭhānappatti hoti, tāva kāyagatianulomeneva hutvā santānavasena pavattamānaṃ
tika-s0302t:232_8: cittaṃ kāyagatiyā pariṇāmitaṃ nāma hoti, evaṃ “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū”ti
tika-s0302t:232_9: adhiṭṭhānena pageva sukhalahusaññāya sampāditattā abhāvitiddhipādānaṃ viya dandhaṃ
tika-s0302t:232_10: avattitvā yathā lahukatipayacittavāreheva icchitaṭṭhānappati hoti, evaṃ pavattarūpatā viññāyatīti.
tika-s0302t:233_0: Adhippāyānurūpameva tassa bhagavato thomanāya katattā. Idaṃ nāma atthajātaṃ bhagavā
tika-s0302t:233_1: pucchissatīti pubbe mayā aviditaṃ apassaṃ. Āsayajānanatthanti “evaṃ byākarontena
tika-s0302t:233_2: satthu ajjhāsayo gahito hotī”ti evaṃ satthu ajjhāsayajānanatthaṃ. Dutiyaṃ pañhaṃ
tika-s0302t:233_3: pucchanto bhagavā paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ anumodi dutiyaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanteneva paṭhamapañhavissajjanassa
tika-s0302t:234_0: Etaṃ ahosīti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi. Assāti kaḷārakhattiyassa bhikkhuno. Dhamme
tika-s0302t:234_1: dahatīti dhammadhātu, sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ, sāvakavisaye dhamme dahati yāthāvato ajite
tika-s0302t:234_2: katvā ṭhapetīti attho. Tenāha “dhammadhātū”tiādi. Sabbaññutaññāṇagatikameva visaye.
tika-s0302t:237_0: 33. Ñāṇameva ñāṇavatthu sampattīnaṃ kāraṇabhāvato. Catūsūti catusaccassa bodhanavasena
tika-s0302t:237_1: vuttesu catūsu ñāṇesu. Paṭhamanti “jarāmaraṇe ñāṇa”nti evaṃ vuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ, yena dhāraṇaparicayamanasikāravasena
tika-s0302t:237_2: pavattaṃ sabbaṃ gaṇhi. Sannicayañāṇamayaṃ savanamayaṃ nāmatveva veditabbaṃ. Sabhāvato
tika-s0302t:237_3: paccayato cassa pariggaṇhanañāṇaṃ sammasanañāṇaṃtveva veditabbaṃ. Jarāmaraṇasīsena
tika-s0302t:237_4: cettha jarāmaraṇavantova dhammā gahitā. Paṭivedhañāṇanti asammohato paṭivijjhanañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t:237_5: Iminā dhammenāti hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ. Imassa hi dhammassa adhigamahetu ayaṃ ariyo
tika-s0302t:237_6: atītānāgate nayenapi catusaccadhamme abhisambujjhati. Maggañāṇameva pana atītānāgate
tika-s0302t:237_7: nayanasadisaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “maggañāṇadhammena vā”ti dutiyavikappo vutto. Evañhi
tika-s0302t:238_1: paccakkhato diṭṭhena. Paññāya viditenāti maggapaññāya tatheva viditena. Yasmā tathā
tika-s0302t:238_2: diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sabbaso pattaṃ mahāupāyo hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “pariyogāḷhenā”ti. Diṭṭhenāti
tika-s0302t:238_3: vā dassanena, dhammaṃ passitvā ṭhitenāti attho. Viditenāti cattāri saccāni viditvā
tika-s0302t:238_4: pākaṭāni katvā ṭhitena. Akālikenāti na kālantaravipākadāyinā. Pattenāti cattāri saccāni
tika-s0302t:238_5: patvā ṭhitattā dhammaṃ pattena. Pariyogāḷhenāti catusaccadhamme pariyogāhitvā ṭhitena.
tika-s0302t:238_6: Atītānāgate nayaṃ netīti atīte ca anāgate ca nayaṃ neti harati peseti. Idaṃ pana
tika-s0302t:238_7: paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa kiccaṃ, satthārā pana maggañāṇaṃ atītānāgate nayanasadisaṃ kataṃ
tika-s0302t:238_8: taṃmūlakattā. Atītamaggassa hi paccavekkhaṇaṃ nāma hoti, tasmā maggañāṇaṃ nayanasadisaṃ
tika-s0302t:238_9: kataṃ nāma hoti, paccavekkhaṇañāṇena pana nayaṃ neti. Tenāha “ettha cā”tiādi. Yathā
tika-s0302t:238_10: pana tena nayaṃ neti. Taṃ ākāraṃ dassetuṃ “ye kho kecī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ettha ca nayanuppādanaṃ
tika-s0302t:238_11: nayañāṇasseva pavattiviseso. Tena vuttaṃ “paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa kicca”nti. Kiñcāpi
tika-s0302t:238_12: “imināti maggañāṇadhammena vā”ti vuttaṃ, duvidhaṃ pana maggaphalañāṇaṃ sammasanañāṇapaccavekkhaṇāya
tika-s0302t:238_13: mūlakāraṇaṃ, na nayanassāti duvidhena ñāṇadhammenāti na na yujjati. Tathā catusaccadhammassa
tika-s0302t:238_14: ñātattā maggaphalasaṅkhātassa vā dhammassa saccapaṭivedhasampayogaṃ gatattā “nayanaṃ
tika-s0302t:238_15: hotū”ti tena “iminā dhammenā”ti ñāṇassa visayabhāvena ñāṇasampayogena tadañātenāti
tika-s0302t:238_16: ca attho na na yujjati. Anuayeti dhammañāṇassa anurūpavasena aye bujjhanañāṇe diṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0302t:238_17: adiṭṭhānayanato adiṭṭhassa diṭṭhatāya ñāpanato ca. Tenāha “dhammañāṇassa anugamane
tika-s0302t:238_18: ñāṇa”nti. Khīṇāsavassa sekkhabhūmi nāma aggamaggakkhaṇo. Kasmā panetaṃ evaṃ vuttanti
tika-s0302t:238_19: ce? “Evaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ pajānātī”tiādinā vattamānavasena desanāya pavattattā.
tika-s0302t:241_0: 34. Sattarīti ta-kārassa ra-kārādesaṃ vuttaṃ. Sattatisaddena vā samānattho sattarisaddo.
tika-s0302t:241_1: Byañjanarucivasena byañjanaṃ bhaṇantīti byañjanabhāṇakā. Tenāha “bahubyañjanaṃ katvā”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:241_2: Tiṭṭhati tattha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhiti, paccuppannalakkhaṇassa dhammassa
tika-s0302t:241_3: ṭhiti dhammaṭṭhiti. Atha vā dhammoti kāraṇaṃ, paccayoti attho. Dhammassa yo ṭhitisabhāvo,
tika-s0302t:241_4: sova dhammato añño natthīti dhammaṭṭhiti, paccayo. Tattha ñāṇaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t:241_5: Tenāha āyasmā dhammasenāpati – “paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti. Tathā
tika-s0302t:241_6: cāha “paccayākāre ñāṇa”ntiādi. Tattha dhammānanti paccayuppannadhammānaṃ. Pavattiṭṭhitikāraṇattāti
tika-s0302t:241_8: anvayabyatirekavasena pavattiyā chabbidhassa ñāṇassa. Khayo nāma vināso, sova bhedoti.
tika-s0302t:241_9: Virajjanaṃ palujjanaṃ. Nirujjhanaṃ antaradhānaṃ. Ekekasminti jarāmaraṇādīsu ekekasmiṃ.
tika-s0302t:241_10: Pubbe “yathābhūtañāṇa”nti taruṇavipassanaṃ āha. Tasmā idhāpi dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ vipassanāti
tika-s0302t:244_0: 35. Desanaṃ osāpesīti yathāraddhakathaṃ ṭhapesi. Tattha nisinnassa diṭṭhigatikassa
tika-s0302t:244_1: laddhiyā bhindanavasena upari kathetukāmo. Buddhānañhi desanāvāraṃ pacchindāpetvā
tika-s0302t:244_2: pucchituṃ samattho nāma koci natthi. Tenāha “diṭṭhigatikassa okāsadānattha”nti. Duppañho
tika-s0302t:244_3: eso sattūpaladdhiyā pucchitattā. Sattūpaladdhivādapadenāti “satto jīvo upalabbhatī”ti
tika-s0302t:244_4: evaṃ pavattadiṭṭhidīpakapadavasena. Vadanti etenāti vādo. Diṭṭhi-saddo pana dvayasaṅgahito,
tika-s0302t:244_5: brahmacariyavāso pana paramatthato ariyamaggabhāvanāti āha “ariyamaggavāso”ti. Ayaṃ
tika-s0302t:244_6: diṭṭhīti anaññe sarīrajīvāti diṭṭhi. “Jīvo”ti ca jīvitameva vadanti. Vaṭṭanti duvidhaṃ
tika-s0302t:244_7: vaṭṭaṃ. Nirodhentoti anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento. Samucchindantoti appavattiyaṃ pāpanena
tika-s0302t:244_8: upacchindanto. Tadetaṃ maggena nirodhetabbaṃ vaṭṭaṃ nirujjhatīti yojanā. “Ayaṃ satto
tika-s0302t:244_9: vināsaṃ abhāvaṃ patvā sabbaso ucchijjatī”ti evaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiyā gahitākārassa sambhave
tika-s0302t:244_10: saccabhāve sati. Na hotīti sātthako na hoti.
tika-s0302t:245_0: Gacchatīti sarīrato nikkhamitvā gacchati. Vivaṭṭentoti appavattiṃ karontoti attho.
tika-s0302t:245_1: Vivaṭṭetuṃ na sakkoti niccassa appavattiṃ pāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā. Micchādiṭṭhi sammādiṭṭhiṃ
tika-s0302t:245_2: vijjhati asamāhitapuggalasevanavasena tathā pavattituṃ appadānavasena ca pajahitabbāpajahanavasena
tika-s0302t:245_3: sammādiṭṭhiṃ vijjhati. Visūkamivāti kaṇḍako viya. Na kevalaṃ ananuvattakova, atha
tika-s0302t:245_4: kho virodhopi “nicca”ntiādinā pavattanadhammatāya viññāpanato. Virūpaṃ bībhacchaṃ
tika-s0302t:245_5: phanditaṃ vipphanditaṃ. Paṇṇapupphaphalapallavānaṃ avatthubhūto tālo eva tālāvatthu
tika-s0302t:245_6: “asive sivā”ti vohāro viya. Keci pana “tālavatthukatānī”ti paṭhanti, avatthubhūtatāya
tika-s0302t:245_7: tālo viya katānīti attho. Tenāha “matthakacchinnatālo viyā”ti. Anuabhāvanti vināsaṃ.
tika-s0302t:248: 36. Iti vāti evaṃ vā. Jarāmaraṇassa ceva jarāmaraṇasāmikassa ca khaṇavasena yo vadeyya. Avisāradadhātuko pucchituṃ acchekatāya maṅkubhāvena jāto. Tenāha “pucchituṃ na sakkotī”ti.
tika-s0302t:251_0: 37. Na tumhākanti kāyassa anattaniyabhāvadassanameva panetanti yā tassa anattaniyatā,
tika-s0302t:251_1: taṃ dassetuṃ “attani hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yadi na attaniyaṃ, parakiyaṃ nāma siyāti, tampi
tika-s0302t:251_2: natthīti dassento “nāpi aññesa”nti āha. Nayidaṃ purāṇakammamevāti “idaṃ kāyo”ti vuttasarīraṃ
tika-s0302t:251_3: purāṇakammameva na hoti. Na hi kāyo vedanāsabhāvo. Paccayavohārenāti kāraṇopacārena.
tika-s0302t:251_6: kato abhisaṅkhatoti āha “paccayehi katoti daṭṭhabbo”ti. Abhisañcetayitanti tathā
tika-s0302t:251_7: abhisaṅkhatattasaṅkhātena abhimukhabhāvena cetayitaṃ pakappitaṃ, pavattitanti attho.
tika-s0302t:251_8: Cetanāvatthukoti cetanāhetuko. Vedaniyanti vedanāya hitaṃ vatthārammaṇabhāvena vedanāya
tika-s0302t:254_0: 38. Yañcāti ettha ca-saddo aṭṭhāne. Tena cetanāya viya pakappānānusayānampi viññāṇassa
tika-s0302t:254_1: ṭhitiyā vakkhamānaṃyeva avisiṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇabhāvaṃ joteti. Kāmaṃ tīsupi padesu “pavatteti”icceva
tika-s0302t:254_2: attho vutto, vattanattho pana cetanādīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ cetayanapakappanānusayanarūpo
tika-s0302t:254_3: visiṭṭhaṭṭho daṭṭhabbo. Tebhūmakakusalākusalacetanā gahitā kammaviññāṇassa paccayaniddhāraṇametanti.
