tika-s0302t:254_4: Taṇhādiṭṭhikappā gahitā yathārahanti adhippāyo. Aṭṭhasupi hi lobhasahagatacittesu
tika-s0302t:254_5: taṇhākappo, tattha catūsveva diṭṭhikappoti. Kāmaṃ anusayā lokiyakusalacetanāsupi
tika-s0302t:254_6: anusentiyeva, akusalesu pana pavatti pākaṭāti “dvādasannaṃ cetanāna”nti vuttaṃ. Sahajātakoṭiyāti
tika-s0302t:254_7: idaṃ paccuppannāpi kāmarāgādayo anusayāva vuccanti taṃsadisatāyāti vuttaṃ. Na hi
tika-s0302t:254_8: kālabhedena lakkhaṇappabhedo atthīti. Anāgatā eva hi kāmarāgādayo nippariyāyato “anusayā”ti
tika-s0302t:254_9: vattabbataṃ arahanti. Paccayuppanno vaṭṭatīti āha “ārammaṇaṃ paccayo”ti. Kammaviññāṇassa
tika-s0302t:254_10: ṭhitatthanti kammaviññāṇasseva pavattiyā. Tasmiṃ paccaye satīti tasmiṃ cetanāpakappanānusayasaññite
tika-s0302t:254_11: paccaye sati patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa hoti. Santāne phaladānasamatthatāyeva hotīti “patiṭṭhā
tika-s0302t:254_12: hoti, tasmiṃ patiṭṭhite”ti vuttaṃ. Sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāvasena viruḷheti. Patiṭṭhiteti
tika-s0302t:254_13: hi iminā kammassa katabhāvo vutto, “viruḷhe”ti iminā upacitabhāvo. Tenāha “kammaṃ
tika-s0302t:254_14: javāpetvā”tiādi. Tattha puretaraṃ uppannāhi kammacetanāhi laddhapaccayattā balappattāya
tika-s0302t:254_15: sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya kammaviññāṇaṃ laddhapatiṭṭhaṃ viruḷhamūlañca hotīti vuttaṃ
tika-s0302t:254_16: “nibbattamūle jāte”ti. Tathā hi sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā vipākaṃ dentaṃ anantare jātivasena
tika-s0302t:255_1: jāyamānakkhaṇo. Na jāyamānakkhaṇo appavattanakkhaṇo na kevalaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇo appahīnānusayassa
tika-s0302t:255_3: appavattamānāsu anusayānaṃ sahajātakoṭiādinā pavatti nāma natthi, vipākādīsu appahīnakoṭiyā
tika-s0302t:255_4: pavattati karontassa abhāvatoti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Avāritattāti paṭipakkheti
tika-s0302t:256_0: Paṭhamadutiyavārehi vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā tatiyavāre “no ce”tiādinā vivaṭṭaṃ dassitanti
tika-s0302t:256_1: “paṭhamapade tebhūmakakusalākusalacetanā nivattā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha nivattāti akaraṇato
tika-s0302t:256_2: appavattiyā apagatā. Taṇhādiṭṭhiyo nivattāti yojanā. Vuttappakāresūti “tebhūmakavipākesū”tiādinā vuttappakāresu.
tika-s0302t:257_0: Etthāti imasmiṃ sutte. Ettha cetanāpakappanānaṃ pavattanavasena dhammaparicchedo
tika-s0302t:257_1: dassitoti “cetetīti tebhūmakakusalākusalacetanā gahitā”tiādinayo idheva hotīti dassito.
tika-s0302t:257_2: Catassoti paṭighadvayamohamūlasamāgatā catasso akusalacetanā. Catūsu akusalacetanāsūti
tika-s0302t:257_3: yathāvuttāsu eva catūsu akusalacetanāsu, itarā pana “na pakappetī”ti iminā paṭikkhepena
tika-s0302t:257_4: nivattāti. Sutte āgataṃ vāretvāti “no ca pakappetī”ti evaṃ paṭikkhepavasena sutte
tika-s0302t:257_5: āgataṃ vajjetvā. “Na pakappetī”ti hi iminā aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatacittesu sahajātakoṭiyā
tika-s0302t:257_6: pavattaanusayo nivattito tesaṃ cittānaṃ appavattanato, tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ ṭhapetvāti
tika-s0302t:257_7: attho. Purimasadisova purimanayesu vuttanayena gahetabbo dhammaparicchedattā.
tika-s0302t:258_0: Tadappatiṭṭhiteti samāsabhāvato vibhattilopo, sandhivasena da-kārāgamo, tassa appatiṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0302t:258_1: tadappatiṭṭhitaṃ, tasmiṃ tadappatiṭṭhiteti evamettha samāsapadasiddhi daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0302t:258_2: Etthāti etasmiṃ tatiyavāre arahattamaggassa kiccaṃ kathitaṃ sabbaso anusayanibbattibhedanato.
tika-s0302t:258_3: Khīṇāsavassa kiccakaraṇantipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati sabbaso vedanādīnaṃ paṭikkhepabhāvato.
tika-s0302t:258_4: Nava lokuttaradhammātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati maggapaṭipāṭiyā anusayasamugghāṭanato maggānantarāni
tika-s0302t:258_5: phalāni, tadubhayārammaṇañca nibbānanti. Viññāṇassāti kammaviññāṇassa. Punabbhavasīsena
tika-s0302t:258_6: anantarabhavasaṅgahitaṃ nāmarūpaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇameva vā gahitanti āha “punabbhavassa
tika-s0302t:258_7: ca antare eko sandhī”ti. Bhavajātīnanti ettha “dutiyabhavassa tatiyabhave jātiyā”ti
tika-s0302t:258_8: evaṃ paramparavasena gahetabbaṃ. Āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattigahaṇena pana nānantariyato
tika-s0302t:258_9: kammabhavo gahito, jātihetuphalasiddhipettha vuttā evāti veditabbaṃ. Ettha ca “no
tika-s0302t:258_10: ce, bhikkhave, ceteti no ca pakappeti, atha kho anusetī”ti evaṃ bhagavatā dutiyanaye
tika-s0302t:258_11: pubbabhāge bhavanibbattakakusalākusalāyūhanaṃ, pakappanañca vināpi bhavesu diṭṭhādīnavassa
tika-s0302t:258_12: yogino anusayapaccayā vipassanācetanāpi paṭisandhijanakā hotīti dassanatthaṃ kusalākusalassa
tika-s0302t:258_13: appavatti cepi, tadā vijjamānatebhūmakavipākādidhammesu appahīnakoṭiyā anusayitakilesappaccayā
tika-s0302t:258_14: bhavavajjassa kammaviññāṇassa patiṭṭhitatā hotīti dassanatthañca vutto. “Na ceteti
tika-s0302t:258_15: pakappeti anusetī”ti ayaṃ nayo na gahito cetanaṃ vinā pakappanassa abhāvato.
tika-s0302t:261: 39. Viññāṇanāmarūpānaṃ antare eko sandhīti hetuphalasandhi viññāṇaggahaṇena kammaviññāṇassa gahitattā. Nāmarūpaṃ pana vipākanāmarūpamevāti pākaṭameva. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0302t:264_0: 40. Rūpādīsu chasu ārammaṇesu. Tena cettha bhavattayaṃ saṅgaṇhāti chaḷārammaṇapariyāpannattā.
tika-s0302t:264_1: Tasseva bhavattayassa patthanā paṇidhānādivasena nati nāma. Āgatimhi gatīti paccupaṭṭhānavasena
tika-s0302t:264_2: abhimukhaṃ gati pavatti etasmāti āgati, kammādinimittaṃ. Tasmiṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇassa
tika-s0302t:264_3: gati pavatti nibbatti hoti. Tenāha “āgate”tiādi. Cutūpapātoti cavanaṃ cuti, maraṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t:264_4: Upapajjanaṃ nibbatti, upapāto. Cutito upapāto punaruppādo. Tenāha “evaṃ viññāṇassā”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:264_5: Itoti nibbattabhavato. Tatthāti punabbhavasaṅkhāte āyatibhave. Ekova sandhīti eko
tika-s0302t:269_0: 41. Yatoti yasmiṃ kāle. Ayañhi to-saddo dā-saddo viya idha kālavisayo. Tenāha “yadā”ti.
tika-s0302t:269_1: Bhayaveracetanāyoti bhāyitabbaṭṭhena bhayaṃ, verapasavanaṭṭhena veranti ca laddhanāmā
tika-s0302t:269_2: cetanāyo. Pāṇātipātādayo hi yassa pavattanti, yañca uddissa pavattiyanti, ubhaye
tika-s0302t:269_3: sabhayabheravāti te eva bhāyitabbabhayaverajanakāvāti. Sotassa ariyamaggassa ādito
tika-s0302t:269_4: paṭṭhāya paṭipattiadhigamo sotāpatti, tadatthāya tattha patiṭṭhitassa ca aṅgāni sotāpattiyaṅgāni,
tika-s0302t:269_5: tadubhayaṃ sandhāyāha “duvidhaṃ sotāpattiyā aṅga”nti, sotāpattiatthaṃ aṅganti attho.
tika-s0302t:269_6: Yaṃ pubbabhāgeti yaṃ sayaṃ sotāpattimaggaphalapaṭilābhato pubbabhāge tadatthāya saṃvattati.
tika-s0302t:269_7: Kiṃ pana tanti āha “sappurisasaṃsevo”tiādi. Sappurisānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ariyañāṇasaññāṇajātā
tika-s0302t:269_8: payirupāsanā, saddhammassavanaṃ catusaccadhammassavanaṃ, yoniso upāyena aniccādito
tika-s0302t:269_9: manasi karaṇaṃ yoniso manasikāro, ussukkāpentena dhammassa nibbānassa anudhammapaṭipajjanaṃ
tika-s0302t:269_10: dhammānudhammapaṭipattīti etāni sotāpattiyā aṅgāni. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sotāpattiaṅganti
tika-s0302t:269_11: padaṃ apekkhitvā “evaṃ āgata”nti vuttaṃ. Ṭhitassa puggalassa aṅgaṃ. Sotāpanno aṅgīyati
tika-s0302t:269_12: ñāyati etenāti sotāpannassa aṅgantipi vuccati. Idaṃ pacchā vuttaṃ aṅgaṃ. Dosehi ārakāti
tika-s0302t:269_13: ariyoti āha “niddoso”ti. Kathaṃ avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayotiādinā kenacipi anupārambhiyattā
tika-s0302t:269_14: nirupārambho. Ñāṇaṃ sandhāya “niddoso”ti vuttaṃ, paṭiccasamuppādaṃ sandhāya “nirupārambho”ti
tika-s0302t:269_15: vadanti. Ubhayampi pana sandhāya ubhayaṃ vuttanti apare. Paṭiccasamuppādo ettha adhippeto.
tika-s0302t:269_16: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “aparāparaṃ uppannāya vipassanāpaññāyā”ti. Na hi maggañāṇaṃ vipassanāpaññāti.
tika-s0302t:269_17: Sammā upāyattā tassa paṭiccasamuppanne yāthāvato ñāyatīti ñāyo, paṭiccasamuppādo.
tika-s0302t:269_18: Ñāṇaṃ pana ñāyati so etenāti ñāyo.
tika-s0302t:270_0: Tatthāti niraye. Maggasotanti maggassa sotaṃ. Āpannoti adhigato. Apāyesu uppajjanasaṅkhāto
tika-s0302t:270_1: vinipātadhammo etassāti vinipātadhammo, na vinipātadhammo avinipātadhammo. Paraṃ
tika-s0302t:270_2: ayananti ativiya savisaye ayitabbaṃ bujjhitabbaṃ. Yesañhi dhātūnaṃ gatiattho, buddhipi
tika-s0302t:271_0: Pāṇātipātakammakāraṇāti pāṇātipātasaṅkhātassa pāpakammassa karaṇahetu. Veraṃ vuccati
tika-s0302t:271_1: virodho, tadeva bhāyitabbato bhayanti āha “bhayaṃ veranti atthato eka”nti. Idaṃ bāhiraṃ
tika-s0302t:271_2: veraṃ nāma tassa verassa mūlabhūtato verakārapuggalato bahibhāvattā. Teneva hi tassa
tika-s0302t:271_3: verakārapuggalassa uppannaṃ veraṃ sandhāya “idaṃ ajjhattikaveraṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0302t:271_4: tannissitassa verassa mūlabhūtā verakārapuggalacetanā uppajjati paharituṃ asamatthassapīti
tika-s0302t:271_5: adhippāyo. Na hi nerayikā nirayapālesu paṭipaharituṃ sakkonti. Nirayapālassa cetanā
tika-s0302t:271_6: uppajjatīti etena “atthi niraye nirayapālā”ti dasseti. Yaṃ panetaṃ bāhiraveranti
tika-s0302t:271_7: yamidaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikañca bāhiraṃ veraṃ. Puggalaveranti vuttaṃ attakiccaṃ
tika-s0302t:271_8: sādhetuṃ asakkonto kevalaṃ parapuggale uppannamattaṃ veranti katvā. Atthato ekameva
tika-s0302t:271_10: sesakoṭṭhāsesu. Attho bhaggoti attho dhaṃsito. Adhigatenāti maggena adhigatena. “Abhigatenā”tipi
tika-s0302t:274_0: 42. Bhikkhūnaṃ kathitabhāvamattameva visesoti etena yā satthārā ekaccānaṃ desitadesanā,
tika-s0302t:274_1: puna tadaññesaṃ veneyyadamakusalena kālantare teneva desitā, sā dhammasaṃgāhakehi
tika-s0302t:274_2: “mā no satthudesanā sampaṭiggahaṃ vinā nassatū”ti visuṃ saṅgahaṃ āropitāti dasseti.
tika-s0302t:277_0: 43. Samudayanaṃ samudayo, samudeti etamhāti samudayo, evaṃ ubhinnaṃ samudayānamatthatopi
tika-s0302t:277_1: bhedo veditabbo. Paccayāva paccayasamudayo. Āraddhavipassako “imañca imañca paccayasāmaggiṃ
tika-s0302t:277_2: paṭicca ime dhammā khaṇe khaṇe uppajjantī”ti passanto “paccayasamudayaṃ passantopi
tika-s0302t:277_3: bhikkhu khaṇikasamudayaṃ passatī”ti vutto paccayadassanamukhena nibbattikkhaṇassa
tika-s0302t:277_4: dassanato. So pana khaṇe khaṇe saṅkhārānaṃ nibbattiṃ passituṃ āraddho “imehi nāma
tika-s0302t:277_5: paccayehi nibbattatī”ti passati. “So khaṇikasamudayaṃ passanto paccayaṃ passatī”ti
tika-s0302t:277_6: vadanti. Yasmā pana paccayato saṅkhārānaṃ udayaṃ passanto khaṇato tesaṃ udayadassanaṃ
tika-s0302t:277_7: hoti, khaṇato etesaṃ udayaṃ passato pageva paccayānaṃ suggahitattā paccayato dassanaṃ
tika-s0302t:277_8: sukhena ijjhati, tasmā vuttaṃ “paccayasamudayaṃ passantopī”tiādi. Atthaṅgamadassanepi
tika-s0302t:277_9: eseva nayo. Accantatthaṅgamoti appavatti nirodho nibbānanti. Bhedatthaṅgamoti khaṇikanirodho.
tika-s0302t:277_10: Tadubhayaṃ pubbabhāge uggahaparipucchādivasena passanto aññatarassa dassane itaradassanampi
tika-s0302t:277_11: siddhameva hoti, pubbabhāge ca ārammaṇavasena khayato vayasammasanādikāle bhedatthaṅgamaṃ
tika-s0302t:277_12: passanto atirekavasena anussavādito accantaṃ atthaṅgamaṃ passati. Maggakkhaṇe panārammaṇato
tika-s0302t:277_13: accantaatthaṅgamaṃ passati, asammohato itarampi passati. Taṃ sandhāyāha “accantatthaṅgamaṃ
tika-s0302t:277_15: atthaṅgamasaṅkhātaṃ bhedañca. Nissayavasenāti cakkhussa sannissayavasena paccayaṃ
tika-s0302t:277_16: katvā. Ārammaṇavasenāti rūpe ārammaṇaṃ katvā. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ madhupiṇḍikasuttaṭīkāyaṃ
tika-s0302t:277_17: vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phassoti “cakkhu rūpāni viññāṇa”nti imesaṃ
tika-s0302t:277_18: tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati samāgame nibbatti phassoti vuttoti āha “tiṇṇaṃ saṅgatiyā phasso”ti.
tika-s0302t:277_19: Tiṇṇanti ca pākaṭapaccayavasena vuttaṃ, tadaññepi pana manasikārādayo phassapaccayā
tika-s0302t:277_20: hontiyeva. Evanti taṇhādīnaṃ asesavirāganirodhakkamena. Bhinnaṃ hotīti anuppādanirodhena
tika-s0302t:280: 44. Ayamettha visesoti “ayaṃ lokassā”ti samudayatthaṅgamānaṃ visesadassanaṃ. Ettha catutthasutte tatiyasuttato viseso.
tika-s0302t:283_0: 45. Aññamaññaṃ dvinnaṃ ñātīnaṃ gāmo ñātikoti vuttoti āha “dvinnaṃ ñātakānaṃ gāme”ti.
tika-s0302t:283_1: Giñjakā vuccanti iṭṭhakā, giñjakāhi eva kato āvasatho giñjakāvasatho. So kira āvāso
tika-s0302t:283_2: yathā sudhāparikammena payojanaṃ natthi, evaṃ iṭṭhakāhi eva cinitvā chādetvā kato.
tika-s0302t:283_3: Tādisañhi chadanaṃ sandhāya bhagavatā iṭṭhakāchadanaṃ anuññātaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “iṭṭhakāhi
tika-s0302t:283_4: kate mahāpāsāde”ti. Tattha dvārabandhakavāṭaphalakādīni pana dārumayāniyeva. Pariyāyati
tika-s0302t:283_5: attano phalaṃ pariggahetvā vattatīti pariyāyo, kāraṇanti āha “dhammapariyāyanti dhammakāraṇa”nti,
tika-s0302t:283_6: pariyattidhammabhūtaṃ visesādhigamassa hetunti attho. Upecca suyyati etthāti upassutīti
tika-s0302t:283_7: vuttaṃ “upassutīti upassutiṭṭhāna”nti. Attano kammanti yadatthaṃ tattha gato, taṃ
tika-s0302t:283_8: pariveṇasamajjanakiriyaṃ. Pahāyāti akatvā. Evaṃ mahatthañhi vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā
tika-s0302t:283_9: suṇantassa mahato atthāya saṃvattati. Ekaṅgaṇaṃ ahosīti sabbaṃ vivaṭaṃ ahosi. Tīsu
tika-s0302t:283_10: hi bhavesu saṅkhāragataṃ paccayuppannavasena manasikaroto bhagavato kiñci asesetvā
tika-s0302t:283_11: sabbampi taṃ ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ upagacchi. Tena vuttaṃ “yāvabhavaggā ekaṅgaṇaṃ ahosī”ti.
tika-s0302t:283_12: Tantivasena tamatthaṃ vācāya nicchārento “vacasā sajjhāyaṃ karonto”ti vutto. Paccayapaccayuppannavasena
tika-s0302t:283_13: ca atthaṃ āharitvā tesaṃ nirodhena vivaṭṭassa āhatattā “yathānusandhinā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:284_0: Manasā sajjhāyaṃ karonto “tuṇhībhūtova paguṇaṃ karonto”ti vutto. Padānupadanti padañca
tika-s0302t:284_1: anupadañca. Purimañhi padaṃ nāma, tadanantaraṃ anupadaṃ. Ghaṭetvā sambandhaṃ katvā
tika-s0302t:284_2: avicchinditvā. Pariyāpuṇātīti ajjhayati. Ādhārappattanti ādhāraṃ cittasantānappattaṃ
tika-s0302t:284_3: appamuṭṭhaṃ gatattā ādhārappattaṃ nāma. Kāraṇanissitoti lokuttaradhammassa kāraṇasannissito.
tika-s0302t:284_5: pulliṅganiddeso. Tīsupi imesūti tatiyacatutthapañcamesu tīsu suttesu.
tika-s0302t:287: 46. Nāmavasenāti gottanāmavasena ca kittivasena ca apākaṭo, tasmā “jātivasena brāhmaṇo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:293_0: 48. Āyatiṃ hitaṃ tena loko na yatati na īhatīti lokāyataṃ. Na hi taṃ laddhiṃ nissāya
tika-s0302t:293_1: sattā puññakiriyāya cittampi uppādenti, kuto payogo, taṃ etassa atthi, tattha vā
tika-s0302t:293_2: niyuttoti lokāyatiko. Paṭhamasaddo ādiatthavācakattā jeṭṭhavevacanoti āha “paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0302t:293_3: lokāyata”nti. Sādhāraṇavacanopi lokasaddo visiṭṭhavisayo idhādhippetoti āha “bālaputhujjanalokassā”ti.
tika-s0302t:293_4: Ittarabhāvena lakuṇḍakabhāvena tassa vipulādibhāvena bālānaṃ upaṭṭhānamattanti dassento
tika-s0302t:293_5: “āyataṃ mahanta”ntiādimāha. Parittanti khuddakaṃ. Ekasabhāvanti ekaṃ sabhāvaṃ. Avipariṇāmadhammatāyāti
tika-s0302t:293_7: bhinnasabhāvaṃ. Pacchā na hotīti pacchā kiñci na hoti sabbaso samucchijjanato. Tenāha
tika-s0302t:293_8: “ucchedaṃ sandhāya pucchatī”ti. Ekattanti sabbakālaṃ attasambhavaṃ. Tathā ceva gahaṇena
tika-s0302t:293_9: dvepi vādā sassatadiṭṭhiyo honti. Natthi na hoti. Puthuttaṃ nānāsabhāvaṃ, ekarūpaṃ
tika-s0302t:293_10: na hotīti vā gahaṇena dvepi vādā ucchedadiṭṭhiyoti.
tika-s0302t:296_0: 49. Saṃsayuppatti ākāradassananti “kasmiṃ sati kiṃ hotī”ti kāraṇassa phalassa ca
tika-s0302t:296_1: paccāmasanena vinā kevalaṃ idappaccayatāya saṃsayassa uppajjanākāradassanaṃ. Samudayati
tika-s0302t:299_0: 50. Dvepi nayā ekato vuttāti idaṃ “viññāṇe sati nāmarūpaṃ hotī”tiādinā navame vuttassa
tika-s0302t:299_1: nayassa “avijjāya sati saṅkhārā hontī”tiādinā dasame vuttanaye antogadhattā. Nānattanti
tika-s0302t:304_1: panetanti? “Sammā dukkhakkhayā”ti vacanato. Na hi sabbadukkhaparivīmaṃsaṃ vinā sammā
tika-s0302t:304_2: dukkhakkhayo sambhavati. Kasmātiādinā jarāmaraṇasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ pucchati. Jātiādīnampi
tika-s0302t:304_3: pavatti dukkhabhāvinīti adhippāyo. Yasmā jarāmaraṇe gahite sati jātipi gahitā hoti,
tika-s0302t:304_4: tassā abhāve jarāmaraṇasseva abhāvato. Esa nayo bhavādīsupi. Evaṃ yāva jātidhammo
tika-s0302t:304_5: jarāmaraṇe gahite gahitova hoti, jarāmaraṇapadesena tabbikāravanto sabbe tebhūmakā
tika-s0302t:304_6: saṅkhārā gahitāti evampi jarāmaraṇaggahaṇena sabbampi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ gahitameva hoti.
tika-s0302t:304_7: Tenāha “tasmiṃ gahite sabbadukkhassa gahitattā”ti. Anekavidhanti bahuvidhaṃ bahukoṭṭhāsaṃ.
tika-s0302t:304_8: “Aneka”nti vā pāṭho. Anekanti bahulavacanaṃ. Vidhanti khaṇḍiccapāliccādivasena viparītakoṭṭhāsaṃ.
tika-s0302t:304_9: Nānappakārakanti tato eva nānappakāraṃ. Nhatvā ṭhitaṃ purisaṃ viyāti bālānaṃ attabhāvassa
tika-s0302t:305_0: “Sāruppabhāvenā”ti vuttaṃ, kiṃ sabbathā sāruppabhāvenāti āha “nikkilesatāya parisuddhatāyā”ti.
tika-s0302t:305_1: Na hi tassesā asaṅkhatatādibhāvena sadisā. Paṭipannoti paṭimukho abhisaṅkhāramukho
tika-s0302t:305_2: hutvā panno adhigato. Anugatanti anucchavikabhāvena gataṃ, yathā ca nibbānassa adhigamo
tika-s0302t:305_3: hoti, evaṃ tadanurūpabhāvena gataṃ. Ettha ca pāḷiyaṃ “pajānātī”ti pubbabhāgavasena
tika-s0302t:305_4: pajānanā vuttā, “tathā paṭipanno ca hotī”ti niyatavasena. “Aparabhāgavasenā”ti apare.
tika-s0302t:305_5: Keci pana “yathā paṭipannassa jarāmaraṇaṃ nirujjhati, tathā paṭipanno”ti vadanti.
tika-s0302t:305_6: Padavīmaṃsanā pubbabhāgavasena veditabbā, na maggakkhaṇavasena. Saṅkhāranirodhāyāti
tika-s0302t:305_7: ettha nayidaṃ avijjāpaccayasaṅkhāraggahaṇaṃ, atha kho saṅkhatasaṅkhāraggahaṇanti
tika-s0302t:305_8: āha “saṅkhāradukkhassa nirodhatthāyā”ti. Tenāha “ettāvatā yāva arahattā desanā kathitā”ti.
tika-s0302t:306_1: vedayatī”tiādinā satatavihārañca dassetvā desanā sabbathāva vaṭṭadesanāto nivattetabbā
tika-s0302t:306_2: siyā. Avijjāgatoti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho, tena evamādikaṃ idaṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭakathanaṃ
tika-s0302t:306_3: puna gaṇhāti. Puggalasaddo itarāsaṃ dvinnaṃ pakatīnaṃ vācakoti tato visesetvā gahaṇe
tika-s0302t:306_5: Ubhayenāti purisapuggalaggahaṇena. Sammutiyā avijjamānāya kathā desanā sammutikathā.
tika-s0302t:306_6: Paramatthassa kathā desanā paramatthakathā. Tatthāti sammutiparamatthakathāsu, na
tika-s0302t:306_7: sammutiparamatthesu. Tenāha “evaṃ pavattā sammutikathā nāmā”tiādi. Tatridaṃ sammutiparamatthānaṃ
tika-s0302t:306_8: lakkhaṇaṃ – yasmiṃ bhinne buddhiyā vā avayavavinibbhoge kate na taṃsamaññā, sā ghaṭapaṭādippabhedā
tika-s0302t:306_9: sammuti, tabbipariyāyato paramattho. Na hi kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāve ayaṃ nayo labbhati.
tika-s0302t:306_10: Tattha rūpādidhammaṃ samūhasantānavasena pavattamānaṃ upādāya “satto”tiādi vohāroti
tika-s0302t:306_11: āha “satto naro…pe… sammutikathā nāmā”ti. Yasmā rūpādayo paramatthadhammā “khandhā
tika-s0302t:306_12: dhātuyo”tiādinā vuccanti, na vohāramattaṃ, tasmā “khandhā…pe… paramatthakathā nāmā”ti
tika-s0302t:306_13: vuttaṃ. Nanu khandhakathāpi sammutikathāva, sammuti hi saṅketo khandhaṭṭho rāsaṭṭho
tika-s0302t:306_14: vā koṭṭhāsaṭṭho vāti? Saccametaṃ, ayaṃ pana khandhasamaññā phassādīsu tajjāpaññatti
tika-s0302t:306_15: viya paramatthasannissayā tassa āsannatarā puggalasamaññādayo viya na dūreti paramatthasaṅgahatā
tika-s0302t:306_16: vuttā. Khandhasīsena vā tadupādānā sabhāvadhammā eva gahitā. Nanu ca sabbepi sabhāvadhammā
tika-s0302t:306_17: sammutimukheneva desanaṃ ārohanti, na sammukhenāti sabbāpi desanā sammutidesanāva
tika-s0302t:306_18: siyāti? Nayidamevaṃ desetabbadhammavibhāgena desanāvibhāgassa adhippetattā, na ca
tika-s0302t:306_19: saddo kenaci pavattinimittena vinā atthaṃ pakāsetīti. Tenāha “paramatthaṃ kathentāpi
tika-s0302t:306_20: sammutiṃ amuñcitvāva kathentī”ti. Saccameva aviparītameva kathenti.
tika-s0302t:307_0: Sammutīti samaññā. Paramo uttamo atthoti paramattho, dhammānaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvo.
tika-s0302t:307_1: Taṃ paramatthaṃ, sammuti pana lokassa saṅketamattasiddhā. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ sammutikathāya
tika-s0302t:307_2: saccatāti āha “lokasammutikāraṇa”nti lokasamaññaṃ nissāya pavattanato. Lokasamaññāya
tika-s0302t:307_3: hi abhinivesanaṃ vinā paññāpanā ekaccassa sutassa sāvanā viya, na musā anatikkamitabbato
tika-s0302t:307_4: tassā. Tenāha bhagavā “janapadaniruttiṃ nābhiniveseyya, samaññaṃ nātidhāveyyā”ti.
tika-s0302t:307_5: Dhammānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ. Bhūtalakkhaṇaṃ bhāvassa lakkhaṇaṃ dīpentīti katvā.
tika-s0302t:308_1: Attano santānassa punanato pujjabhavaphalassa abhisaṅkharaṇato puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ.
tika-s0302t:308_2: Kammapuññenāti kammabhūtena. Vipākapuññenāti vipākasaṅkhātena. Puññaphalampi hi uttarapadalopena
tika-s0302t:308_3: “puñña”nti vuccati “evamidaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī”tiādīsu viya. “Apuññūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇa”nti
tika-s0302t:308_4: idaṃ “puññūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇa”nti ettha vuttanayamevāti na uddhataṃ. Apuññaphalaṃ
tika-s0302t:308_6: iminā saṅkhārassa paccayo gahito, “puññūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇa”ntiādinā paccayuppannaṃ
tika-s0302t:308_7: viññāṇaṃ. Tasmiñca gahite nāmarūpādi sabbaṃ gahitameva hoti. Tenāha “dvādasapadiko
tika-s0302t:309_0: Vijjāti arahattamaggañāṇaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddesena. Tassā hi uppādā sabbaso avijjā pahīnā
tika-s0302t:309_1: hoti. Paṭhamamevāti idaṃ avijjāpahānavijjuppādānaṃ samānakālatādassanaṃ. Tenāha “yathā
tika-s0302t:309_2: panā”tiādi. Padīpujjalenāti padīpujjalanahetunā saheva. Vijjuppādāti vijjuppādahetu,
tika-s0302t:309_3: evaṃ satīpi samakālatteti adhippāyo. Na gaṇhātīti “etaṃ mamā”tiādinā na gaṇhāti.
tika-s0302t:309_4: Na taṇhāyati na bhāyati taṇhāvuttino abhāvā, tato eva bhayavatthuno ca abhāvā.
tika-s0302t:310_0: Gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvāti gilitvā viya aññassa avisayaṃ viya karaṇena pariniṭṭhāpetvā.
tika-s0302t:310_2: sukhaṃ abhinandantoyeva dukkhaṃ abhinandati nāma aggisantāpasukhaṃ icchanto dhūmadukkhānuññāto
tika-s0302t:310_3: viya. Dukkhaṃ patvā sukhaṃ patthanatoti ettha dubbalagahaṇikādayo nidassanabhāvena
tika-s0302t:310_4: veditabbā. Te hi yāva sāyanhasamayāpi abhutvā sāyamāsādīni karonto jighacchādiṃ uppādetvā
tika-s0302t:310_5: bhuñjanādīni karonti. Sukhassa vipariṇāmadukkhato sukhaṃ abhinandanto dukkhaṃ abhinandati
tika-s0302t:310_6: nāmāti yojanā. Keci pana dukkhassa abhāvato vipariṇāmasukhato taṃ sukhaṃ abhinandanto
tika-s0302t:310_7: dukkhaṃ abhinandatīti vadanti. Taṃ na, na hi tādisaṃ sukhanimittaṃ koci dukkhaṃ abhinandanto
tika-s0302t:310_8: diṭṭho, dukkhahetuṃ pana sāmisaṃ sukhaṃ abhinandanto diṭṭho. Dukkhahetuṃ sāmisaṃ
tika-s0302t:310_9: sukhaṃ abhinandanto atthato dukkhaṃ abhinandati nāmāti vuttovāyamattho. Kāyoti pañcadvārakāyo,
tika-s0302t:310_10: so pariyanto avasānaṃ etassāti kāyapariyantikaṃ. Tenāha “yāva pañcadvārakāyo pavattati,
tika-s0302t:310_11: tāva pavatta”nti. Jīvitapariyantikanti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0302t:311_0: Pacchā uppajjitvā paṭhamaṃ nirujjhatīti ekasmiṃ attabhāve manodvārikavedanāto pacchā
tika-s0302t:311_1: uppajjitvā tato paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati, tato eva siddhamatthaṃ sarūpeneva dassetuṃ “manodvārikavedanā
tika-s0302t:311_2: paṭhamaṃ uppajjitvā pacchā nirujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Idāni tameva saṅkhepena vuttaṃ vivarituṃ
tika-s0302t:311_3: “sā hī”tiādimāha. Yāva tettiṃsavassāpi paṭhamavayo. Paṇṇāsavassakāleti paṭhamavayato
tika-s0302t:311_4: yāva paññāsavassakālā, tāva ṭhitā hotīti vuḍḍhihāniyo anupagantvā sarūpeneva ṭhitā
tika-s0302t:311_5: hoti. Mandāti mudukā atikhiṇā. Tadāti asītinavutivassakāle. Tathā ciraparivitakkepi.
tika-s0302t:311_6: Bhaggā nittejā bhaggavibhaggā dubbalā. Hadayakoṭiṃyevāti cakkhādivatthūsu avattetvā
tika-s0302t:311_7: tesaṃ khīṇattā koṭibhūtaṃ hadayavatthuṃyeva. Yāva esā vedanā vattati.
tika-s0302t:312: Vāpiyāti mahātaḷākena. Pañcaudakamaggasampannanti pañcahi udakassa pavisananikkhamanamaggehi yuttaṃ. Tato tato vissandamānaṃ sabbaso puṇṇattā.
tika-s0302t:313: Paṭhamaṃ deve vassantetiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. Imaṃ vedanaṃ sandhāyāti imaṃ yathāvuttaṃ pariyosānappattaṃ manodvārikavedanaṃ sandhāya.
tika-s0302t:314_0: Kāyassa bhedāti attabhāvassa vināsato. “Uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā”ti pāḷi, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0302t:314_1: pana jīvitapariyādānā uddhanti paduddhāro kato. Paralokavasena agantvā. Vedanānaṃ
tika-s0302t:314_2: sītibhāvo nāma saṅkhāradarathapariḷāhabhāvo, so panāyaṃ appavattivasenāti āha “pavatti…pe…
tika-s0302t:314_3: bhavissantī”ti. Dhātusarīrānīti aṭṭhikaṅkalasaṅkhātadhātusarīrāni. Sarīrekadese hi sarīrasamaññā.
tika-s0302t:315_0: Kumbhakārapākāti kumbhakārapākato. Ettha paccatīti pāko, pacanaṭṭhānaṃ. Tadeva pācanavasena
tika-s0302t:315_1: āvasanti etthāti āvāso, tasmā kumbhakārāvāsato. Avigatavūpasamaṃ saṅkharitaṃ kumbhaṃ
tika-s0302t:315_2: uddharitvā ṭhapento chārikāya sati pidhānavasena ṭhapeti. Tathā ṭhapanaṃ pana sandhāya
tika-s0302t:315_4: adhippetāni, na chinnabhinnāni. Avayavamukhena hi samudāyo vutto. Tattha kapālasamudāyo
tika-s0302t:315_5: hi ghaṭo. Tenāha “mukhavaṭṭiyā ekabaddhānī”ti. Avasisseyyunti vaṇṇavisesauṇhabhāvāpagatā
tika-s0302t:315_6: ghaṭakārāneva tiṭṭheyyunti. Āditta…pe… tayo bhavā daṭṭhabbā ekādasahi aggīhi ādittabhāvato.
tika-s0302t:315_7: Yathā kumbhakāro kumbhakārāvāsaṃ ādittaṃ paccavekkhati, evaṃ āraddhavipassakopesa
tika-s0302t:315_8: bhavattayaṃ rāgādīhi ādittanti āha “kumbhakāro viya yogāvacaro”ti. Nīharaṇadaṇḍako
tika-s0302t:315_9: viya arahattamaggañāṇaṃ bhavattayapākato nīharaṇato. Samo bhūmibhāgo viya nibbānatalaṃ
tika-s0302t:316_1: kammajato, dhammatārūpato”ti imehi sattahi ākārehi sammasanto rūpasattakaṃ vipassati
tika-s0302t:316_2: nāma. “Kalāpato, yamakato, khaṇikato, paṭipāṭito, diṭṭhiugghāṭanato, mānasamugghāṭato,
tika-s0302t:316_3: nikantipariyādānato”ti imehi sattahi ākārehi sammasanto arūpasattakaṃ vipassati nāma,
tika-s0302t:316_4: tasmā yathāvuttaṃ imaṃ rūpasattakaṃ arūpasattakañca nīharitvā vipassantassa. Yadipi
tika-s0302t:316_5: arahato attabhāvo sabbabhavehipi uddhaṭo, yāva pana anupādisesaparinibbānaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
tika-s0302t:316_6: tāva tasmimpi sugatibhave ṭhitoyevāti vattabbataṃ labbhatīti “catūhi apāyehi attabhāvaṃ
tika-s0302t:316_7: uddharitvā”icceva vuttaṃ. Tenāha “khīṇāsavo panā”tiādi. Tathā ca vakkhati “anupādisesāya
tika-s0302t:316_8: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa vaṭṭavūpasamo veditabbo”ti. Na parinibbāti anupādisesāya
tika-s0302t:316_9: nibbānadhātuyāti adhippāyo, saupādisesāya pana nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānaṃ arahattappattiyeva.
tika-s0302t:316_10: Abhisaṅkhārahetuto hettha pariḷāhavūpasamassa upasamabhāvena adhippetattā uṇhakumbhanibbānanidassanampi
tika-s0302t:316_11: na virujjhati. Anupādinnakasarīrānīti utusamuṭṭhānikarūpakalāpe vadanti. Bhikkhaveti
tika-s0302t:316_12: ettha iti-saddo ādiattho. Idaṃ pana vacanaṃ. Anuyogāropanatthanti kāyapariyantikaṃ
tika-s0302t:316_13: vedanaṃ vedayamāno khīṇāsavo api nu puññābhisaṅkhārādikammaṃ kareyyāti pañhaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-s0302t:316_14: Atha vā anuyogāropanatthanti “api nu kho khīṇāsavo bhikkhu puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ vā abhisaṅkhareyyā”tiādinā
tika-s0302t:316_15: anuyogaṃ āropetuṃ vuttaṃ, na tāva yathāraddhadesanaṃ niṭṭhāpetunti attho.
tika-s0302t:317_0: Paṭisandhiviññāṇe siddhe tasmiṃ bhave uppajjanārahānaṃ viññāṇānaṃ siyā sambhavo,
tika-s0302t:317_1: nāsatīti vuttaṃ “viññāṇaṃ paññāyethāti paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ paññāyethā”ti. Sabbaso
tika-s0302t:317_2: saṅkhāresu asantesu paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ api nu kho paññāyeyya. Tasmiñhi apaññāyamāne
tika-s0302t:317_3: sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ na paññāyeyya. Therānanti “bhikkhave”ti ālapitattherānaṃ. Pañhabyākaraṇaṃ
tika-s0302t:317_4: sampahaṃsati tassa sabbaññutaññāṇena saṃsandanato. Appaññāṇanti appaññāyanaṃ. Ādi-saddena
tika-s0302t:317_5: viññāṇe asati nāmarūpassa appaññāṇanti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Sanniṭṭhānasaṅkhātanti
tika-s0302t:317_7: saddhāvimokkhañca. Tenāha pāḷiyaṃ “saddahatha metaṃ, bhikkhave”ti. Saddhāsahitañhi
tika-s0302t:320_0: 52. Ārammaṇādibhāvena saṃvattanato upādānānaṃ hitāni upādāniyāni, tesu upādāniyesu.
tika-s0302t:320_1: Tenāha “catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ paccayesū”ti. Assādaṃ anupassantassāti asādetabbaṃ micchāñāṇena
tika-s0302t:320_2: anupassato. Tadāhāroti soḷasa vā vīsaṃ tiṃsaṃ cattālīsaṃ paññāsaṃ vā āhāro paccayo
tika-s0302t:320_3: etassāti tadāhāro. Aggikkhandho viya tayo bhavā ekādasahi aggīhi ādittabhāvato etadeva
tika-s0302t:320_4: bhavattayaṃ. Aggi…pe… puthujjano aggikkhandhasadisassa bhavattayassa paribandhanato.
tika-s0302t:321_1: lokuttaradhammapāsādaṃ. So hi accuggataṭṭhena “pāsādo”ti vuccati. Satipaṭṭhānamahāvīthiyaṃ
tika-s0302t:324_1: gahetvā”ti vuttaṃ. Purimanayenevāti purimasmiṃ upādāniyasutte vuttanayeneva. Tathā
tika-s0302t:324_2: vinetabbānaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena hi imesaṃ suttānaṃ evaṃ vacanaṃ evaṃ desanā.
tika-s0302t:327_0: 55-56. Ojaṃ abhiharantīti rasaharaṇiyo viya purisassa sarīre rukkhamūlāni rukkhassa
tika-s0302t:327_1: pathavīāporase upari āropenti. Tesaṃ tathā āropanaṃ “ojāyā”tiādinā vibhāveti. Hatthasatubbedhamassāti
tika-s0302t:327_2: hatthasatubbedho, hatthasataṃ ubbiddhassapi. Etthāti etissaṃ vaṭṭakathāyaṃ. Kammārohananti kammapaccayo.
tika-s0302t:328_0: Puna etthāti etissaṃ vivaṭṭakathāyaṃ. Vaṭṭadukkhaṃ nāsetukāmassa daḷhaṃ uppannasaṃvegañāṇaṃ
tika-s0302t:328_1: sandhāya “kuddālo viyā”ti āha. Tato nibbattitañāṇaṃ samādhipacchiyā ṭhitaṃ nissāya
tika-s0302t:328_3: ekantato vaṭṭacchedāya hotiyevāti āha “rukkhassa…pe… manasikarontassa paññā”ti. Tattha
tika-s0302t:328_4: kammaṭṭhānanti vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ. Taṃ catubbidhavavatthānavasena vīsati pathavīkoṭṭhāsā,
tika-s0302t:328_5: dvādasa āpokoṭṭhāsā, cattāro tejokoṭṭhāsā, cha vāyokoṭṭhāsāti dvecattālīsāya koṭṭhāsesu.
tika-s0302t:328_6: Viññāṇassa cāti iti-saddo ādiattho pakārattho ca. Tena bhūtarūpāni viññāṇasampayuttadhamme
tika-s0302t:328_7: ca saṅgaṇhāti. Sattasu sappāyesu yassa alabhantassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ vibhūtaṃ hutvā na
tika-s0302t:328_8: upaṭṭhāti, taṃ sandhāyāha “aññataraṃ sappāya”nti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0302t:331_0: 57-59. Palimajjeyyāti allakaraṇavasena parito pāḷiṃ bandheyya. Tathā karonto yasmā
tika-s0302t:331_1: ca tattha tiṇagacchādīnaṃ mūlasantānaggahaṇena taṃ ṭhānaṃ sodheti nāma, tasmā vuttaṃ
tika-s0302t:331_2: “sodheyyā”ti. Paṃsunti assa pavaḍḍhakārakaṃ, āgantukaṃ paṃsunti attho. Dadeyyāti
tika-s0302t:331_3: pakkhipeyya. Tenāha “thaddha”ntiādi. Vuttanayenevāti “rukkhaṃ nāsetukāmo puriso viyā”tiādinā
tika-s0302t:334_0: 60. Bahuvacanavasenāti kurū nāma jānapadino rājakumārā, tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado
tika-s0302t:334_1: ruḷhīvasena “kurū”ti evaṃ bahuvacanavasena. Yattha bhagavato vasanokāsabhūto koci
tika-s0302t:334_2: vihāro na hoti, tattha kevalaṃ gocaragāmakittanaṃ nidānakathāya pakati yathā “sakkesu
tika-s0302t:334_3: viharati devadahaṃ nāma sakyānaṃ nigamo”ti. “Āyasmā”ti vā “devānaṃ piyo”ti vā bhavanti
tika-s0302t:334_4: vā piyasamudāhāro esoti āha “āyasmāti piyavacanameta”nti. Tayidaṃ piyavacanaṃ gāravavasena
tika-s0302t:334_5: vuccatīti āha “garuvacanameta”nti. Atidūraṃ accāsannaṃ atisammukhā atipacchato uparivāto
tika-s0302t:335_1: viya bhikkhāpaṭiggaṇhanena tesaṃ abhivādanādisampaṭicchanena ca puññābhisandassa
tika-s0302t:335_2: jananena. Paṭisammajjitvāti antevāsikehi sammaṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ sakkaccakāritāya puna sammajjitvā.
tika-s0302t:335_3: Ubhayantato paṭṭhāya majjhanti ādito paṭṭhāya vedanaṃ, jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya ca vedanaṃ
tika-s0302t:335_4: pāpetvā sammasanamāha. Tikkhattunti “ādito paṭṭhāya anta”ntiādinā vuttacaturākārupasaṃhite
tika-s0302t:335_5: tayo vāre. Tena dvādasakkhattuṃ sammasanamāha. Amhākaṃ bhagavatā gambhīrabhāveneva
tika-s0302t:335_6: kathitattā sesabuddhehipi evameva kathitoti dhammanvaye ṭhatvā vuttaṃ “sabbabuddhehi…pe… kathito”ti.
tika-s0302t:336_0: Pamāṇātikkameti aparimāṇatthe “yāvañcidaṃ tena bhagavatā”tiādīsu viya. Atirekabhāvajotano
tika-s0302t:336_1: hi yaṃ yāva-saddo. Tenāha “atigambhīroti attho”ti. Avabhāsati khāyati upaṭṭhāti ñāṇassa.
tika-s0302t:336_2: Tathā upaṭṭhānañhi sandhāya “dissatī”ti vuttaṃ. Nanu esa paṭiccasamuppādo ekantagambhīrova,
tika-s0302t:336_3: atha kasmā gambhīrāvabhāsatā jotitāti? Saccametaṃ, ekantagambhīratādassanatthameva
tika-s0302t:336_4: panassa gambhīrāvabhāsaggahaṇaṃ, tasmā aññattha labbhamānaṃ cātukoṭikaṃ byatirekamukhena
tika-s0302t:336_5: nidassetvā tamevassa ekantagambhīrataṃ vibhāvetuṃ “ekaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Etaṃ natthīti
tika-s0302t:336_6: agambhīro agambhīrāvabhāso cāti etaṃ dvayaṃ natthi. Tena yathādassite cātukoṭike
tika-s0302t:336_7: pacchimā ekakoṭi labbhatīti dasseti. Tenāha “ayaṃ hī”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:337_0: Yehi gambhīrabhāvehi paṭiccasamuppādo “gambhīro”ti vuccati, te catūhi upamāhi ulliṅgento
tika-s0302t:337_2: na sakkā dūrabhāvato, evaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ avijjādipaccayasambhūtasamudāgatattho pakatiñāṇena
tika-s0302t:337_3: gahetuṃ na sakkā. Yathā sineruṃ bhinditvā miñjaṃ pabbatarasaṃ pākatikapurisena nīharituṃ
tika-s0302t:337_4: na sakkā, evaṃ paṭiccasamuppādagate dhammatthādike pakatiñāṇena bhinditvā vibhajja
tika-s0302t:337_5: paṭivijjhanavasena jānituṃ na sakkā. Yathā mahāsamuddaṃ pakatipurisassa bāhudvayavasena
tika-s0302t:337_6: pāraṃ tarituṃ na sakkā. Evaṃ vepullaṭṭhena mahāsamuddasadisaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ pakatiñāṇena
tika-s0302t:337_7: desanāvasena pariharituṃ na sakkā. Yathā pathaviṃ parivattetvā pākatikapurisassa
tika-s0302t:337_8: pathavojaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkā, evaṃ itthaṃ avijjādayo saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayā hontīti
tika-s0302t:337_9: tesaṃ paṭiccasamuppādasabhāvo pākatikañāṇena nīharitvā gahetuṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ catubbidhagambhīratāvasena
tika-s0302t:337_10: catasso upamā yojetabbā. Pākatikañāṇavasena cāyamatthayojanā katā diṭṭhasaccānaṃ
tika-s0302t:337_11: tattha paṭivedhasabbhāvato, tathāpi yasmā sāvakānaṃ paccekabuddhānañca tattha sappadesameva
tika-s0302t:337_12: ñāṇaṃ, buddhānaṃyeva nippadesaṃ. Tasmā vuttaṃ “buddhavisayaṃ pañha”nti.
tika-s0302t:338_0: Māti paṭisedhe nipāto. Svāyaṃ “uttānakuttānako viya khāyatī”ti vacanaṃ sandhāya vuttoti
tika-s0302t:338_1: āha “mā bhaṇīti attho”ti. Ussādentoti paññāvasena ukkaṃsantoti attho. Apasādentoti
tika-s0302t:339_0: Tatthāti therassa satipi uttānabhāve paṭiccasamuppādassa aññesaṃ gambhīrabhāve. Subhojanarasapuṭṭhassāti
tika-s0302t:339_1: sundarena bhojanarasena positassa. Katayogassāti nibbuddhapayoge kataparicayassa.
tika-s0302t:339_2: Mallapāsāṇanti mallehi mahābaleheva khipitabbapāsāṇaṃ. Kuhiṃ imassa bhāriyaṭṭhānanti
tika-s0302t:339_3: kasmiṃ passe imassa pāsāṇassa garutarapadesoti tassa sallahukabhāvaṃ dīpento vadati.
tika-s0302t:340_0: Timirapiṅgaleneva dīpenti tassa mahāvipphārabhāvato. Tenāha “tassa kirā”tiādi. Pakkuthatīti
tika-s0302t:340_1: pakkuthantaṃ viya parivattati parito vattati. Lakkhaṇavacanañhetaṃ. Piṭṭhiyaṃ sakalikaaṭṭhikā
tika-s0302t:340_2: piṭṭhipattaṃ. Kāyūpapannassāti mahatā kāyena upetassa, mahākāyassāti attho. Piñcha
tika-s0302t:340_3: vaṭṭīti piñcha kalāpo. Supaṇṇavātanti nāgaggahaṇādīsu pakkhapapphoṭanavasena uppajjanakavātaṃ.
tika-s0302t:341_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha itoti ito bhaddakappato. Satasahassimeti satasahassame. Haṃsavatī
tika-s0302t:341_2: nāma nagaraṃ ahosi jātanagaraṃ. Dhurapattānīti bāhirapattāni, yāni dīghatamāni.
tika-s0302t:342_0: Kaniṭṭhabhātāti vemātikabhātā kaniṭṭho yathā amhākaṃ bhagavato nandatthero. Buddhānañhi
tika-s0302t:342_1: sahodarā bhātaro nāma na honti. Tattha jeṭṭhā tāva nuppajjanti, kaniṭṭhānaṃ pana
tika-s0302t:342_2: asambhavo eva. Bhoganti vibhavaṃ. Upasantoti corajanitasaṅkhobhavūpasamena upasanto janapado.
tika-s0302t:343: Dve sāṭake nivāsetvāti sāṭakadvayameva attano kāyaparihāriyaṃ katvā, itaraṃ sabbasambhāraṃ attanā mocetvā.
tika-s0302t:344_0: Pattaggahaṇatthanti antopakkhittauṇhabhojanattā pattassa aparāparaṃ hatthe parivattentassa
tika-s0302t:344_1: sukhena pattaggahaṇatthaṃ. Uttarisāṭakanti attano uttariyaṃ sāṭakaṃ. Etāni pākaṭaṭṭhānānīti
tika-s0302t:344_2: etāni yathāvuttāni bhagavato desanāya pākaṭāni buddhe buddhasāvake ca uddissa therassa
tika-s0302t:344_3: puññakaraṇaṭṭhānāni, paccekabuddhaṃ pana bodhisattañca uddissa therassa puññakaraṇaṭṭhānāni bahūniyeva.
tika-s0302t:345: Paṭisandhiṃ gahetvāti amhākaṃ bodhisattassa paṭisandhiggahaṇadivaseyeva paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā.
tika-s0302t:346_0: Uggahanaṃ pāḷiyā uggaṇhanaṃ, savanaṃ atthasavanaṃ, paripucchanaṃ gaṇṭhiṭṭhānesu atthaparipucchanaṃ,
tika-s0302t:346_1: dhāraṇaṃ pāḷiyā pāḷiatthassa ca citte ṭhapanaṃ. Sabbañcetaṃ idha paṭiccasamuppādavasena
tika-s0302t:346_2: veditabbaṃ, sabbassapi buddhavacanassa vasenātipi vaṭṭati. Sotāpannānañca…pe… upaṭṭhāti
tika-s0302t:346_3: tattha sammohavigamena “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti attapaccakkhavasena
tika-s0302t:346_4: upaṭṭhānato. Nāmarūpaparicchedoti saha paccayena nāmarūpassa paricchijja avabodho.
tika-s0302t:346_5: Catūhīti dhammagambhīrādīhi catūhi gambhīratāhi sabbāpi gambhīratā.
tika-s0302t:347_0: Sāvakehi desitā desanāpi pana satthu eva desanāti āha “mayā dinnanaye ṭhatvā”ti.
tika-s0302t:347_1: “Sekkhena nāma nibbānaṃ sabbākārena paṭividdhaṃ na hotī”ti na tassa gambhīratāti
tika-s0302t:347_2: tassa gambhīrassa upādānassa gambhīratā viya suṭṭhu diṭṭhā nāma hoti. Tasmā āha “idaṃ
tika-s0302t:347_3: nibbānameva gambhīraṃ, paccayākāro pana uttānako jāto”ti. Nibbānañhi sabbepi asekkhā
tika-s0302t:347_4: sabbaso paṭivijjhanti nippadesattā, paccayākāraṃ pana sammāsambuddhāyeva anavasesato
tika-s0302t:347_5: paṭivijjhanti, na itare. Tasmā paccayavasena “idaṃ aparaddha”nti vuttaṃ theraṃ apasādentena.
tika-s0302t:347_6: Tameva hissa anavasesato paṭivedhābhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “atha kasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Asatipi
tika-s0302t:347_7: dhammato bhede saṃyojanatthaanusayatthavasena pana tesaṃ labbhamānabhedaṃ gahetvā
tika-s0302t:347_8: “ime cattāro kilese”ti vuttaṃ. Añño hi tesaṃ bandhanattho, añño thāmagamanaṭṭhoti.
tika-s0302t:347_9: Esa nayo sesesupi. Iti imesaṃ kilesānaṃ appahīnattā tathārūpaṃ upanissayasampadaṃ
tika-s0302t:347_10: abhāvayatova anuttānameva dhammaṃ uttānanti na vattabbamevāti adhippāyo. Cattāri
tika-s0302t:347_11: aṭṭha soḷasa vā asaṅkhyeyyānīti idaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ santāne bodhiparipācakadhammānaṃ
tika-s0302t:347_14: Paccanīkanti paṭikkūlaṃ viruddhaṃ. Sabbathā paccayākārapaṭivedho nāma sammāsambodhiyādhigamo
tika-s0302t:347_15: evāti vuttaṃ “paccayākāraṃ paṭivijjhituṃ vāyamantassevā”ti. Navahi ākārehīti uppādādīhi
tika-s0302t:348_0: “Avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ uppādaṭṭhiti ca pavattaṭṭhiti ca nimittaṭṭhiti ca āyūhanaṭṭhiti
tika-s0302t:348_1: ca saṃyogaṭṭhiti ca palibodhaṭṭhiti ca samudayaṭṭhiti ca hetuṭṭhiti ca paccayaṭṭhiti
tika-s0302t:348_2: ca, imehi navahākārehi avijjā paccayo, saṅkhārā paccayasamuppannā”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:349_0: Tattha navahākārehīti navahi paccayabhāvūpagamanehi ākārehi. Uppajjati etasmā phalanti
tika-s0302t:349_1: uppādo, phaluppattiyā kāraṇabhāvo. Sati ca avijjāya saṅkhārā uppajjanti, nāsati,
tika-s0302t:349_2: tasmā avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ uppādo hoti. Tathā avijjāya sati saṅkhārā pavattanti ca
tika-s0302t:349_3: nimiyanti ca. Yathā ca bhavādīsu khipanti, evaṃ tesaṃ avijjā paccayo hoti, tathā
tika-s0302t:349_4: āyūhanti phaluppattiyā ghaṭenti saṃyujjanti attano phalena. Yasmiṃ santāne sayaṃ
tika-s0302t:349_5: uppannā, taṃ palibundhanti paccayantarasamavāye udayanti uppajjanti, hinoti ca saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-s0302t:349_6: kāraṇabhāvaṃ upagacchati. Paṭicca avijjaṃ saṅkhārā ayanti pavattantīti evaṃ avijjāya
tika-s0302t:349_7: saṅkhārānaṃ kāraṇabhāvūpagamanavisesā uppādādayo veditabbāti. Uppādaṭṭhitīti ca tiṭṭhati
tika-s0302t:349_8: etenāti ṭhiti, kāraṇaṃ. Uppādo eva ṭhiti uppādaṭhiti. Esa nayo sesesupi. Idañca paccayākāradassanaṃ
tika-s0302t:349_9: yathā purimehi mahābodhimūle pavattitaṃ, tathā amhākaṃ bhagavatāpi pavattitanti acchariyavegābhihatā
tika-s0302t:350_0: Etassa dhammassāti etassa paṭiccasamuppādasaññitassa dhammassa. So pana yasmā atthato
tika-s0302t:350_1: hetuppabhavānaṃ hetu. Tenāha “etassa paccayadhammassā”ti. Jātiādīnaṃ jarāmaraṇapaccayatāyāti
tika-s0302t:350_2: attho. Nāmarūpaparicchedo tassa ca paccayapariggaho na paṭhamābhinivesamattena hoti,
tika-s0302t:350_3: atha kho tattha aparāparaṃ ñāṇuppattisaññitena anu anu bujjhanena. Tadubhayabhāvaṃ
tika-s0302t:350_4: pana dassento “ñātapariññāvasena ananubujjhanā”ti āha. Niccasaññādīnaṃ pajahanavasena
tika-s0302t:350_5: pavattamānā vipassanādhamme paṭivijjhati eva nāma hoti paṭipakkhavikkhambhanena tikkhavisadabhāvāpattito,
tika-s0302t:350_6: tadadhiṭṭhānabhūtā ca tīraṇapariññā ariyamaggo ca pariññāpahānābhisamayavasena pavattiyā
tika-s0302t:350_8: appaṭivijjhanā”ti āha. Tantaṃ vuccati paṭavīnanatthaṃ tantavāyeti tantaṃ āvañchitvā
tika-s0302t:350_9: pasāritasuttavaṭṭitaṃ nīyatīti katvā, taṃ pana tantākulatāya nidassanabhāvena ākulameva
tika-s0302t:350_10: gahitanti āha “tantaṃ viya ākulajātā”ti. Saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassento
tika-s0302t:350_11: “yathā nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Samānetunti pubbenāparaṃ samaṃ katvā ānetuṃ, avisamaṃ ujuṃ
tika-s0302t:350_12: kātunti attho. Tantameva vā ākulaṃ tantākulaṃ, tantākulaṃ viya jātā bhūtā tantākulakajātā.
tika-s0302t:350_13: Majjhimaṃ paṭipadaṃ anupagantvā antadvayapakkhandena paccayākāre khalitvā ākulabyākulā
tika-s0302t:350_14: honti, teneva antadvayapakkhandena taṃtaṃdiṭṭhiggāhavasena paribbhamantā ujukaṃ dhammaṭṭhititantaṃ
tika-s0302t:350_15: paṭivijjhituṃ na jānanti. Tenāha “na sakkonti paccayākāraṃ ujuṃ kātu”nti. Dve bodhisatteti
tika-s0302t:350_16: paccekabodhisattamahābodhisatte. Attano dhammatāyāti attano sabhāvena, paropadesena
tika-s0302t:350_17: vināti attho. Tattha tattha guḷakajātanti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne jātaguḷakaṃ piṇḍisuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:350_18: Tato eva gaṇṭhibaddhanti vuttaṃ. Paccayesu pakkhalitvāti aniccadukkhānattādisabhāvesu
tika-s0302t:350_19: paccayadhammesu niccādibhāvavasena pakkhalitvā. Paccaye ujuṃ kātuṃ asakkontoti tasseva
tika-s0302t:350_20: niccādigāhassa avissajjanato paccayadhammanimittaṃ attano dassanaṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ asakkonto
tika-s0302t:351_0: Ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā sassatadiṭṭhiādi diṭṭhiyo nissitā allīnā, vinanato
tika-s0302t:351_1: kulāti itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmassa tantavāyassa gaṇṭhikaṃ nāma ākulabhāvena aggato
tika-s0302t:351_2: vā mūlato vā duviññeyyāvayavaṃ khalitabandhasuttanti āha “kulāgaṇṭhikaṃ vuccati pesakārakañjiyasutta”nti.
tika-s0302t:351_3: Sakuṇikāti vaṭṭacāṭakasakuṇikā. Sā hi rukkhasākhāsu olambanakulāvakā hoti. Tañhi
tika-s0302t:351_4: sā kulāvakaṃ tato tato tiṇahīrādike ānetvā tathā tathā vinandhati, yathā tesaṃ pesakārakañjiyasuttaṃ
tika-s0302t:351_5: viya aggena vā aggaṃ, mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ vivecetuṃ vā na sakkā. Tenāha “yathā”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:351_6: Tadubhayampīti kulāgaṇṭhikanti vuttaṃ kañjiyasuttaṃ kulāvakañca. Purimanayenevāti
tika-s0302t:352_0: Kāmaṃ muñjapabbajatiṇāni yathājātānipi dīghabhāvena patitvā araññaṭṭhāne aññamaññaṃ
tika-s0302t:352_1: vinandhitvā ākulāni hutvā tiṭṭhanti, tāni pana tathā dubbiveciyāni yathā rajjubhūtānīti
tika-s0302t:352_2: dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
tika-s0302t:353_0: Apāyoti ayena sukhena, sukhahetunā vā virahito. Dukkhassa gatibhāvatoti apāyikassa
tika-s0302t:353_2: virūpaṃ nipatitattā yathā tenattabhāvena sukhasamussayo na hoti, evaṃ nipatitattā.
tika-s0302t:353_3: Itaroti saṃsāro nanu “apāya”ntiādinā vuttopi saṃsāro evāti? Saccametaṃ, nirayādīnaṃ
tika-s0302t:353_5: veditabbo. Khandhānañca paṭipāṭīti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ hetuphalabhāvena aparāparuppatti.
tika-s0302t:354_0: Taṃ sabbampīti taṃ “apāya”ntiādinā vuttaṃ sabbaṃ apāyadukkhañceva vaṭṭadukkhañca.
tika-s0302t:354_1: Mahāsamudde vātakkhittā nāvā viyāti idaṃ paribbhamanaṭṭhānassa mahantabhāvadassanatthañceva
tika-s0302t:359_0: 61. “Assutavā”ti sotadvārānusārena upadhāritaṃ, upadhāraṇaṃ vā sutaṃ assa atthīti
tika-s0302t:359_1: sutavā, tappaṭikkhepena na sutavāti assutavā. Vā-saddo cāyaṃ pasaṃsāyaṃ, atisayassa
tika-s0302t:359_2: vā bodhanako, tasmā yassa pasaṃsitaṃ, atisayena vā sutaṃ atthi, so “sutavā”ti saṃkilesaviddhaṃsanasamattho
tika-s0302t:359_3: pariyattidhammaparicayo “taṃ sutvā tathattāya paṭipatti ca sutavā”ti iminā padena
tika-s0302t:359_4: pakāsito. Atha vā sotabbayuttaṃ sutvā kattabbanipphattiṃ suṇīti sutavā. Tappaṭikkhepena
tika-s0302t:359_5: na sutavāti assutavā. Tenāhu porāṇā “āgamādhigamābhāvā, ñeyyo assutavā itī”ti. Tathā
tika-s0302t:359_6: cāha “khandhadhātu…pe… vinicchayarahito”ti. Tattha vācuggatakaraṇaṃ uggaho, tattha
tika-s0302t:359_7: paripucchanaṃ paripucchā, kusalehi saha codanāpariharaṇavasena vinicchayassa kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0302t:359_8: vinicchayo. Puthūnanti bahūnaṃ. Kilesādīnaṃ kilesābhisaṅkhārānaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ paṭisambhidāmagganiddesesu
tika-s0302t:359_10: idaṃ-saddoti āha “imasminti paccuppannapaccakkhakāyaṃ dassetī”ti. Catūsu mahābhūtesu
tika-s0302t:359_11: niyuttoti cātumahābhūtiko. Yathā pana mahāmattikāya nibbattaṃ mattikāmayaṃ, evamayaṃ
tika-s0302t:359_12: catūhi mahābhūtehi nibbatto “catumahābhūtamayo”ti vuttaṃ. Nibbindeyyāti nibbindanampi
tika-s0302t:359_13: āpajjeyya. Nibbindanā nāma ukkaṇṭhanā anabhiratibhāvatoti vuttaṃ “ukkaṇṭheyyā”ti.
tika-s0302t:359_14: Virajjeyyāti vītarāgo bhaveyya. Tenāha “na rajjeyyā”ti. Vimucceyyāti idha pana accantāya
tika-s0302t:359_15: vimuccanaṃ adhippetanti āha “muccitukāmo bhaveyyā”ti. Catūhi ca rūpajanakapaccayehi
tika-s0302t:359_16: āgato cayoti, ācayo, vuddhi. Cayato apakkamoti apacayo, parihāni. Ādānanti gahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0302t:359_17: paṭisandhiyā nibbatti. Bhedoti khandhānaṃ bhedo. So hi kaḷevarassa nikkhepoti vuttoti
tika-s0302t:360_0: Paññāyantīti pakārato ñāyanti. Rūpaṃ pariggahetuṃ pariggaṇhanavasenapi rūpaṃ ālambituṃ.
tika-s0302t:360_1: Ayuttarūpaṃ katvā taṇhādīhi pariggahetuṃ arūpaṃ pariggaṇhituṃ yuttarūpaṃ karoti tesaṃ
tika-s0302t:360_2: bhikkhūnaṃ sappāyabhāvato. Tenāha “kasmā”tiādi. Nikkaḍḍhantoti tato gāhato nīharanto.
tika-s0302t:361_0: Manāyatanasseva nāmaṃ, na samādhipaññattīnaṃ “cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ, citto gahapatī”tiādīsu
tika-s0302t:361_1: viya. Cittīkātabbabhūtaṃ vatthu etassāti cittavatthu, tassa bhāvo cittavatthutā,
tika-s0302t:361_2: tena kāraṇena cittabhāvamāha. Cittagocaratāyāti cittavicittavisayatāya. Sampayuttadhammacittatāyāti
tika-s0302t:361_4: Vijānanaṭṭhenāti bujjhanaṭṭhena. Ajjhositanti ajjhosābhūtāya taṇhāya gahitaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0302t:361_5: “taṇhāyā”tiādi. Parāmasitvāti dhammasabhāvaṃ aniccatādiṃ atikkamitvā parato niccādito
tika-s0302t:361_6: āmasitvā. Aṭṭhasatanti aṭṭhādhikaṃ sataṃ. Nava mānāti seyyassa “seyyohamasmī”tiādinā
tika-s0302t:361_7: āgatā navavidhamānā. Brahmajāle āgatā sassatavādādayo dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiyo. Evanti vuttākārena.
tika-s0302t:361_8: Yasmā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhavasena puthujjanena daḷhaggāhaṃ gahitaṃ, tasmā so tattha
tika-s0302t:362_0: Bhikkhaveti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho, tena “vara”nti evamādikaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Idaṃ
tika-s0302t:362_1: anusandhivacanaṃ “kasmā āhā”ti kathetukāmatāya kāraṇaṃ pucchati. Tenāha “paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0302t:362_2: hī”tiādi. Assutavatā puthujjanena. Tenāti bhagavatā. Ayuttarūpaṃ kataṃ “nibbindeyyā”tiādinā
tika-s0302t:362_3: ādīnavassa vibhāvitattā. Arūpe pana tathā ādīnavassa avibhāvitattā vuttaṃ “arūpaṃ
tika-s0302t:362_4: pariggahetuṃ yuttarūpa”nti, yuttarūpaṃ viya katanti adhippāyo. Gāhoti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāho.
tika-s0302t:362_5: “Nikkhamitvā arūpaṃ gato”ti idaṃ bhagavatā ādīnavaṃ dassetvā rūpe gāho paṭikkhitto,
tika-s0302t:362_6: na arūpe, tasmā “kātabbo nu kho so tatthā”ti micchāgaṇhantānaṃ so tato rūpato nikkhamitvā
tika-s0302t:362_7: arūpaṃ gato viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ. Tiṭṭhamānanti tiṭṭhantaṃ. “Āpajjitvā viya hotī”ti
tika-s0302t:362_8: sabhāvena pavattamānaṃ “paṭhamavaye”tiādinā rūpassa bhedaṃ vayādīhi vibhajitvā dasseti.
tika-s0302t:363_0: Pādassa uddharaṇeti yathā ṭhapitassa pādassa ukkhipane. Atiharaṇanti yathāuddhataṃ
tika-s0302t:363_1: yathāṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā haraṇaṃ. Vītiharaṇanti uddhato pādo yathāṭṭhitaṃ pādaṃ
tika-s0302t:363_2: yathā na ghaṭṭeti, evaṃ thokaṃ passato pariṇāmetvā haraṇaṃ. Vossajjananti tathā parapādaṃ
tika-s0302t:363_3: vītisāretvā bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipanatthaṃ avossajjanaṃ. Sannikkhepananti vossajjetvā bhūmiyaṃ
tika-s0302t:363_4: samaṃ nikkhipanaṃ ṭhapanaṃ. Sannirujjhananti nikkhittassa sabbaso nirujjhanaṃ uppīḷanaṃ.
tika-s0302t:363_5: Tattha tatthevāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ paṭhamavayādike eva. Avadhāraṇena tesaṃ koṭṭhāsantarasaṅkamanābhāvamāha.
tika-s0302t:363_6: Odhīti bhāvo, pabbanti sandhi. Paṭhamavayādayo eva hettha odhi pabbanti ca adhippetā.
tika-s0302t:363_7: Paṭapaṭāyantāti “paṭapaṭā”iti karontā viya, tena nesaṃ pavattikkhaṇassa ittarataṃ
tika-s0302t:363_8: dasseti. Etanti etaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ yathāvuttaṃ tattha tattheva bhijjanaṃ evaṃ vuttappakārameva.
tika-s0302t:363_9: Vaṭṭippadesanti vaṭṭiyā pulakaṃ barahaṃ. Tañhi vaṭṭiyā pulakaṃ anatikkamitvāva sā
tika-s0302t:364_0: Rattinti rattiyaṃ. Bhummatthe hetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Evaṃ pana attho na gahetabbo
tika-s0302t:364_1: anuppannassa nirodhābhāvato. Purimapaveṇitoti rūpe vuttapaveṇito. Anekāni cittakoṭisatasahassāni
tika-s0302t:364_2: uppajjantīti vuttamatthaṃ theravādena dīpetuṃ “vuttampi ceta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Aḍḍhacūḷanti
tika-s0302t:364_3: thokena ūnaṃ upaḍḍhaṃ, tassa pana upaḍḍhaṃ adhikārato vāhasatassāti viññāyati. “Aḍḍhacuddasa”nti
tika-s0302t:364_4: keci, “aḍḍhacatuttha”nti apare. “Sādhikaṃ diyaḍḍhasataṃ vāhā”ti daḷhaṃ katvā vadantīti
tika-s0302t:364_5: vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Catunāḷiko tumbo. Mahāraññatāya pavaddhaṃ vanaṃ pavananti āha “pavaneti
tika-s0302t:364_6: mahāvane”ti. Tanti paṭhamaṃ gahitasākhaṃ. Ayamatthoti ayaṃ bhūmiṃ anotaritvā ṭhitasākhāya
tika-s0302t:364_7: eva gahaṇasaṅkhāto attho. Etadatthameva hi bhagavā “araññe”ti vatvāpi “pavane”ti āha.
tika-s0302t:365_0: Araññamahāvanaṃ viyāti araññaṭṭhāne brahāraññe viya. Ārammaṇolambananti ārammaṇassa
tika-s0302t:365_1: avalambanaṃ. Na vattabbaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena vinā anuppajjanato. Ekajātiyanti rūpādinīlādiekasabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0302t:365_2: “Dissati, bhikkhave, imassa cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa ācayopi apacayopī”ti vadantena
tika-s0302t:365_3: rūpato nīharitvā arūpe gāho patiṭṭhāpito nāma, “varaṃ, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano”tiādiṃ
tika-s0302t:365_4: vadantena arūpato nīharitvā rūpe gāho patiṭṭhāpito nāma.
tika-s0302t:366_0: Nanti gāhaṃ. Ubhayatoti rūpato ca arūpato ca. Harissāmīti nīharissāmi. Parivattetvāti
tika-s0302t:366_1: mantaṃ jappitvā. Kaṇṇe dhumetvāti kaṇṇe dhametvā. Assāti visassa. Nimmathetvāti nimmadditvā,
tika-s0302t:370_0: 62. Paccayabhāvena sukhavedanāya hitanti sukhavedaniyaṃ. Tenāha “sukhavedanāya paccaya”nti.
tika-s0302t:370_1: Paccayabhāvo ca upanissayakoṭiyā, na sahajātakoṭiyā. Tenāha “nanu cā”tiādi. Javanavedanāyāti
tika-s0302t:370_2: javanacittasahagatāya vedanāya. Taṃ sandhāyāti taṃ upanissayapaccayataṃ sandhāya.
tika-s0302t:370_3: Etanti etaṃ “sukhavedanāya paccaya”nti vacanaṃ vuttaṃ. Eseva nayoti iminā “nanu ca
tika-s0302t:370_4: sotasamphasso sukhavedanāya paccayo na hotī”ti evamādiṃ atidisati. So samphasso jāti
tika-s0302t:370_5: uppattiṭṭhānaṃ etassāti tajjātikaṃ, vedayitaṃ. Taṃ pana yasmā tassa phassassa anucchavikameva
tika-s0302t:370_6: hoti, tasmā tassāruppaṃ tassa phassassa anurūpanti ca attho vutto. Vuttanayenāti
tika-s0302t:370_8: ghaṭṭanaṃ iva saṅghaṭṭanaṃ phassena yugaggāho, tassa pana ghaṭṭanassa nirantarappavattiyā
tika-s0302t:370_9: piṇḍitabhāvo idha samodhānaṃ, na kesañci dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā sahāvaṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ
tika-s0302t:370_11: visayasaṅghaṭṭanato. Labbhamānova dhammo saṅghaṭṭanaṃ viya gayhatīti vuttaṃ “saṅghaṭṭanaṃ
tika-s0302t:370_12: viya phasso”ti. Usmādhātu viya vedanā dukkhasabhāvattā.
tika-s0302t:373_0: 63. Vuttanayamevāti heṭṭhā āhāravaggassa paṭhamasutte vuttanayameva. Lābhasakkārenāti
tika-s0302t:373_1: lābhasakkārasaṅkhātāya aṭṭhuppattiyāti keci. Lābhasakkāre vā aṭṭhuppattiyāti apare.
tika-s0302t:373_2: Yo hi lābhasakkāranimittaṃ paccayesu gedhena bhikkhūnaṃ apaccavekkhitaparibhogo jāto,
tika-s0302t:373_3: taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā bhagavā imaṃ desanaṃ nikkhipi. Yamakamahāmeghoti heṭṭhā olambanaupariuggamanavasena
tika-s0302t:374_0: Tiṭṭhanti ceva bhagavati katthaci nibaddhavāsaṃ vasante, cārikampi gacchante anubandhanti
tika-s0302t:374_1: ca. Bhikkhūnampi yebhuyyena kappasatasahassaṃ tato bhiyyopi pūritadānapāramisañcayattā
tika-s0302t:374_2: tadā mahālābhasakkāro uppajjatīti vuttaṃ “evaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassapī”ti. Sakkatoti sakkārappatto.
tika-s0302t:374_3: Garukatoti garukārappatto. Mānitoti bahumato manasā piyāyito ca. Pūjitoti mālādipūjāya
tika-s0302t:374_4: ceva catupaccayābhipūjāya ca pūjito. Apacitoti apacāyanappatto. Yassa hi cattāro
tika-s0302t:374_5: paccaye sakkatvā suabhisaṅkhate paṇītapaṇīte upanenti, so sakkato. Yasmiṃ garubhāvaṃ
tika-s0302t:374_6: paccupaṭṭhapetvā denti, so garukato. Yaṃ manasā piyāyanti bahumaññanti, so bahumato.
tika-s0302t:374_7: Yassa sabbametaṃ pūjāvasena karonti, so pūjito. Yassa abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānañjalikammādivasena
tika-s0302t:374_8: paramanipaccakāraṃ karonti, so apacito. Bhagavati bhikkhusaṅghe ca loko evaṃ paṭipanno.
tika-s0302t:374_9: Tena vuttaṃ “tena kho pana samayena…pe… parikkhārāna”nti. Lābhaggayasaggappattanti
tika-s0302t:374_10: lābhassa ca yasassa ca aggaṃ ukkaṃsaṃ pattaṃ.
tika-s0302t:376_0: Assāti bhagavato. Dhammasabhāvacintāvasena pavattaṃ sahottappañāṇaṃ dhammasaṃvego.
tika-s0302t:376_1: Dhuvapaṭisevanaṭṭhānañhetaṃ sattānaṃ, yadidaṃ āhāraparibhogo, tasmā na tattha apaccavekkhaṇamattena
tika-s0302t:376_2: pārājikaṃ paññapetuṃ sakkāti adhippāyo. Āhārāti “paccayā”tiādinā pubbe āhāresu vuttavidhiṃ
tika-s0302t:376_3: sandhāya āha “āhārā”tiādi. Idāni tattha kattabbaṃ atthavaṇṇanaṃ sandhāya “heṭṭhā
tika-s0302t:377_0: Ādīnavanti dosaṃ. Jāyāti bhariyā. Patīti bhattā. Apekkhāsaddā cete pitāputtasaddā
tika-s0302t:377_1: viya, pāḷiyaṃ pana ā-kārassa rassattaṃ sānunāsikañca katvā vuttaṃ “jāyampatikā”ti.
tika-s0302t:377_2: Sammā phalaṃ vahatīti sambalaṃ, sukhāvahanti attho. Tathā hi taṃ “pathe hitanti pātheyya”nti
tika-s0302t:377_3: vuccati. Maggassa kantārapariyāpannattā vuttaṃ “kantārabhūtaṃ magga”nti. Dullabhatāya
tika-s0302t:377_4: taṃ udakaṃ tattha tāretīti kantāraṃ, nirudakaṃ mahāvanaṃ. Ruḷhīvasena itarampi mahāvanaṃ
tika-s0302t:377_5: tathā vuccatīti āha “corakantāra”ntiādi. Pararājūnaṃ veriādīnañca vasena sappaṭibhayampi
tika-s0302t:378_0: Ghanaghanaṭṭhānatoti maṃsassa bahalabahalaṃ thūlathūlaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṭṭhānato. “Tādisañhi
tika-s0302t:378_1: maṃsaṃ gahetvā sukkhāpitaṃ vallūraṃ. Sūle āvunitvā pakkamaṃsaṃ sūlamaṃsaṃ. Viraḷacchāyāyaṃ
tika-s0302t:378_2: nisīdiṃsu gantuṃ asamattho hutvā. Govatakukkuravatadevatāyācanādīhīti govatakukkuravatādivatacaraṇehi
tika-s0302t:378_3: ceva devatāyācanādīhi paṇidhikammehi ca mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhūtaṃ.
tika-s0302t:379_0: Yasmā pana sāsane sammāpaṭipajjantassa bhikkhuno āhāraparibhogassa opammabhāvena
tika-s0302t:379_1: tesaṃ jāyampatikānaṃ puttamaṃsaparibhogo idha bhagavatā ānīto, tasmāssa nānākārehi
tika-s0302t:379_2: opammattaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “tesaṃ so puttamaṃsāhāro”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha sajātimaṃsatāyāti
tika-s0302t:379_4: amanuññaṃ hoti aparicitabhāvato gārayhabhāvato ca, tato eva ñātiādimaṃsatāyātiādi
tika-s0302t:379_5: vuttaṃ. Taruṇamaṃsatāyātiādi pana sabhāvato anabhisaṅkhārato ca amanuññāti katvā
tika-s0302t:379_6: vuttaṃ. Adhūpitatāyāti adhūpitabhāvato. Majjhattabhāveyeva ṭhitā. Tato eva nicchandarāgaparibhoge
tika-s0302t:379_7: ṭhitāti vuttaṃ kantārato nittharaṇajjhāsayatāya. Idāni ye ca te anapanītāhāro, na
tika-s0302t:379_8: yāvadatthaparibhogo vigatamaccheramalatā sammohābhāvo āyatiṃ tattha patthanābhāvo
tika-s0302t:379_9: sannidhikārābhāvo apariccajanamadatthābhāvo ahīḷanā avivādaparibhogo cāti upamāyaṃ
tika-s0302t:379_10: labbhamānā pakāravisesā, te tathā nīharitvā upameyye yojetvā dassetuṃ “na aṭṭhinhārucammanissitaṭṭhānānī”tiādi
tika-s0302t:379_11: vuttaṃ. Taṃ kāraṇanti taṃ tesaṃ jāyampatīnaṃ yāvadeva kantāranittharaṇatthāya puttamaṃsaparibhogasaṅkhātaṃ kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t:380_0: Nissandapāṭikulyataṃ paccavekkhantopi kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ parivīmaṃsati. Yathā te jāyampatikātiādipi
tika-s0302t:380_1: opammasaṃsandanaṃ. “Paribhuñjitabbo āhāro”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Esa nayo
tika-s0302t:380_2: ito paresupi. Apaṭikkhipitvāti anapanetvā. Vaṭṭakena viya kukkuṭena viya cāti visadisūdāharaṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t:380_3: Odhiṃ adassetvāti mahantaggahaṇavasena odhiṃ akatvā. Sīhena viyāti sadisūdāharaṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t:381_1: attā nāma atthīti diṭṭhi attūpaladdhi, taṃsahagatena sammohena attā āhāraṃ paribhuñjatīti.
tika-s0302t:381_2: Satisampajaññavasenapīti “asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī hotī”ti ettha vuttasatisampajaññavasenapi.
tika-s0302t:382: “Aho vata mayaṃ…pe… labheyya”nti patthanaṃ vā, “hiyyo viya…pe… na laddha”nti anusocanaṃ vā akatvāti yojanā.
tika-s0302t:383: “Sannidhiṃ na akaṃsu, bhūmiyaṃ vā nikhaṇiṃsu, agginā vā jhāpayiṃsū”ti na-kāraṃ ānetvā yojanā. Evaṃ sabbattha.
tika-s0302t:384_0: Piṇḍapātaṃ vā ahīḷentena dāyakaṃ vā ahīḷentena paribhuñjitabboti yojanā. Sa pattapāṇīti
tika-s0302t:384_1: so pattahattho. Nāvajāniyāti na avajāniyā. Atimaññatīti atikkamitvā maññati, avajānātīti attho.
tika-s0302t:385_0: “Tīhi pariññāhi pariññāte”ti vatvā tāhi kabaḷīkārāhārassa parijānanavidhiṃ dassento
tika-s0302t:385_1: “katha”ntiādimāha. Tattha savatthukavasenāti sasambhāravasena, sabhāvato pana rūpāharaṇaṃ
tika-s0302t:385_2: ojamattaṃ hoti. Idañhi kabaḷīkārāhārassa lakkhaṇaṃ. Kāmaṃ rasārammaṇaṃ jivhāpasāde
tika-s0302t:385_3: paṭihaññati, tena pana avinābhāvato sampattavisayagāhitāya ca jivhāpasādassa “ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ
tika-s0302t:385_4: kattha paṭihaññatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tassāti jivhāpasādassa. Ime dhammāti ime yathāvuttabhūtupādāyadhammā.
tika-s0302t:385_5: Tanti rūpakhandhaṃ. Pariggaṇhatoti pariggaṇhantassa. Uppannā phassapañcamakā dhammāti
tika-s0302t:385_6: sabbepi ye yathāniddhāritā, tehi sahappavattāva sabbepi ime. Sarasalakkhaṇatoti attano
tika-s0302t:385_7: kiccato lakkhaṇato ca. Tesaṃ nāmarūpabhāvena vavatthapitānaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ
tika-s0302t:385_8: paccayo viññāṇaṃ. “Tassa saṅkhārā tesaṃ avijjā”ti evaṃ uddhaṃ ārohanavasena paccayaṃ.
tika-s0302t:385_9: Adhoorohanavasena pana saḷāyatanādike pariyesanto anulomapaṭilomaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
tika-s0302t:385_10: passati. Saḷāyatanādayopi hi rūpārūpadhammānaṃ yathārahaṃ paccayabhāvena vavatthapetabbāti.
tika-s0302t:385_11: Yāthāvato diṭṭhattāti “idaṃ rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ rūpaṃ, na ito bhiyyo, idaṃ nāmaṃ, ettakaṃ
tika-s0302t:385_12: nāmaṃ, na ito bhiyyo”ti ca yathābhūtaṃ diṭṭhattā. Aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā,
tika-s0302t:385_14: imāsaṃ sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena. Soti kabaḷīkārāhāro. Tilakkhaṇa…pe… saṅkhātāyāti
tika-s0302t:385_16: ca pavattañāṇasaṅkhātāya. Pariññāto hoti anavasesato nāmarūpassa ñātattā tappariyāpannattā
tika-s0302t:385_17: ca āhārassa. Tenāha “tasmiṃ yevā”tiādi. Chandarāgāvakaḍḍhanenāti chandarāgassa pajahanena.
tika-s0302t:386_0: Pañca kāmaguṇā kāraṇabhūtā etassa atthīti pañcakāmaguṇiko. Tenāha “pañcakāmaguṇasambhavo”ti.
tika-s0302t:386_1: Ekissā taṇhāya pariññā ekapariññā. Sabbassa pañcakāmaguṇikassa rāgassa pariññā, sabbapariññā.
tika-s0302t:386_2: Tadubhayassapi mūlabhūtassa āhārassa pariññā mūlapariññā. Idāni imā tissopi pariññāyo
tika-s0302t:386_3: vibhāgena dassetuṃ “yo bhikkhū”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Jivhādvāre ekarasataṇhaṃ parijānātīti
tika-s0302t:386_4: jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā iti paṭisañcikkhati “yo yamettha raso, so vatthukāmavasena
tika-s0302t:386_5: ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ hoti jivhāyatanaṃ pasādo. So kiṃ nissito? Catumahābhūtanissito.
tika-s0302t:386_6: Taṃsahajāto vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā jīvitindriyanti ime dhammā rūpakkhandho nāma. Yo
tika-s0302t:386_7: tasmiṃ rase assādo, ayaṃ rasataṇhā. Taṃsahagatā phassādayo dhammā cattāro arūpakkhandhā”tiādivasena.
tika-s0302t:386_8: Sabbaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatavasena veditabbaṃ. Tenāha “tena pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññātova
tika-s0302t:386_9: hotī”ti. Tattha tenāti yo bhikkhu jivhādvāre rasataṇhaṃ parijānāti, tena. Kathaṃ
tika-s0302t:386_10: pana ekasmiṃ dvāre taṇhaṃ parijānato pañcasu dvāresu rāgo pariññāto hotīti āha “kasmā”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:386_11: Tassāyevāti taṇhāya eva taṇhāsāmaññato ekattanayavasena vuttaṃ. Tatthāti pañcasu
tika-s0302t:386_12: dvāresu. Uppajjanatoti rūparāgādibhāvena uppajjanato. Lobho eva hi taṇhāyanaṭṭhena
tika-s0302t:386_13: “taṇhā”tipi, rajjanaṭṭhena “rāgo”tipi vuccati. Tenāha “sāyeva hī”tiādi. Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ
tika-s0302t:386_14: “yathā”tiādinā upamāya sampiṇḍeti. Pañcamagge hanatoti pañcasu maggesu sañcarittaṃ
tika-s0302t:387_0: Sabyañjane piṇḍapātasaññite bhattasamūhe manuññe rūpe rūpasaddādayo labbhanti, tattha
tika-s0302t:387_1: pañcakāmaguṇarāgassa sambhavaṃ dassetuṃ “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Satisampajaññena pariggahetvāti
tika-s0302t:388_0: Tasmiṃ satīti kabaḷīkārāhāre sati. Tassāti pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassa. Uppattitoti uppajjanato.
tika-s0302t:388_1: Na hi āhārālābhena jighacchādubbalyaparetassa kāmaparibhogicchā sambhavati. Upanijjhānacittanti
tika-s0302t:389_0: Natthi taṃ saṃyojananti pañcavidhampi uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0302t:389_1: “tena rāgena…pe… natthī”ti. Tenāti kāmarāgena. Ettakenāti yathāvuttāya desanāya.
tika-s0302t:389_2: Kathetuṃ vaṭṭatīti imaṃ paṭhamāhārakathaṃ kathentena dhammakathikena.
tika-s0302t:392_0: Dutiyeti dutiye āhāre. Uddālitacammāti uppāṭitacammā, sabbaso apanītacammāti attho.
tika-s0302t:392_1: Na sakkoti dubbalabhāvato, tathā hi itthī “abalā”ti vuccati. Silākuṭṭādīnanti ādi-saddena
tika-s0302t:392_2: iṭṭhakakuṭṭamattikākuṭṭādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Uṇṇanābhīti makkaṭakaṃ. Sarabūti gharagoḷikā.
tika-s0302t:392_3: Uccāliṅgapāṇakā nāma lomasā pāṇakā. Ākāsanissitāti ākāsacārino. Luñcitvāti uppāṭetvā.
tika-s0302t:393: Tisso pariññāti heṭṭhā vuttā ñātapariññādayo tisso pariññā. Tammūlakattāti phassamūlakattā. Desanā yāva arahattā kathitā sabbaso vedanāsu pariññātāsu kilesānaṃ lesassapi abhāvato.
tika-s0302t:396_0: Aṅgārakāsunti aṅgārarāsiṃ. Phuṇantīti attano upari sayameva ākirantīti attho. Tenāha
tika-s0302t:396_1: “narā rudantā paridaḍḍhagattā”ti. Narāti purisāti attho, na manussā. Bhayañhi maṃ
tika-s0302t:396_2: vindatīti bhayassa vasena karonto bhayaṃ labhati nāma. Santaramānovāti suṭṭhu taramāno
tika-s0302t:396_3: eva hutvā. Porisaṃ vuccati purisappamāṇaṃ, tasmā atirekaporisā purisappamāṇato adhikā.
tika-s0302t:396_4: Tenāha “pañcaratanappamāṇā”ti. Assāti kāsuyā. Tadabhāveti tesaṃ jālādhūmānaṃ abhāve.
tika-s0302t:397_0: Aṅgārakāsu viya tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ ekādasannaṃ aggīnaṃ vasena mahāpariḷāhato. Jivi…pe…
tika-s0302t:397_1: puthujjano tehi aggīhi dahitabbato. Dve bala…pe… kammaṃ anicchantasseva tassa vaṭṭadukkhe
tika-s0302t:397_2: pātanato. Āyūhanūpakaḍḍhanānaṃ kālabhedo na cintetabbo ekantabhāvino phalassa nipphāditattāti
tika-s0302t:398_0: Phasse vuttanayenevāti tattha “phasso saṅkhārakkhandho”ti vuttaṃ, idha “manosañcetanā
tika-s0302t:398_1: saṅkhārakkhandho”ti vattabbaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti. “Taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ, upādānapaccayā
tika-s0302t:398_2: bhavo”ti vacanato manosañcetanāya taṇhā mūlakāraṇanti āha “taṇhāmūlakattā manosañcetanāyā”ti.
tika-s0302t:398_3: Tenāha “na hī”tiādi. Keci pana yasmā manosañcetanāya phalabhūtaṃ vedanaṃ paṭicca
tika-s0302t:398_4: taṇhā uppajjati, tasmā evaṃ vuttanti vadanti.
tika-s0302t:401: Aniṭṭhapāpanavasena taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃ āgacchatīti āgu, pāpaṃ, taṃ carati sīlenāti āgucārī. Tenāha “pāpacāri”nti.
tika-s0302t:402_0: Rājā viya kammaṃ paramissarabhāvato. Āgucārī puriso viya…pe… puthujjano dukkhavatthubhāvato.
tika-s0302t:402_1: Ādinnappahāravaṇāni tīṇi sattisatāni viya puthujjanassa āturamānamahādukkhapatiṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0302t:407_0: 64. Catutthe soti lobho. Rañjanavasenāti raṅgajātaṃ viya tassa cittassa anurañjanavasena.
tika-s0302t:407_1: Nandanavasenāti sappītikatāya ārammaṇassa abhinandanavasena. Taṇhāyanavasenāti visayakattukāmatāya
tika-s0302t:407_2: vasena. Eko eva hi lobho pavattiākāravasena tathā vutto. Patiṭṭhitanti laddhasabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0302t:407_3: Tatthāti vaṭṭe. Āhāreti keci. Viññāṇanti abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ. Viruḷhanti phalanibbattiyā
tika-s0302t:407_4: viruḷhippattaṃ. Tenāha “kammaṃ javāpetvā”tiādi. Tattha javāpetvāti phalaṃ gāhāpetvā.
tika-s0302t:407_5: Abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇañhi attanā sahajātānaṃ sahajātādipaccayehi ceva āhārapaccayena
tika-s0302t:407_6: ca paccayo hutvā tassa attano phaluppādane sāmatthiyattā viruḷhippattaṃ. Tenāha “kammaṃ
tika-s0302t:407_7: santāne laddhabhāvaṃ viruḷhippattañcassa hotī”ti. Vaṭṭakathā esāti katvā “yatthāti
tika-s0302t:407_8: tebhūmakavaṭṭe bhumma”nti vuttaṃ. Sabbatthāti sabbesu. Purimapade etaṃ bhummanti
tika-s0302t:407_9: “yattha tatthā”ti āgataṃ etaṃ bhummavacanaṃ purimasmiṃ purimasmiṃ pade visayabhūte.
tika-s0302t:407_10: Tañhi ārabbha etaṃ “yattha tatthā”ti bhummavacanaṃ vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ vipākavaṭṭeti
tika-s0302t:407_11: paccuppanne vipākavaṭṭe. Āyatiṃ vaṭṭahetuke saṅkhāre sandhāya vuttaṃ “yattha atthi
tika-s0302t:407_12: āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattī”ti vacanato. Punabbhavābhinibbattīti ca paṭisandhi adhippetāti
tika-s0302t:407_13: vuttaṃ “yattha atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti, atthi tattha āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇa”nti.
tika-s0302t:407_14: Jātīti cettha mātukucchito nikkhamanaṃ adhippetaṃ. Yasmiṃ ṭhāneti yasmiṃ kāraṇe sati.
tika-s0302t:408_0: Kāraṇañcettha saṅkhārā veditabbā. Te hi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiyā hetū, taṇhāavijjāyo,
tika-s0302t:408_1: kālagatiādayo ca kammassa sambhārā. Keci pana kilesavaṭṭakammagatikālā cāti adhippāyena
tika-s0302t:408_2: “kālagatiādayo ca kammassa sambhārā”ti vadanti. Taṃtaṃbhavapatthanāya tathā tathā
tika-s0302t:408_3: gato tividho bhavova tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ. Tenāha “yatthāti tebhūmakavaṭṭe”ti. Tathā cāha
tika-s0302t:409_0: Saṅkhipitvāti tīsu akatvā viññāṇena ekasaṅkhepaṃ katvāti attho. Eko sandhīti eko
tika-s0302t:409_2: saddhi”nti padaṃ ānetvā sambandho. Nāmarūpenāti vā sahayoge karaṇavacanaṃ. Idha eko
tika-s0302t:409_3: sandhīti eko hetuphalasandhi. Āyatibhavassāti āyatiṃ upapattibhavassa. Tena cettha
tika-s0302t:410_0: Khīṇāsavassa aggamaggādhigamanatova pavattakammassa maggena sahāyavekallassa katattā
tika-s0302t:410_1: avijjamānaṃ. Sūriyarasmisamanti tato eva vuttanayeneva appatiṭṭhitasūriyarasmisamaṃ.
tika-s0302t:410_2: Sāti rasmi. Kāyādayoti kāyadvārādayo. Katakammanti paccayehi katabhāvaṃ upādāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0302t:410_3: na kammalakkhaṇapattato. Tenāha “kusalākusalaṃ nāma na hotī”ti. Kiriyamatteti avipākadhammattā
tika-s0302t:410_4: kāyikādipayogamatte ṭhatvā. Avipākaṃ hoti tesaṃ avipākadhammattā.
tika-s0302t:413_0: 65. Pañcamasutte “pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhā”tiādi heṭṭhā saṃvaṇṇitamevāti avuttameva
tika-s0302t:413_1: saṃvaṇṇetuṃ “nāmarūpe kho satī”ti āraddho. Tattha dvādasapadike paṭiccasamuppāde
tika-s0302t:413_2: imasmiṃ sutte yāni dve padāni aggahitāni, nesaṃ aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā vissajjetukāmo
tika-s0302t:413_3: tesaṃ gahetabbakāraṇaṃ tāva dassento “etthā”tiādimāha. Paccakkhabhūtaṃ paccuppannaṃ
tika-s0302t:413_4: bhavaṃ paṭhamaṃ gahetvā tadanantaraṃ anāgatassa “dutiya”nti gahaṇe atīto tatiyo hotīti
tika-s0302t:413_5: āha “avijjāsaṅkhārā hi tatiyo bhavo”ti. Nanu cettha anāgatassa bhavassa gahaṇaṃ na
tika-s0302t:413_6: sambhavati paccuppannabhavavasena abhinivesassa jotitattāti? Saccametaṃ, kāraṇe pana
tika-s0302t:413_7: gahite phalaṃ gahitameva hotīti tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Apicettha anāgato addhā
tika-s0302t:413_8: atthato saṅgahito eva yato “nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”ntiādinā anāgataddhasaṃgāhitā
tika-s0302t:413_9: desanā pavattā, catuvokāravasena viññāṇapaccayā nāmanti viseso atthi. Tasmā “pañcavokāravasenā”ti
tika-s0302t:413_10: vuttaṃ. Tehīti avijjāsaṅkhārehi ārammaṇabhūtehi. Ayaṃ vipassanāti addhāpaccuppannavasena
tika-s0302t:413_11: udayabbayaṃ passantassa pavattavipassanā. Na ghaṭīyatīti na samijjhati. Mahā…pe…
tika-s0302t:413_12: abhiniviṭṭhoti na ghaṭane kāraṇamāha, heṭṭhā gahitattā pāṭiyekkaṃ sammasanīyaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t:414_0: Adiṭṭhesūti anavabuddhesu. Catusaccassa anubodhena na bhavitabbanti āha “na sakkā
tika-s0302t:414_1: buddhena bhavitu”nti. Imināti mahāsattena. Teti avijjāsaṅkhārā. Bhavaupādānataṇhāvasenāti
tika-s0302t:414_3: parabhāgaṃ khaneyya attanā icchitassa gahitattā parabhāge aññassa abhāvato ca. Tenāha
tika-s0302t:414_4: “kassaci natthitāyā”ti. Paṭinivattesīti paṭisaṃhari. Paṭinivattane pana kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0302t:415_0: Paccayatoti hetuto, saṅkhāratoti attho. “Kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hotī”tiādinā
tika-s0302t:415_1: hetuparamparavasena phalaparamparāya kittamānāya, kimhi nu kho sati viññāṇaṃ hotīti
tika-s0302t:415_2: ca vicāraṇāya saṅkhāre kho sati viññāṇassa visesato kāraṇabhūto saṅkhāro aggahito,
tika-s0302t:415_3: tato viññāṇaṃ paṭinivattati nāma, na sabbapaccayato. Tenevāha “nāmarūpe kho sati
tika-s0302t:415_4: viññāṇaṃ hotī”ti. Kiṃ nāma hettha sahajātādivaseneva paccayabhūtaṃ adhippetaṃ, na
tika-s0302t:415_5: kammūpanissayavasena paccuppannavasena abhinivesassa jotitattā. Ārammaṇatoti avijjāsaṅkhārasaṅkhātaārammaṇato,
tika-s0302t:415_6: atītabhavasaṅkhātaārammaṇato. Atītaddhapariyāpannā hi avijjāsaṅkhārā. Tato paṭinivattamānaṃ
tika-s0302t:415_7: viññāṇaṃ atītabhavopi paṭinivattati nāma. Ubhayampīti paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ vipassanāviññāṇampi.
tika-s0302t:415_8: Nāmarūpaṃ na atikkamatīti paccayabhūtaṃ ārammaṇabhūtañca nāmarūpaṃ na atikkamati
tika-s0302t:415_9: tena vinā avattanato. Tenāha “nāmarūpato paraṃ na gacchatī”ti. Viññāṇe nāmarūpassa
tika-s0302t:415_10: paccaye honteti paṭisandhiviññāṇe nāmarūpassa paccaye honte. Nāmarūpe viññāṇassa
tika-s0302t:415_11: paccaye honteti nāmarūpe paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paccaye honte. Catuvokārapañcavokārabhavavasena
tika-s0302t:415_12: yathārahaṃ yojanā veditabbā. Dvīsupi aññamaññaṃ paccayesu hontesūti pana pañcavokārabhavavasena.
tika-s0302t:415_13: Ettakenāti evaṃ viññāṇanāmarūpānaṃ aññamaññaṃ upatthambhavasena pavattiyā. Jāyetha
tika-s0302t:415_14: vā upapajjetha vāti “satto jāyati upapajjatī”ti samaññā hoti viññāṇanāmarūpavinimuttassa
tika-s0302t:415_15: sattapaññattiyā upādānabhūtassa dhammassa abhāvato. Tenāha “ito hī”tiādi. Etadevāti
tika-s0302t:416_1: dvīhi padehi. Pañca padānīti “jāyetha vā”tiādīni pañca padāni. Nanu tattha paṭhamatatiyehi
tika-s0302t:416_2: catutthapañcamāni atthato abhinnānīti? Saccaṃ, viññāṇanāmarūpānaṃ aparāparuppattidassanatthaṃ
tika-s0302t:416_3: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha “aparāparacutipaṭisandhīhī”ti. Ettāvatāti vuttamevatthanti yo
tika-s0302t:416_4: “ettāvatā”ti padena pubbe vutto, tameva yathāvuttamatthaṃ “yadida”ntiādinā niyyātento
tika-s0302t:416_6: Paccayadhammānañhi attano paccayuppannassa paccayabhāvo idappaccayatā paccayākāro,
tika-s0302t:416_7: so ca “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā vutto saṅkhāruppattiyā anulomanato anulomapaccayākāro, tassa vasena.
tika-s0302t:417_0: Āpatoti parikhāgataudakato. Dvārasampattiyā tattha vasantānaṃ pavesananiggamanaphāsutāya
tika-s0302t:417_2: “samantā …pe… ramaṇīya”nti. Pubbe suññabhāvena araññasadisaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ janavāsaṃ
tika-s0302t:417_3: karonte nagarassa lakkhaṇappattaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “taṃ aparena samayena iddhañceva assa phītañcā”ti.
tika-s0302t:418_0: “Pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo ca suparisuddho”ti vacanato tīhi
tika-s0302t:418_1: viratīhi saddhiṃ pubbabhāgamaggopi aṭṭhaṅgikavohāraṃ laddhuṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ “aṭṭhaṅgikassa
tika-s0302t:418_2: vipassanāmaggassā”ti. Vipassanāya ciṇṇanteti vipassanāya sañcaritatāya tattha tattha
tika-s0302t:418_3: tāya vipassanāya tīrite pariyesite. Lokuttaramaggadassananti anumānādivasena lokuttaramaggassa
tika-s0302t:418_4: dassanaṃ. Tathā hi nibbānanagarassa dassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Diṭṭhakāloti adhigamavasena
tika-s0302t:418_5: diṭṭhakālo. Maggaphalavasena uppannā paropaṇṇāsa anavajjadhammā, paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ
tika-s0302t:419_0: Avattamānakaṭṭhenāti buddhasuññe loke kassaci santāne appavattanatova uppādādivasena
tika-s0302t:419_1: vattamānavasena. Tathā hi bhagavā “anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā, asañjātassa sañjanetā”tiādikehi
tika-s0302t:419_2: thomito. Pubbakehi mahesīhi paṭipanno hi ariyamaggo itarehi antarā kehici avaḷañjitoti
tika-s0302t:419_4: Subhikkhaṃ paṇītadhammāmatatāya tittiāvahaṃ. Pupphitaṃ upasobhitaṃ. Yāva dasasahassacakkavāḷeti
tika-s0302t:419_5: vuttaṃ “ekissā lokadhātuyā”ti paricchinnabuddhakhettattā. Tassa atthitāya hi paricchedo
tika-s0302t:422_0: 66. Chaṭṭhe assāti bhagavato. Saṇhasukhumadhammaparidīpanato sukhumā. Tīhi lakkhaṇehi
tika-s0302t:422_2: upanissayabhūtena hetunā sahetukā. Tihetukapaṭisandhipaññāya pāṭihāriyapaññāya ca
tika-s0302t:422_3: atthitāya paññavanto na kevalaṃ ajjhattikaaṅgasampattiyeva, bāhiraṅgasampattipi nesamatthīti
tika-s0302t:422_4: dassetuṃ “siniddhānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Abbhantaranti ajjhattaṃ. Paccayasammasananti paccayuppannānaṃ paccayavīmaṃsaṃ.
tika-s0302t:423_0: Ārambhānurūpā anusandhi yathānusandhi. Na gatāti na sampattā. Asambhinnapadanti avomissakapadaṃ,
tika-s0302t:423_1: aññattha evaṃ anāgataṃ vākyanti attho. Tenāha “aññattha hi evaṃ vuttaṃ nāma natthī”ti.
tika-s0302t:423_2: Evanti “tenahānandā”ti ekavacanaṃ, “suṇātha manasi karothā”ti bahuvacanaṃ katvā vuttaṃ
tika-s0302t:423_3: nāma natthīti attho. Keci pana “tenahānandā”ti idhāpi bahuvacanameva katvā paṭhanti
tika-s0302t:423_4: “sādhu anuruddhā”tiādīsu viya. Upadhīti adhippetaṃ upadhīyati ettha dukkhanti. Uppajjati
tika-s0302t:423_5: uppādakkhaṇaṃ udayaṃ paṭilabhati “pākaṭabhāvo ṭhitiko, attalābho udayo”ti. Nivisati
tika-s0302t:423_6: nivesaṃ okāsaṃ paṭilabhati. Ekavārameva hi uppannamattassa dhammassa dubbalattena
tika-s0302t:423_7: okāse viya patiṭṭhahanaṃ natthi, punappunaṃ ārammaṇe pavattamānaṃ niviṭṭhaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0302t:423_8: nāma hoti. Tenāha “nivisatīti punappunaṃ pavattivasena patiṭṭhahatī”ti.
tika-s0302t:424_2: paṭibimbaggahaṇānusārena. Kaṇṇassa chiddapadesaṃ rajatanāḷikaṃ viya, kaṇṇabaddhaṃ
tika-s0302t:424_3: pana pāmaṅgasuttaṃ viya. Tuṅgā uccā dīghā nāsikā tuṅganāsā. Evaṃ laddhavohāraṃ attano
tika-s0302t:424_4: ghānaṃ. “Laddhavohārā”ti vā pāṭho. Tasmiṃ sati tuṅgā nāsā yesaṃ te tuṅganāsā. Evaṃ
tika-s0302t:424_5: laddhavohārā sattā attano ghānanti yojanā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato rattakambalapaṭalaṃ viya.
tika-s0302t:424_6: Samphassato mudusiniddhaṃ kiccato siniddhamadhurarasadaṃ. Sālalaṭṭhinti sālakkhandhaṃ.
tika-s0302t:425: Addasaṃsūti passiṃsu. Evaṃ vuttanti “kaṃse”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ adhiṭṭhānavohārena.
tika-s0302t:427: Sattupānīyenāti sattuṃ pakkhipitvā ālolitapānīyena. Cattāri pānāni viya cattāro maggā taṇhāpipāsāvūpasamanato.
tika-s0302t:430_0: 67. Sattame kasmā pucchatīti mahākoṭṭhikatthero sayaṃ tattha nikkaṅkho samāno kasmā
tika-s0302t:430_1: pucchatīti adhippāyo. Ajjhāsayajānanatthanti idampi tassa mahāsāvakassa paracittajānanena
tika-s0302t:430_2: appāṭihīraṃ siyā, tena taṃ aparitussanto “apicā”tiādimāha. Tattha dve aggasāvakāti
tika-s0302t:430_3: sīlādiguṇehi uttamasāvakāti attho, na hi mahākoṭṭhikatthero aggasāvakalakkhaṇappatto,
tika-s0302t:430_4: atha kho mahāsāvakalakkhaṇappatto. Idāneva kho mayantiādi heṭṭhā paccayuppannaṃ anāloḷentena
tika-s0302t:430_5: dassetvā desanā āhaṭā, na aññamaññapaccayatāvasena, idha pana yenādhippāyena taṃ
tika-s0302t:430_6: āloḷetvā nivattetvā kathitaṃ mahātherena, tamevassa adhippāyaṃ teneva pakāsetukāmo
tika-s0302t:430_7: mahākoṭṭhikatthero āha “idāneva kho maya”ntiādi. Tenāha “idaṃ thero”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:431_0: Ettake ṭhāneti “kiṃ nu kho āvuso”tiādinā paṭhamārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva “nirodho hotī”ti
tika-s0302t:431_1: padaṃ, ettake ṭhāne. Avijjāsaṅkhāre aggahetvā “nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇa”nti desanāya
tika-s0302t:431_3: gahite kāraṇaṃ gahitamevā”ti viññāṇe gahite saṅkhārā, tesañca kāraṇabhūtā avijjā
tika-s0302t:431_4: gahitā eva hotīti vuttaṃ “heṭṭhā vissajjitesu dvādasasu padesū”ti. Ekekasminti ekekasmiṃ
tika-s0302t:431_5: pade. Tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vasenāti “nirodhāya dhammaṃ desesi, nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti,
tika-s0302t:431_6: nirodhā anupādāvinimutto hotī”ti evamāgatānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vārānaṃ vasena. “Aṭṭhārasahi
tika-s0302t:431_7: vatthūhī”tiādīsu viya idha vatthusaddo kāraṇapariyāyoti āha “chattiṃsāya kāraṇehī”ti.
tika-s0302t:431_8: Paṭhamo anumodanāvidhi. Dhammakathikaguṇoti vipassanāvisayo abhedopacārena vutto.
tika-s0302t:431_9: Sesadvayesupi eseva nayo. Dutiyo anumodanā, tatiyaṃ anumodananti abhidheyyānurūpaṃ
tika-s0302t:431_10: vattabbaṃ. Desanāsampatti kathitā “nibbidāya…pe… dhammaṃ desetī”ti vuttattā. Sekkhabhūmi
tika-s0302t:431_11: kathitā “nibbidāya…pe… paṭipanno hotī”ti vuttattā. Asekkhabhūmi kathitā “nibbidā
tika-s0302t:434_0: 68. Aṭṭhame parassa saddahitvāti parassa vacanaṃ saddahitvā. Tenāha “yaṃ esa bhaṇati,
tika-s0302t:434_1: taṃ bhūtanti gaṇhātī”ti. Parapattiyo hi eso paraneyyabuddhiko. Yaṃ kāraṇanti yaṃ
tika-s0302t:434_2: attanā cintitavatthu. Ruccatīti “evametaṃ bhavissati, na aññathā”ti attano matiyā
tika-s0302t:434_3: cintentassa ruccati. Ruciyā gaṇhātīti parapattiyo ahutvā sayameva tathā rocento gaṇhāti.
tika-s0302t:434_4: Anussavoti “anu anu suta”nti evaṃ cirakālagatāya anussutiyā labbhamānaṃ “kathamidaṃ
tika-s0302t:434_5: siyā, kasmā bhūtameta”nti anussavena gaṇhāti. Vitakkayatoti “evametaṃ siyā”ti parikappentassa.
tika-s0302t:434_6: Ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ upaṭṭhātīti yathāparikappitavatthu cittassa upaṭṭhāti. Ākāraparivitakkenāti
tika-s0302t:434_7: attanā kappitākārenā taṃ gaṇhāti. Ekā diṭṭhi uppajjatīti “yathāparikappitaṃ kiñci
tika-s0302t:434_8: atthaṃ evametaṃ, nāññathā”ti abhinivisantassa eko abhiniveso uppajjati. Yāyassāti
tika-s0302t:434_9: yāya diṭṭhiyā assa puggalassa. Nijjhāyantassāti paccakkhaṃ viya nirūpetvā cintentassa.
tika-s0302t:434_10: Khamatīti tathā gahaṇakkhamo hoti. Tenāha “so…pe… gaṇhātī”ti. Etānīti saddhādīni.
tika-s0302t:434_11: Tāni hi saddheyyānaṃ vatthūnaṃ gahaṇahetubhāvato “kāraṇānī”ti vuttāni. Bhavanirodho
tika-s0302t:434_12: nibbānanti navavidhopi bhavo nirujjhati ettha etasmiṃ adhigateti bhavanirodho, nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0302t:434_13: Svāyaṃ bhavo pañcakkhandhasaṅgaho tabbinimutto natthīti āha “pañcakkhandhanirodho
tika-s0302t:434_14: nibbāna”nti. Bhavanirodho nibbānaṃ nāmāti “nibbānaṃ nāma bhavanirodho”ti esa pañho
tika-s0302t:434_15: sekkhehipi jānitabbo, na asekkheheva. Imaṃ ṭhānanti imaṃ yāthāvakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t:435_0: Suṭṭhu diṭṭhanti “bhavanirodho nibbāna”nti mayā suṭṭhu yāthāvato diṭṭhaṃ, bhavassa
tika-s0302t:435_2: yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya diṭṭhattā. Anāgāmiphale ṭhito hi anāgāmimagge ṭhito eva
tika-s0302t:435_3: nāma uparimaggassa anadhigatattāti vuttaṃ “anāgāmimagge ṭhitattā”ti. Nibbānaṃ ārabbha
tika-s0302t:435_4: pavattampi therassetaṃ ñāṇaṃ “nibbānaṃ paccavekkhatī”ti vuttañāṇaṃ viya na hotīti
tika-s0302t:435_6: viya na hoti sappadesabhāvatoti dasseti. Evañca katvā idha udapānanidassanampi samatthitanti
tika-s0302t:435_7: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paccavekkhaṇañāṇenāti avasesakilesānaṃ, nibbānasseva vā paccavekkhaṇañāṇena.
tika-s0302t:435_8: Upari arahattaphalasamayoti upari sijjhanato arahattapaṭilābho tathā atthi. “Yenāhaṃ
tika-s0302t:438_0: 69. Navame udakavaḍḍhanasamayeti sabbadivasesu mahāsamuddassa anto mahantacandakantamaṇipabbatānaṃ
tika-s0302t:438_1: juṇhasamphassena pahatattā jalābhisandanavasena udakassa vaḍḍhanasamaye. Upari gacchantoti
tika-s0302t:438_2: pakatiyā udakassa tiṭṭhaṭṭhānassa tato upari gacchantoti attho. Upari yāpetīti udakaṃ
tika-s0302t:438_3: tattha uparūpari vaḍḍheti. Tathābhūto ca taṃ brūhento pūrentoti vuccatīti āha “vaḍḍheti
tika-s0302t:438_4: pūretīti attho”ti. Yasmā paccayadhammā attano phalasamavāyapaccaye honte tassa upari
tika-s0302t:438_5: ṭhito viya hoti tassa attano vase vattāpanato, tasmā vuttaṃ “avijjā upari gacchantī”ti.
tika-s0302t:438_6: Paccayabhāvena hi sā tathā vuccati. Tenāha “saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo bhavituṃ sakkuṇantī”ti.
tika-s0302t:438_7: Apagacchanto yāyanto. Tenāha “osaranto”ti, avaḍḍhanto parihīyamānoti attho.
tika-s0302t:441_0: 70. Dasame garukatoti garubhāvahetūnaṃ uttamaguṇānaṃ matthakappattiyā anaññasādhāraṇena
tika-s0302t:441_1: garukārena garukato. Mānitoti sammāpaṭipattiyā mānito. Tāya hi viññūnaṃ manāpatāti
tika-s0302t:441_2: āha “manena piyāyito”ti. Catupaccayapūjāya ca pūjitoti idaṃ atthavacanaṃ. Yadatthaṃ
tika-s0302t:441_3: saṃgītikārehi “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hotī”tiādinā imassa suttassa
tika-s0302t:441_4: nidānaṃ nikkhittaṃ, tassa atthassa ulliṅgavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa nayo sesapadesupi.
tika-s0302t:441_5: Aṃsakūṭatoti uttarāsaṅgena ubho aṃsakūṭe paṭicchādetvā ṭhitā dakkhiṇaaṃsakūṭato,
tika-s0302t:441_6: ubhayato vā apanenti. Paricitaganthavasena paṇḍitaparibbājako, yato pacchā visesabhāgī
tika-s0302t:442_0: Tejussadoti mahātejo. Purebhattakiccādīnaṃ niyatabhāvena niyamamanuyutto. Vipassanālakkhaṇamhīti
tika-s0302t:442_1: ñāṇaṃ tattha kathitaṃ. Dhammanti tassaṃ tassaṃ parisāyaṃ therassa asammukhā desitaṃ
tika-s0302t:442_2: dhammaṃ. Āharitvā katheti tathā varassa dinnattā.
tika-s0302t:443_0: Kiñcāpi susimo pūraṇādayo viya satthupaṭiñño na hoti, titthiyehi pana “ayaṃ brāhmaṇapabbajito
tika-s0302t:443_1: paññavā vedaṅgakusalo”ti gaṇācariyaṭṭhāne ṭhapito, tathā cassa sambhāvito. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0302t:443_2: “ahaṃ satthāti paṭijānanto”ti, na sassatadiṭṭhikattā. Tathā hesa bhagavato sammukhā upagantuṃ asakkhi.
tika-s0302t:444_0: Aññāti arahattassa nāmaṃ aññindriyassa ciṇṇante pavattattā. Taṃ pavattinti yaṃ aññabyākaraṇaṃ
tika-s0302t:444_1: vuttaṃ, taṃ sutvā. Assa susimassa, paramappamāṇanti uttamakoṭi. Ācariyamuṭṭhīti ācariyassa muṭṭhikatadhammo.
tika-s0302t:445_0: Aṅgasantatāyāti nīvaraṇādīnaṃ paccanīkadhammānaṃ vidūrabhāvena jhānaṅgānaṃ vūpasantatāya.
tika-s0302t:445_1: Nibbutasabbadarathapariḷāhatāya hi tesaṃ jhānānaṃ paṇītatarabhāvo. Ārammaṇasantatāyāti
tika-s0302t:445_4: jhānaṅgānaṃ santatā veditabbā. Ārammaṇasantatāya vā tadārammaṇadhammānaṃ santatā
tika-s0302t:445_6: Paññāmatteneva vimuttā, na ubhatobhāgavimuttā. Dhammānaṃ ṭhitatā taṃsabhāvatā dhammaṭṭhiti,
tika-s0302t:445_7: aniccadukkhānattatā, tattha ñāṇaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti āha “vipassanāñāṇa”nti. Evamāhāti
tika-s0302t:445_8: “pubbe kho, susima, dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ, pacchā nibbāne ñāṇa”nti evamādi.
tika-s0302t:446_0: Vināpi samādhinti samathalakkhaṇappattaṃ purimasiddhaṃ vināpi samādhinti vipassanāyānikaṃ
tika-s0302t:446_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Evanti vuttākārena. Na samādhinissando anupubbavihārā viya. Na samādhiānisaṃso
